row.SQL: select top 3 dbo.getdatestr1(track_date) track_date,track_man+case track_memo when '报修' then '(报修)' when '完工' then '(完工)' else '' end track_man,track_tel,track_content,agree_num,dbo.getTrackImage(track_id) image_paths,dbo.getTrackMaxImage(track_id) max_imagepaths,wx_headimage,track_id from ordertrack a,tj_sys_yh b where a.track_tel*=b.lxfs and ordercode='@@HYID,'
select track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,dbo.getdatetime(track_date) track_date,Track_Content,track_memo from OrderTrack where OrderCode ='@@HYID,'

select ORDER_CODE,Cust_Name,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,order_src,dh_sts,dbo.getdatestr1(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getdatetime(zjlxsj) zjlxsj,Order_Amount,djje,YWY,sex,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address_detail,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where ordercode = a.ORDER_CODE) gjcs from OrderList a where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,' and order_sts='9'

SELECT a.PRODUCT_CODE, b.SERIES_NAME, a.PRODUCT_NAME, a.PRODUCT_SIZE, a.PRODUCT_COLOR, a.PRODUCT_FLOW, a.PRODUCT_MATE, a.PRODUCT_FILL, a.PRODUCT_Untl, a.PRODUCT_PRICE,a.DEMO,a.ID,a.SERIES_CODE,a.PRICE_TYPE,a.STS,a.LOWER_NUM,a.product_num,a.abs_num FROM product_list a,Series_list b where a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.ware_code in (select warehouse_code from warehouse_list where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,')

SELECT iD, PRODUCT_CODE, ' ' WAREHOUSE_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_FLOW, PRODUCT_MATE, PRODUCT_FILL, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_NUM, ABS_NUM, ' ' PRODUCT_MAN, a.DEMO,a.ware_code ,a.product_num-case sign(isNull(a.abs_num,0)) when -1 then 0 else isNull(a.abs_num,0) end num,bad_num FROM product_list a,series_list b WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,' and product_num-abs_num>0

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_Untl, dbo.clearzero(isnull(PRODUCT_NUM,0)) product_num, product_memo DEMO, '' ware_code,a.agent_code,product_id,ISNULL((select mc from xl_list_z where bm=a.xl_code and Agent_Code=a.agent_code),'') xl_name ,(select SERIES_NAME from Series_list_z where SERIES_CODE=a.SERIES_CODE and agent_code=a.agent_code) SERIES_NAME FROM kc_kcdtb a where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and sts='0'

SELECT ID, PRODUCT_CODE, ' ' WAREHOUSE_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_FLOW, PRODUCT_MATE, PRODUCT_FILL, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_NUM, ABS_NUM, ' ' PRODUCT_MAN, a.DEMO,a.ware_code ,a.product_num-case sign(isNull(a.abs_num,0)) when -1 then 0 else isNull(a.abs_num,0) end num,bad_num FROM product_list a,series_list b WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE 编码或型号 , PRODUCT_NAME 名称,PRODUCT_SIZE 规格,(select top 1 SERIES_NAME from Series_list_z where SERIES_CODE=a.series_code) 类型, PRODUCT_Untl 单位, product_num 账面数,'' 实盘数,id product_id FROM kc_kcdtb a where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'
select AGENT_CODE,AGENT_NAME,Agent_Level,domain_man from agent_list where SJBM!=-1 and open_flag='启用'
SELECT SERIES_CODE, SERIES_NAME, Series_Type, DEMO,case STS when '0' then '正常' else '禁用' end sts,sts FROM Series_list where 1=1

select '@@ID,' code,a.id spbm,agent_code sccj,a.product_code psid,a.product_name+isnull(a.product_color,'') spmc,a.product_size xhgg,a.product_untl jldw,xq_sl sl,type_bazaar yj, type_bazaar dj, xq_sl*type_bazaar je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,b.mrp_id ref_id,xq_sl y_sl,type_bazaar y_dj,mrp_id sxbm,cgzq,qdl,yqcgrq jhq from product_list a,mrp_mx b where a.id=b.metail_code and mrp_id in (@@Qg_Id,)

select rq,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,psid,sl,rk_sl,dwmc,(rk_sl/sl)*100 cgl,ck_id,case isJA when 'F' then '未结案' else '已结案' end isJA,bz from (select dbo.getdatestr1(rq) rq,spbm,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,isnull((select sum(sl+isnull(wssl,0)) from rkd_mx x,rkd_zb y where x.id=y.id and sh='T' and ref_id=convert(varchar,b.ck_id)),0) rk_sl,dwmc,ck_id,isJA,b.bz from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b where a.id=b.id and pjlx='2'
SELECT sum(SALE_NUM), sum(TOTAL_AMOUNT) FROM SALE_LIST where op_time>='@@TODATE, 00:00:00.000' and op_time<'@@FROMDATE, 23:59:59.000' and SALE_DW='@@SALE_DW,'
SELECT vercode,ostype,verurl,vercontent,id from bm_ver

select back_code,back_amount,sfsf,back_demo,yb_amount,back_amount-yb_amount sb_amount,btfhgz,qt_amount from (select back_code,back_amount,sfsf,back_demo,isnull((select sum(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_code=a.back_code),0) yb_amount,dbo.getbtfhgz(qt_amount) btfhgz,qt_amount from backlist a where note_type='BT' and back_sts='2' and Qt_Amount>0 and Qt_Amount<=1 and sfsf!='运费' and agent_code='@@Cust_Code,' ) x where (back_amount-yb_amount)>0 and BACK_CODE not in (select bt_code from bt_list where BACK_CODE='@@Back_Code,' )
select * from PHD_MX where BACK_CODE='@@Back_Code,'

select PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl,ID product_id,PRODUCT_PRICE,product_code+''+product_name+isnull(product_size,'') product_info from product_list where xl_code='@@XL_Code,' and product_price>0.10 and sts='启用' and charindex('7',product_attr)>0
select '-'+isnull(bt_type,'')+convert(varchar,sum(bt_amount)) bt,sum(bt_amount) bt_amount,bt_type from bt_list where back_code='@@Back_Code,' group by bt_type
select back_code,xh,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,je,bz from giftsel_mx where back_code='@@Back_Code,'
select pack_num,box_num,att_num,fit_demo,ware_code from fit_list where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and ware_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select '@@ID,' code, product_id spbm, product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,back_num sl,product_price yj,product_price dj, product_price*back_num je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,id wlcg_id, '' sccj, product_code psid,0 wssl, '' ysmc,'' cd from BackDetails where ID in (@@d_SPBM,)
row.KJSM: 整采购单商品添加入库单

row.SQL: select '@@Back_Code,' back_code,product_code psid,product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,product_price dj,id spbm,1 sl,1*product_price je from product_list where ID='@@d_ID,'

select brand_code 品牌,Back_Code 单据号,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) 客户名称,dbo.getDatestr1(back_Date) 订货日期,Back_Num 数量,dbo.getDatestr1(sh_Date) 下单日期,Opr_Man 制单员,dbo.getSts(back_sts) 状态,ywy 区域经理,dbo.getdatetime(pack_date) 打包日期,pack_man 打包人,ph_man 配货人,agent_code from backList a where Note_Type='XS' and back_sts in (1,7,2)
select back_code,ddje,zsje,zsbl,zslx,convert(decimal(12,2),case zsje when '' then convert(decimal(12,2),ddje)*zsbl/100 else zsje end) lpje from msd_lp where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select '账面余额' type,convert(varchar,agent_amount) agent_amount from agent_list a,backlist b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and back_code='@@Back_Code,' union all select '订单总额' type,'- '+convert(varchar,back_amount) back_amount from backlist where back_code='@@Back_Code,' union all select bt_type,' + '+convert(varchar,bt_amount) bt_amount from bt_list where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select sum(back_amount),case sign(sum(back_amount)) when 1 then sum(back_amount) else 0 end bk from (select '订单总额' type,back_amount from backlist where back_code='@@Back_Code,' union all select bt_type,-bt_amount from bt_list where back_code='@@Back_Code,' union all select '账面余额' type,-agent_amount from agent_list a,backlist b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and back_code='@@Back_Code,') x

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date) Arr_Date,dbo.clearzero(Back_Num) back_num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,dbo.getUserChnName(Opr_Man) Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,0 outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,0 sc,0 sc_num,case isnull(pos_rev,0) when 0 then '未打印' else '配货中' end ph,brand_code,dbo.getDateTime(sh_Date) sh_date,back_amount from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and back_sts='5' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))
select dhd_id from tyd_dd where ID='@@ID,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy,zse,shrq,pjlx from rkd_zb a where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and note_type='@@Note_Type,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy,zse from rkd_zb a where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and note_type='@@Note_Type,'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,SERIES_NAME,PRODUCT_NAME, isnull(PRODUCT_SIZE,'') product_size, PRODUCT_COLOR, ''store_no, '' zxyh , '' PRODUCT_FILL, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_PRICE,isnull(a.product_mEMO,'') demo,ID,a.SERIES_CODE,'' PRICETYPE_Name,a.STS,a.LOWER_NUM,'' SPEC_PRICE,'' TYPE_AGENT,a.TYPE_SALES,'' TYPE_BAZAAR,PACK_NUM,PACK_TYPE,a.agent_code,lower_num,(select top 1 mc from xl_list_z where bm=a.xl_code and agent_code=a.agent_code) xl_name,'' price_type,'' cgzq,'' qdl,cbjj,product_attr,'' ware_code FROM kc_kcdtb a,Series_list_z b where a.SERIES_CODE*=b.SERIES_CODE and a.Agent_Code=b.agent_code

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_Untl, dbo.clearzero(isnull(bad_NUM,0)) product_num, a.DEMO,a.ware_code,agent_code,id,(select mc from xl_list where bm=a.xl_code) xl_name FROM product_list a where bad_num>0
select warehouse_name from fit_list a,warehouse_list b where a.ware_code=b.warehouse_code and order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,'
select count(*) from fit_list where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and ware_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select id bm,housing_name,housing_address,convert(varchar,lon)+','+convert(varchar,lat) jwd,'' khs,'' kdj,dbo.getagentName(agent_code) agent_name from Housing_Address where agent_code='@@agent_code,'
select id bm,housing_name,housing_address,convert(varchar,lon)+','+convert(varchar,lat) jwd,'' khs,'' kdj from Housing_Address where id='@@bm,'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE 货号 , PRODUCT_NAME 品名,PRODUCT_SIZE 规格,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) 所属类型, PRODUCT_Untl 单位, dbo.clearzero(bad_NUM) 次品库存, 0 在途数,lower_num 库存警戒线,id 产品ID,agent_code 品牌 FROM product_list a where bad_num>0
SELECT sum(bad_num) 不良品数 FROM product_list a where bad_num>0
select right('0000000000' + cast(cast(rand(checksum(newid()))*1000000000 as int) as varchar),10) keyid

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_UTIL, PRODUCT_PRICE, isNULL(SALE_PRICE,0.00), SALE_NUM, TOTAL_AMOUNT,ID FROM SALE_LIST where op_time>='@@TODATE, 00:00:00.000' and op_time<'@@FROMDATE, 23:59:59.000' and SALE_DW='@@SALE_DW,'
select distinct dhd_id from tyd_dd where ID='@@ID,'
select Group_Name,SPBM,SPMC,XHGG,product_len,JLDW,ASS_NUM,DJ,YJ,JE,Is_Must,Is_Stand,Limit_Num,PCS_DJ,ASS_SPBM code,xh,bz,pcs_dj from back_ass where comboid='@@ComboId,'
select case sign(count(1)) when 0 then '' when 1 then 'disabled' end fb,sum(abs_num) From abs_list where ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,'
select case sign(count(1)) when 0 then 'disabled' when 1 then '' end refb From abs_list where ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,'

select * from ( select a.order_code,Arr_Man+'<'+arr_address+arr_address_detail+'>' agent_name,dbo.getDateTime(order_date) back_date,product_code,case dh_sts when '已送货' then (b.product_num-b.ysl) when '已安装' then (b.product_num-b.ysl) else b.product_num end product_num,'' oper_memo,curr_kcsl 当时库存 ,tzshrq,dh_sts+' '+isnull(sjqh_sts,'') abs_src from orderlist a,orderproduct b where a.order_code=b.order_code and (a.dh_sts in ('未处理','待送货','改单中') or sjqh_sts='欠货' ) and product_id='@@Product_Id,' and AGENT_CODE='@@Agent_Code,' union all select a.order_code,Arr_Man+'<'+arr_address+'>' agent_name,dbo.getDateTime(track_date) back_date,product_code,b.product_num,'' oper_memo,curr_kcsl 当时库存,tzshrq,'售后' abs_src from v_maintenance_list a,orderparts b where a.track_id=b.srv_id and a.dh_sts in ('待送货') and product_id='@@Product_Id,' and AGENT_CODE='@@Agent_Code,' ) xxx where 1=1

select rq,dwbm,dwmc,psid,spmc,sl,dj,je,ysy,sssj1,sssj2,convert(decimal(12,2),ysy/sl*100) syl,isja from ( select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,DWBM,DWMC,PSID,SPMC,SL,DJ,JE,a.SSSJ1,a.sssj2,isnull((select SUM(sl) from DJQUSE_MX where FF_ID=a.ff_id),0) ysy,isja from DJQFFD_MX a,DJQFFD_ZB b where a.ID=b.id and sh='T') x where 1=1
select top 1 isnull(lgjy,0) lgjy,isnull(pro_amount,0) pro_amount,isnull(wl_amount,0) wl_amount from backlist where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' order by id desc
SELECT YHH, a.YHZ MC, YHXM, '' agent_name, '' MM, case sts when '0' then '在职' else '离职' end NAME, LXFS,a.YHZ,DEPT,a.STS,bm,sfz,dz,dh,rzrq FROM TJ_SYS_YH a WHERE yhz='系统管理员'
select memo,dis_je,finall_je from dbo.v_orderfinallAmount('@@Back_Code,')

select '@@ID,' code, product_id spbm, product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,product_num sl,cost_price yj,cost_price dj, cost_price*product_num je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,a.id wlcg_id, '' sccj, product_code psid,0 wssl,a.order_code ysbm, Arr_Man+'<'+arr_tel+'>'+'('+arr_address+arr_address_detail+')' ysmc,'' cd from orderproduct a,orderlist b where a.order_code=b.order_code and a.id in (@@d_SPBM,)

select t.fid fid, t.userid, t.ftitle, t.ftime fbrq, t.fhits, t.fanswers, t.bid, fcontent fcontent, t.ip, t.face, t.closed, t.name, t.reid, t.filename from tj_sys_bbs t where t.fid='@@fid,' union select t.fid fid, t.userid, t.ftitle, t.ftime fbrq, t.fhits, t.fanswers, t.bid, t.fcontent, t.ip, t.face, t.closed, t.name, t.reid, t.filename from tj_sys_bbs t where reid='@@fid,' order by fid
select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,a.id,psid,spmc,a.sl from ckd_mx a,ckd_zb b where a.id=b.id and ref_id='@@ref_id,' and sh='T'
select right('0000000000' + cast(cast(rand(checksum(newid()))*1000000000 as int) as varchar),10) keyid
select vercode,ostype,verurl,vercontent from bm_ver where id = '@@ID,'

select isnull(sum(back_amount-yb_amount),0) sb_amount from (select back_code,back_amount,sfsf,back_demo,isnull((select sum(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_code=a.back_code),0) yb_amount,dbo.getbtfhgz(qt_amount) btfhgz,qt_amount from backlist a where note_type='BT' and back_sts='2' and sfsf!='运费' and agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' ) x where (back_amount-yb_amount)>0
SELECT YHZ, YHZMC,STS, ZS FROM TJ_SYS_YHZ
select JH_ID,SPBM,SPMC,PSID,SL,jldw,yqwcrq from JHD_MX where isJA='F'
select distinct print_code,print_name from warehouse_list where print_code='@@WARE_CODE,'
select AGENT_NAME,Agent_address,agent_tel, from agent_list where agent_code='@@AGENT,'

select '你的订单于'+convert(varchar,datepart(month,getdate()))+'/'+convert(varchar,datepart(day,getdate()))+'号已发货，' +b.exp_name+Exp_tel+'，共' +convert(varchar,X_HJ)+'件，'+case sign(len(tydh)) when 1 then ' 单号：'+tydh else '' end +'， 运费：' +convert(varchar,YF)+'元，请第一时间检查货物是否有问题。' TYMS from tyinfo a,backlist b ,exp_list c where a.back_code=b.back_code and b.exp_name=c.exp_name and a.back_code='@@Back_Code,'
select a.AGENT_CODE,AGENT_NAME,Agent_Level,domain_man,a.id code from tjd_kh a, agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.AGENT_CODE and ID='@@ID,'
select AGENT_CODE,AGENT_NAME,Agent_Level,domain_man,'@@ID,' code from agent_list where agent_code in (@@d_Cust_Id,)

select back_code,x1,x2,x3,x4,x_hj,yf,tydh,tyms,case sign(x1) when 1 then convert(varchar,x1)+'个组件箱 ' else '' end +case sign(x2) when 1 then convert(varchar,x2)+'个模块箱 ' else '' end +case sign(x3) when 1 then convert(varchar,x3)+'个龙骨箱 ' else '' end +case sign(x4) when 1 then convert(varchar,x4)+'个其他箱 ' else '' end +'共'+convert(varchar,x_hj)+ '箱' DJMS from tyinfo where back_code='@@BACK_CODE,'

SELECT AGENT_CODE 编码, AGENT_NAME 名称, dbo.getUserChnName(a.domain_man) 区域经理,a.DOMAIN_MAN,kcc_price 单价,AGENT_TYPE,prov 省份, Open_Flag 状态,brand_code 品牌,contact_man 联系人,agent_tel 手机号码,agent_address 店铺地址,yf_xt 模块箱,yf_dqxt 电器箱,yf_jx 角线,yf_lg 龙骨,yf_xs 系数,agent_fax 传真,taf_company,brand_chnname 中文品牌 ,dbo.getdatetime(add_date) 注册日期 ,city 市,dist 区县 ,isnull(prov,'')+isnull(city,'')+isnull(dist,'') 城市,end_date 到期日期 FROM Agent_list a,brand_list b where a.brand_code=b.brand_name and sjbm not in ('-1','00')

sELECT AGENT_CODE 编码, AGENT_NAME 名称, dbo.getUserChnName(a.domain_man) 区域经理,a.DOMAIN_MAN,kcc_price 单价,AGENT_TYPE,prov 省份, Open_Flag 状态,brand_code 品牌,contact_man 联系人,agent_tel 手机号码,agent_address 店铺地址,yf_xt 模块箱,yf_dqxt 电器箱,yf_jx 角线,yf_lg 龙骨,yf_xs 系数,agent_fax 传真,taf_company,brand_chnname 中文品牌 ,dbo.getdatetime(add_date) 注册日期 ,city 市,dist 区县 ,isnull(prov,'')+isnull(city,'')+isnull(dist,'') 城市,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) 到期日期,adh_agentcode FROM Agent_list a,brand_list b where a.brand_code=b.brand_name and sjbm not in ('-1','00')

select JH_ID,SPBM,SPMC,PSID,xhgg,SL,jldw,yqwcrq,dwbm,dwmc,(select SUM(sl) from CKD_MX where convert(varchar,REF_ID)=convert(varchar,a.jh_id)) wls from JHD_MX a,JHD_ZB b where a.id=b.id and isJA='F' and sh='T' and SPBM in (select id from product_list where SERIES_CODE in (@@LS.QXDJ,))

select dbo.getUserChnName(domain_man) domain_man,agent_address,agent_tel,contact_man,isnull(agent_amount,0) agent_amount,dis_amount,dised_amount,brand_code,qyzk,agent_level,0 back_amount,agent_fax,shdzjc from agent_list a where a.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'
select * from tj_sys_yh a,agent_list b where a.dept = b.agent_code and dept='@@AGENT_CODE,'
select Id,product_id,product_code,product_name,fit_len,fit_num,is_round,fit_memo,master_name,pcs_dj from product_fit where master_id='@@ID,'
select 'DJ@@LS.YEAR,@@LS.MONTH,'+ dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) from djq_zb where dbo.getYearMonth(rq) = dbo.getYearMonth(getdate())
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ZY,ZJE,SH,bz,zdr,shr from djq_zb where 1=1
select ID code,XH,SPBM,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,jldw,mfsl,mfje,SL,JE,bz from djd_mx where id='@@ID,'
select '@@ID,' code,id spbm,product_code+''+product_name spmc,product_untl jldw,1 mfsl,'@@ZJE,' mfje,1 sl, '@@ZJE,' je,'' bz from product_list where ID in (@@d_SPBM,)
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ZY,ZJE,SH,bz,zdr,shr from djq_zb where 1=1 and id='@@ID,'

select dbo.getdatestr1(pack_date) 发生日期,rtrim(a.back_code) 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) 类型,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+isnull(a.product_size,'') 名称,a.product_untl 单位,dbo.clearzero(a.fact_num) 订货量,dbo.clearzero(a.Reved_Num) 实发数,dbo.clearzero(a.fact_num-a.Reved_Num) 欠货数,ywy 业务员,substring(b.back_code,7,len(b.back_code)) back_code1,b.brand_code,dbo.getProductStore(product_id) kcsl,a.product_id,a.id,a.product_price,a.back_reason,convert(decimal(12,2),(a.fact_num-a.Reved_Num)*product_price) 欠货金额,agent_code 客户编码 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.BACK_CODE=b.BACK_CODE and issend='欠货' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))

select dbo.clearzero(sum(a.fact_num)) 订货量,dbo.clearzero(sum(a.Reved_Num)) 实发数,dbo.clearzero(sum(a.fact_num-a.Reved_Num)) 欠货数 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.BACK_CODE=b.BACK_CODE and issend='欠货' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))
select agent_code,agent_name,dbs,qhs from v_WaitingSendList where 1=1 and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))

select store_no,a.ID code,a.back_code,PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_SIZE,SERIES_CODE,PRODUCT_UNTL,wait_num back_num,back_reason,product_code+isnull(product_name,'')+isnull(product_untl,'') product_info,right(arr_address,10) shdzjc,taf_sffs,arr_address,agent_code,arr_tel,arr_man,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,issend,right(rtrim(a.back_code),9) short_back_code,product_mj,b.back_demo from dbo.v_WaitingSendDetails_c('@@Agent_Code,') a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code

select DWMC,DWBM,ZSL,shdz,jsr,jsrdh,ID back_code,dbo.getdatetime(bzsj) bzsj,taf_sffs,zje,bz,isnull((select top 1 taf_company from agent_list where agent_code=dwbm),'') taf_company,isjd,ckmc from PHD_ZB where DWBM='@@Agent_Code,' and id not in (select phd_id from tyd_dd)

SELECT ID, PRODUCT_CODE, WAREHOUSE_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_FLOW, PRODUCT_MATE, PRODUCT_FILL, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_NUM, ABS_NUM, PRODUCT_MAN, a.DEMO,a.ware_code FROM warehouse_product a,series_list b,warehouse_list c WHERE a.WARE_CODE=c.WAREHOUSE_CODE and a.product_num-isNull(a.abs_num,0)>0 AND a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE AND a.WARE_CODE in (select warehouse_code from warehouse_list where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,') AND (ID='@@ID,' OR '@@ID,'='%') and (PRODUCT_CODE='@@PRODUCT_CODE,' or '@@PRODUCT_CODE,'='%' or PRODUCT_NAME like '%@@PRODUCT_CODE,%') order by b.Series_name,a.Product_code
select dwbm,dwmc,a.spbm,a.psid,a.spmc,a.xhgg,a.jldw,hssl,lcsl,a.spmc+' '+a.psid+' '+a.xhgg spinfo ,id_rwd code,lcsl-hssl sysl from v_OutMetails a where 1=1

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date) Arr_Date,dbo.clearzero(Back_Num) back_num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,dbo.getUserChnName(Opr_Man) Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,0 outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,'' sc,0 sc_num,case isnull(pos_rev,0) when 0 then '未打印' else '配货中' end ph,brand_code from backList a where Note_Type='XS' and back_sts='0' and agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'

select a.spbm,a.spmc,a.psid,a.jldw,a.sl,jgdj,a.SL*b.jgdj jgf,DWBM,dwmc,a.spmc+' '+a.psid+' '+a.xhgg spinfo from RKD_mx a,JHD_MX b,RKD_ZB c where a.REF_ID=b.jh_id and a.ID=c.ID and PJLX='生产进仓' and SH='T'

select id,product_code product_code,product_name,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) series_name, isnull(product_size,'') product_size,product_color,product_untl,product_price,isnull(reved_num,0) back_num,isnull(reved_amount,0) back_amount,back_reason,back_code,back_type,price_type,check_num,check_num-back_num dif_num,ticket_num,reved_num,store_num,disaccount_price,complete_date,ware_code,reved_num,product_id,fact_num,zk,pxh,fact_amount,pack_memo,pack_num,pack_nums,isnull(type_agent,0) type_agent,type_ls,series_code,product_mj,pcs_dj,issend from backDetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

SELECT ID, b.AGENT_NAME, BILL_NAME, BILL_NO, BILL_BANK, BILL_AMOUNT, LINK_MAN, dbo.getDateTime(BILL_DATE) BILL_DATE1,CREDIT_AMOUNT,LAST_DATE FROM bill_list a,agent_list b WHERE a.SHOP_CODE=b.AGENT_CODE AND a.ID='@@ID,'
select product_code,product_name,product_price,type_sales,sts,demo,ID,combo_index,agent_code,type_bazaar from combo_list where 1=1
select * from backlist where BACK_CODE='XS@@LS.DWDM,'

SELECT ID, PRODUCT_CODE, WAREHOUSE_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_FLOW, PRODUCT_MATE, PRODUCT_FILL, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_NUM, ABS_NUM, PRODUCT_MAN, a.DEMO FROM warehouse_product a,series_list b,warehouse_list c WHERE a.WARE_CODE=c.WAREHOUSE_CODE AND a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.product_num >0 AND (a.PRODUCT_CODE='@@PRODUCT_CODE,' or '@@PRODUCT_CODE,'='%') AND a.WARE_CODE in (select warehouse_code from warehouse_list where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,') AND (ID='@@ID,' OR '@@ID,'='%')
SELECT YHH, YHZ, YHXM, ' ' agent_name, MM, case a.sts when '0' then '正常' else '离职' end NAME, LXFS,a.YHZ,DEPT,a.STS,WareCode,bm,sfz,dz,dh,rzrq,yhjb FROM TJ_SYS_YH a WHERE a.YHH='@@YHH,'
select PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME,product_price from mycombo_list where comboid='@@ComboId,'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, b.SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, ISZX, product_mj, zxyh , PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_PRICE,a.DEMO,ID,a.SERIES_CODE,PRICE_TYPE,a.STS,a.LOWER_NUM,a.SPEC_PRICE,a.TYPE_AGENT,a.TYPE_SALES,a.TYPE_BAZAAR,a.WARE_CODE,PRICE_TYPE,PACK_NUM,PACK_TYPE,PRODUCT_TXM,agent_code,xl_code,cgzq,qdl,cbkcl,ispublic,cbjj,product_attr,store_no,pcs_dj,workhours,techcode,(select count(*) from product_list_xgjl where product_id=a.id) xgcs FROM product_list_xgjl a,Series_list b where a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.product_ID='@@ID,'

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 日期,back_code 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) 客户名称,jsdh 结算单号,ywy 业务员,back_demo 备注,back_num 数量,back_amount 金额,taf_amount 代垫运费,a.agent_code 客户编号,dbo.getNoteTypeHtml(note_type) 单据类型,note_type,agent_amount 账上余额,case sign(back_amount-agent_amount) when 0 then '' when -1 then '' else 'red' end color_flag,case agent_amount when 0 then 'hidden' else 'visible' end vis_flag, sign(agent_amount-back_amount-taf_amount+tis_amount) kk_flag,dbo.getSts(back_sts) back_st,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) sjbm,tis_amount,back_demo,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0) kk_amount,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0)-agent_amount ysk11,case sign(agent_amount-back_amount-taf_amount+tis_amount) when -1 then '强行发货' else '发货' end FH,back_num fhc,case back_type when '2' then 'disabled' else '' end isShowD,b.brand_code,arr_address,sfsf,(select sum(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_code=a.back_code) yfh,qt_amount,dbo.getBTFHGZ(qt_amount) bttfgz from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select Back_Code 单据号,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) 客户名称,dbo.getDatestr1(sh_Date) 日期,dbo.getdatestr1(arr_date) Arr_Date,dbo.clearzero(Back_Num) back_num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,'' outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,back_amount,brand_code,tis_amount 返点金额,taf_amount 代垫运费,dbo.getDatestr1(end_Date) 发货日期 from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select * from tj_sys_mj where kjm='@@KJM,'

select t.fid, t.userid, t.ftitle, t.lastretime fbrq, t.fhits, t.fanswers, t.bid, fcontent fcontent, t.ip, t.face, t.closed, t.name, t.reid from tj_sys_bbs t where isNull(t.reid,0)=0 and ftitle like '%@@content,%' order by LASTRETIME desc
SELECT * from V_Agent_ware where (AGENT_CODE='@@AGENTCODE,' OR '@@AGENTCODE,'='%') AND (PRODUCT_CODE='@@PRODUCT_CODE,' or '@@PRODUCT_CODE,'='%')

select sum(back_num) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(agent_amount) agent_amount,sum(back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0)-agent_amount) ysk,sum(tis_amount) tis_amount,sum(taf_amount) taf_amount from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select dbo.getdatestr1(sh_date) 发生日期,rtrim(a.back_code) 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) 类型,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+a.product_size 名称,a.product_untl 单位,dbo.clearzero(a.back_num) 数量,a.product_price 折后价,a.back_amount 金额,b.note_type ,dbo.getNoteTypeHTML(b.note_type) note_typehtml,a.disaccount_price 单价,ywy 业务员,sfsf 托运单号,substring(b.back_code,7,len(b.back_code)) back_code1,b.brand_code,a.fact_num,a.back_reason from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select * from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and series_code='880'
select dbo.clearzero(sum(a.back_num)) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and agent_code ='@@LS.DWDM,'
SELECT id,sts_demo,a.order_sts FROM ORDER_FLOW a,order_sts b WHERE a.order_sts=b.order_sts and ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,'
select * from TJ_SYS_YH where YHH='@@YHH,' and mm='@@PASSWORD,'

SELECT AGENT_CODE, AGENT_NAME, dbo.getUserChnName(a.DOMAIN_MAN) YHXM,a.DOMAIN_MAN,'' AGENT_TYPE_NAME,AGENT_TYPE,AGENT_PING,Agent_Address,Agent_Tel,Contact_man,Sjbm,Open_Flag,agent_fax,Dis_Amount,Agent_Mobile1,Agent_Mobile2,brand_code,agent_tel1,agent_qq,yf_xt,yf_jx,yf_lg,yf_xs,yf_dqxt,qyzk,agent_level,dbo.getdatestr1(join_date) join_date,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) end_date,is330KH,shdzjc,taf_company,agent_area,auth_amount,isaddtaf,icbc_account,agent_starlevel,kcc_price,adh_agentcode FROM Agent_list a WHERE AGENT_CODE='@@AGENT_CODE,'
SELECT agent_code,agent_name,agent_address,agent_tel,contact_man,end_date,printdz FROM Agent_list a WHERE AGENT_CODE='@@Agent_Code,'

select Brand_Name,Brand_ChnName,isnull(Brand_URL,'') brand_url,isnull(Brand_ImageURL,'') brand_imageurl,isnull(adh_agentcode,'') adh_agentcode from Brand_List a,agent_list b where a.Brand_Name=b.Brand_Code and AGENT_CODE='@@Agent_Code,'
select SPEC_PRICE from product_spec where product_code='@@PRODUCT_CODE,'

SELECT ID, PRODUCT_CODE, ' ' WAREHOUSE_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_FLOW, PRODUCT_MATE, PRODUCT_FILL, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_NUM, ABS_NUM, PRODUCT_MAN, a.DEMO FROM warehouse_product a,series_list b WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.Ware_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select '@@ID,' code,djq_id spbm,'代金券' sccj,zy+'(有效期:@@d_SSSJ1, 到 @@d_SSSJ2,)' spmc,'' xhgg,'份' jldw,zje dj,'' ysmc,1 sl,zje je, '@@d_SSSJ1,' sssj1,'@@d_SSSJ2,' sssj2,id psid from djq_zb where djq_id in (@@d_Djq_Id,)
select psid,spmc,SL-ysy sl,DJ,(SL-ysy)*dj JE,sssj1,sssj2,ff_id,bz,spbm,djq_src from v_djq where (sl-ysy)>0 and GETDATE() between sssj1+' 00:00:00' and sssj2+' 23:59:59' and DWBM='@@Agent_Code,'
select SPBM,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,MFSL,MFJE,je,a.bz,'' sl,'@@Back_Code,' back_code,'@@FF_Id,' ff_id,djq_id from DJd_mx a,DJQ_ZB b where a.ID=b.id and b.DJQ_ID='@@ID,'

SELECT ID, b.AGENT_NAME, BILL_NAME, BILL_NO, BILL_BANK, BILL_AMOUNT, LINK_MAN, dbo.getDateTime(BILL_DATE) BILL_DATE1,CREDIT_AMOUNT,LAST_DATE FROM bill_list a,agent_list b WHERE a.SHOP_CODE=b.AGENT_CODE

select isnull((select SUM(back_amount) tj_amount from backdetails where price_type='不返利' and back_code='@@Back_Code,'),0) tj_amount,isnull((select SUM(back_amount) zj_amount from backdetails where price_type!='不返利' and back_code='@@Back_Code,'),0) zj_amount

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, '' SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, '' ISZX, '' product_mj, '' zxyh , PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_PRICE,a.product_mEMO,ID,a.SERIES_CODE,'' PRICE_TYPE, '' STS,a.LOWER_NUM,'' SPEC_PRICE,'' TYPE_AGENT,a.TYPE_SALES,'' TYPE_BAZAAR,'' WARE_CODE,'' PRICE_TYPE,PACK_NUM,PACK_TYPE,PRODUCT_TXM,brand_code agent_code,xl_code,'' cgzq,'' qdl,'' cbkcl,'' ispublic,'' cbjj,'' product_attr,'' store_no,'' pcs_dj,'' workhours,'' techcode,0 xgcs,'' cpid FROM import_kcdtb_brand a where ID='@@ID,'
select SPMC,XHGG,JLDW,ASS_NUM,DJ,XH,LB,SPBM,PSID from ASS_MX_TH where ass_sjbm='@@ass_code,'

select spbm,psid,ysmc,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dbo.getdatestr1(rq) rq,yqwcrq,a.id,jh_id,(select SUM(sl) from CKD_MX where convert(varchar,REF_ID)=convert(varchar,jh_id)) wls,isnull((select sum(sl) from rkd_mx a,RKD_ZB b where a.id=b.id and b.pjlx='生产进仓' and sh='T' and ref_id=convert(varchar,jh_id)),0) rk_zsl from jhd_zb a,jhd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='T' and isJA='F' and spbm in (select id from product_list where series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,))

select a.product_id spbm,product_code psid,'' ysmc,product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,a.back_num sl,'' rq,a.back_code id,a.id cg_id,right(a.BACK_CODE,9) s_id, isnull(rks,0) rks,a.agent_code from v_ydhs a,kc_kcdtb b where a.agent_code='@@DWBM,' and a.agent_code=b.agent_code and a.product_id=b.product_id and (back_num-ISNULL(rks,0))>0

select b.id,product_name,product_size,product_untl,dbo.clearzero(product_num) product_num,a.ORDER_CODE,Arr_Man+'<'+arr_tel+'>'+'('+arr_address+arr_address_detail+')' 客户名称 from orderlist a,orderproduct b where a.ORDER_CODE=b.order_code and a.agent_code='@@DWBM,' and dh_sts not in ('已送货','已安装')

select '@@ID,' code,id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,product_price yj, product_price dj, product_price je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id from product_list where id in (@@d_SPBM,)
select Brand_Name,Brand_ChnName,isnull(Brand_URL,'') brand_url,isnull(Brand_ImageURL,'') brand_imageurl,'' adh_agentcode from Brand_List a where brand_name='@@Brand_Code,'

select ORDER_CODE,Arr_Man,dbo.getdatestr1(Order_DATE) order_date,Arr_Tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,ht_bz, order_amount,convert(decimal(18,2),isnull((select SUM(product_num*type_sales) from OrderProduct where order_code=a.order_code),0)) type_mount,YWY,ywy_tel,isnull(printhits,0) printhits,isnull(dgy,'无') dgy,isnull(sjs,'无') sjs,isnull(cl_man,'无') cl_man,agent_address,agent_tel from OrderList a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and ORDER_CODE='@@ID,'

select ORDER_CODE,Arr_Man,dbo.getdatestr1(track_DATE) order_date,Arr_Tel,arr_address arr_address,srv_memo ht_bz, track_amount order_amount,convert(decimal(18,2),isnull((select SUM(product_num*type_sales) from OrderProduct where order_code=a.order_code),0)) type_mount,YWY,ywy_tel,0 printhits from v_maintenance_list a where track_id='@@Srv_Id,'

select back_code,dbo.getDateTime(back_date),dbo.getAgentName(agent_code),back_num,back_amount,opr_Man,Audit_Man,back_sts,dbo.getSts(back_sts) from backlist where opr_dw='@@LS.DWDM,' and note_type='@@Note_Type,'
row.KJSM: 已处理订单查询(业务员)

row.SQL: select arr_man 业主姓名,arr_tel 电话,arr_address+arr_address_detail 地址,Col_Amount 金额,Col_Memo 备注,YWY 业务员,dbo.getDateTime(col_date) 收款时间,col_sts 状态,dbo.getdatetime(a.end_date) 确认时间,b.order_code 订单编号 from OrderCol a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and AGENT_CODE='@@AGENT_CODE,'

select arr_man 业主姓名,arr_tel 电话,arr_address+arr_address_detail 地址,Col_Amount 金额,Col_Memo 备注,YWY 业务员,dbo.getDateTime(col_date) 收款时间,col_sts 状态,dbo.getdatetime(a.end_date) 确认时间,b.order_code 订单编号 from OrderCol a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and AGENT_CODE='@@AGENT_CODE,'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE 货号 , PRODUCT_NAME 品名,PRODUCT_SIZE 规格,(select series_name from Series_list_z where agent_code=a.Agent_Code and SERIES_CODE=a.SERIES_CODE ) 所属类型, PRODUCT_Untl 单位, dbo.clearzero(PRODUCT_NUM) 库存, dbo.clearzero(isnull(fact_num,0)) 在途数,lower_num 库存警戒线,a.product_id 产品ID,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) 门店编码 ,a.agent_code FROM kc_kcdtb a,v_AbsProductList b where a.product_id*=b.product_id and a.agent_code=b.agent_code
select * from warehouse_list where warehouse_code = '@@AGENTCODE,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) 退货日期,id 单号,ckmc 客户名称,zsl 数量,zje 原价退款,zdr 制单人,shr,bz 备注,zy 摘要,zse 实际退款 ,shrq 审核日期 from rkd_zb a where Note_Type='TR' and shrq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and SH='T'

select dbo.getDateTime(Oper_date) 发生时间,order_code 单据号,product_code 货号,dbo.clearzero(init_num) 上期结存,dbo.clearzero(add_num) 本期入库,dbo.clearzero(minus_num) 本期出库,dbo.clearzero(store_num) 期末存量,oper_demo 业务类别,cd 长度,psid 型号,(select arr_man+arr_tel+arr_address+arr_address_detail from orderlist where ORDER_CODE=a.order_code) 客户名称 from product_account a where product_code='@@PRODUCT_CODE,' and agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' order by oper_date
select sum(add_num),sum(minus_num) from product_account where product_code='@@PRODUCT_CODE,' and agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'

select dbo.getDateTime(Oper_date) 发生时间,order_code 单据号,product_code 货号,init_num 上期结存,add_num 本期入库,minus_num 本期出库,store_num 期末存量,oper_demo 业务类别 from product_account2 where product_code='@@PRODUCT_CODE,' order by oper_date
select sum(add_num),sum(minus_num) from product_account2 where product_code='@@PRODUCT_CODE,'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, '' SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, '' ISZX, '' product_mj, '' zxyh , PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_PRICE,a.product_mEMO,ID,a.SERIES_CODE,'' PRICE_TYPE,a.STS,a.LOWER_NUM,'' SPEC_PRICE,'' TYPE_AGENT,a.TYPE_SALES,'' TYPE_BAZAAR,'' WARE_CODE,'' PRICE_TYPE,PACK_NUM,PACK_TYPE,PRODUCT_TXM,a.agent_code,xl_code,'' cgzq,'' qdl,'' cbkcl,'' ispublic,cbjj,product_attr,'' store_no,pcs_dj,'' workhours,'' techcode,0 xgcs,'' cpid FROM kc_kcdtb a where ID='@@ID,'

select ORDER_CODE,cust_name,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,arr_address,YWY,AZ_DATE,order_amount,col_amount,(order_amount-col_amount) qk_amount from (select ORDER_CODE,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,ywy,ywy_tel,az_date,max(Order_Amount) order_amount,isnull(sum(Col_Amount),0) col_amount,dh_sts from v_OrderList_orderamount a,ordercol b where a.ORDER_CODE=b.OrderCode and order_amount>0 and b.col_sts='已入账' and AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,' group by ORDER_CODE,az_date,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail,ywy,ywy_tel,dh_sts ) x where (order_amount-col_amount)>0

select ID,ORDER_CODE,dbo.getDateTime(ORDER_DATE) ORder_date1,ORDER_MAN,AGENT_CODE,dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE),PRODCUT_NUM,ORDER_AMOUNT,FACT_NUM,FACT_AMOUNT,BILL_AMOUNT,ORDER_STS,ORDER_IDEA,DEMO,ORDER_CN_NAME,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) AGENT_NAME,dbo.getUserChnName(order_man) DOMAIN_NAME,dbo.getDateStr1(END_DATE) End_Date,PACKAGE_NUM,case sign(BILL_AMOUNT-ORDER_AMOUNT) when 1 then 0.0 when -1 then FACT_AMOUNT-BILL_AMOUNT when 0 then 0.0 end NEED_AMOUNT,del_num,del_amount,dbo.getDateTime(del_date) from order_list where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,'

SELECT ORDER_CODE, dbo.getDateTime(ORDER_DATE) Order_Date, ORDER_MAN,AGENT_Code, dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE) Out_Date, PRODCUT_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, ORDER_STS,DEMO,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) AGENT_NAME,FACT_NUM,FACT_AMOUNT,dbo.getDateTime(Order_Idea) Order_Idea,fact_num-Del_Num out_num,fact_amount-Del_Amount out_amount FROM order_list a WHERE ORDER_STS='@@ORDER_STS,'

select '@@ID,' code,id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,'@@SL,' sl,product_price dj,product_color ysmc,series_code lb,'@@ass_sjbm,' ass_sjbm from product_list where id in (@@d_SPBM,)
row.KJSM: 商品添加到可替换的产品

row.SQL: select code,spbm,psid,ysmc,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,rq,yqwcrq,rk_zsl,rk_csl,rkl,jh_id,dwbm,dwmc,isja,shl,isjamc,spmc+' '+psid+' '+xhgg spinfo,ck_sl,ck_bzsl from v_scjdgz where spbm in (select id from product_list where series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,))

select YHXM,YHJB,xzkhs,jdkhs,cjkhs,jrhke,qdhte,lxwke,rzbxs,rzcys,0 yggz,ywy_tel from (select ywy_tel,SUM(xzkhs) xzkhs,SUM(jdkhs) jdkhs,SUM(cjkhs) cjkhs,SUM(jrhke) jrhke,SUM(qdhte) qdhte,SUM(lxwke) lxwke,SUM(rzbxs) rzbxs,SUM(rzcys) rzcys from dbo.v_ygyjb('@@date1,','@@date2,') where agent_code='@@agent_code,' group by ywy_tel) a,tj_sys_yh b where b.lxfs*=a.ywy_tel and b.dept='@@agent_code,'

select order_code,order_date,order_cn_name,agent_name,prodcut_num,b.sts_demo,order_amount,bill_amount ,order_idea,domain_name from order_list a,order_sts b where a.order_sts=b.order_sts --and (a.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,') or a.order_man='@@LS.YHDM,') and (order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' or '@@ORDER_CODE,'='%')
SELECT count(*) FROM order_list a WHERE agent_code in(select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,') and ORDER_STS in ('3','54')

select a.id,a.product_id,a.product_code,a.product_name,a.product_size,a.product_untl,a.product_price,a.product_num,a.product_amount,a.product_image,order_code,product_mj,order_memo,ysl,a.type_sales,a.product_num*a.type_sales sales_amount,b.product_num kcsl,(a.product_num-ysl) qh_num from orderproduct a,kc_kcdtb b where a.product_id=b.product_id and b.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and order_code='@@ID,' and (a.product_num-ysl)>0

select a.id,a.product_id,a.product_code,a.product_name,a.product_size,a.product_untl,a.product_price,a.product_num,a.product_amount,a.product_image,order_code,product_mj,order_memo,ysl,a.type_sales,a.product_num*a.type_sales sales_amount,b.product_num kcsl,a.product_num*a.cost_price cost_amount,a.cost_price from orderproduct a,kc_kcdtb b where a.product_id=b.product_id and b.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and order_code='@@ID,'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE 货号 , PRODUCT_NAME 品名,b.SERIES_NAME 所属系列, PRODUCT_SIZE 规格, PRODUCT_COLOR 颜色, PRODUCT_Untl 单位, PRODUCT_NUM 库存, ABS_NUM 分配数,product_price 出厂价,product_num*product_price 金额,case sign(product_num-lower_num) when 1 then ' ' when 0 then ' ' when -1 then 'style=''color: #FF0000''' end 报警标识,bad_num 二等品数,a.DEMO 备注,bad_num*round(product_price*0.6,0) 二等品金额,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) 仓库 FROM product_list a,series_list b WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and product_num!=0

select Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(tzshrq) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end ismeter,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,opr_dw,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then 25-datediff(dd,groom_date,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getJLAZDate(yqazsj,ORDER_STS,az_date) jl_day ,djje,dh_sts,fph,sex,isattent,qh_sts,isnull((select SUM(product_num*cost_price) from OrderProduct where order_code=a.order_code),0) sales_amount from orderList a where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and qh_sts='@@Sts,'
select pack_num,box_num,att_num,fit_demo,warehouse_name from fit_list a,warehouse_list b where a.ware_code=b.warehouse_code and order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,'

select arr_man 业主姓名,arr_tel 电话,arr_address+arr_address_detail 地址,order_amount 合同金额,sum(Col_Amount) 回款金额,case sign(order_amount-sum(col_amount)) when -1 then 0 else order_amount-sum(col_amount) end 欠款,YWY 业务员,b.order_code 订单编号 from OrderCol a,v_OrderList_orderamount b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and AGENT_CODE='@@AGENT_CODE,' and col_sts='已入账'
select sum(fact_num) from order_product_list b where b.order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,'
SELECT count(*),sum(PRODUCT_NUM), sum(ABS_NUM) ,sum(product_num*product_price),sum(bad_num) FROM product_list a,series_list b WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and product_num != 0
select a.AGENT_CODE,agent_name,back_code,Arr_Address,Arr_Tel,Arr_Man,back_amount from backlist a,agent_list b where a.AGENT_CODE=b.agent_code and BACK_CODE='@@BACK_CODE,'
select sum(prodcut_num),sum(fact_num),sum(order_amount),sum(fact_amount),sum(del_num),sum(del_amount) from order_list a,order_sts b where a.order_sts=b.order_sts
SELECT sum(ORDER_NUM), sum(ORDER_AMOUNT) FROM order_product_list a,Series_list b WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE AND SHOP_MAN='@@LS.YHDM,' AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,'

SELECT a.ID, a.PRODUCT_CODE, a.ORDER_CODE, a.PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_NAME, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,a.PRODUCT_UNTL,a.PRODUCT_PRICE,a.ORDER_NUM order_num, a.ORDER_AMOUNT order_amount, a.PRODUCT_NUM, SHOP_MAN, a.DEMO,case PRICE_KIND when '1' then '特价' when '0' then '' end PRICE_KIND1,pack_num,pack_type,pricetype_name FROM order_product_list a,Series_list b,Price_Type c WHERE SHOP_MAN='@@LS.YHDM,' AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,' AND a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.price_type=c.pricetype_id

select order_code,dbo.getDateTime(order_date) order_date1,order_cn_name,agent_name,prodcut_num,fact_num,b.sts_demo,order_amount,fact_amount,dbo.getDateStr1(out_date),domain_name from order_list a,order_sts b where a.order_sts in ('14','24') and a.order_sts=b.order_sts and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
SELECT count(*) FROM order_product_list a WHERE SHOP_MAN='@@LS.YHDM,' AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,'
SELECT count(*) FROM order_product_list a WHERE SHOP_MAN='@@LS.YHDM,' AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,' and order_num=0
select '@@ID,' code,'@@Series_Code,' spbm,'类型' sccj,'@@Series_Name,' spmc,'' xhgg,'类' jldw,'0' dj,'' ysmc,1 sl,'0' je, '' sssj1,'' sssj2,'' psid,'' zsje,'' zsbl

select sum(a.enter_num),sum(a.enter_num*product_price),sum(enter_num*type_agent),sum(enter_num*type_sales) from product_account a,product_list b where a.product_code=b.product_code and oper_Demo in ('条码入库','入库')

select order_code,dbo.getDateTime(order_date) order_date1,order_cn_name,agent_name,prodcut_num,fact_num,b.sts_demo,order_amount,fact_amount,out_date,domain_name from order_list a,order_sts b where a.order_sts=b.order_sts and a.order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and a.order_sts='5'
row.MSJTS: 没找到你要冲红的订单!

row.SQL: SELECT ORDER_CODE, dbo.getDateTime(del_DATE), ORDER_MAN,a. AGENT_Code, dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE), PRODCUT_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, ORDER_STS, ORDER_IDEA, a.DEMO,ORDER_CN_NAME,AGENT_NAME,FACT_NUM,FACT_AMOUNT,del_num,del_amount FROM order_list a WHERE agent_code in(select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,') and DEL_STS='0' order by order_date

SELECT ORDER_CODE, dbo.getDateTime(DEL_DATE) order_date1, ORDER_MAN,a. AGENT_Code, dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE), PRODCUT_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, ORDER_STS, ORDER_IDEA, a.DEMO,ORDER_CN_NAME,AGENT_NAME,FACT_NUM,FACT_AMOUNT,OUT_DATE,DOMAIN_NAME,del_num,del_amount FROM order_list a WHERE DEL_STS='1' order by DEL_DATE

SELECT a.ID, a.PRODUCT_CODE, a.ORDER_CODE, a.PRODUCT_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,a.PRODUCT_UNTL,a.PRODUCT_PRICE,a.ORDER_NUM, a.ORDER_AMOUNT, c.PRODUCT_NUM-c.abs_num num, SHOP_MAN, a.DEMO,a.FACT_NUM,a.fact_AMOUNT,d.Pricetype_name,a.PACK_NUM,a.PACK_TYPE,case a.PRICE_KIND when '1' then '特价' when '0' then '' end price_kind1,c.ware_code,a.pack_code,a.box_code,a.att_code,case sign((c.PRODUCT_NUM-c.abs_num) -a.FACT_NUM) when 1 then '' when -1 then '不足' when 0 then '' end PRODUCT_TRIP,package_demo,del_num,del_amount FROM order_product_list a,Series_list b,product_list c,Price_type d WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.product_code=c.product_code and a.fact_num !=0 and a.price_type=d.pricetype_id and del_num is not null and del_num!=0 AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,'

select order_code,dbo.getDateTime(del_date) order_date1,order_cn_name,agent_name,prodcut_num,fact_num,order_amount,fact_amount,out_date,domain_name,del_num,del_amount from order_list a where del_sts='3'

select order_code,dbo.getDateTime(del_date) order_date1,order_cn_name,agent_name,prodcut_num,fact_num,order_amount,fact_amount,dbo.getDateStr1(out_date),del_num,del_amount from order_list a where del_sts='3' and a.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,')

SELECT a.ID, a.PRODUCT_CODE, a.ORDER_CODE, a.PRODUCT_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,a.PRODUCT_UNTL,a.PRODUCT_PRICE,a.ORDER_NUM, a.ORDER_AMOUNT, c.PRODUCT_NUM-c.abs_num num, SHOP_MAN, a.DEMO,a.FACT_NUM,a.fact_AMOUNT,d.Pricetype_name,a.PACK_NUM,a.PACK_TYPE,case a.PRICE_KIND when '1' then '特价' when '0' then '' end price_kind1,c.ware_code,a.pack_code,a.box_code,a.att_code,case sign((c.PRODUCT_NUM-c.abs_num) -a.FACT_NUM) when 1 then '' when -1 then '不足' when 0 then '' end PRODUCT_TRIP,package_demo,a.del_num,a.del_amount FROM order_product_list a,Series_list b,product_list c,Price_type d WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.product_code=c.product_code and a.price_type=d.pricetype_id AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE, ' and a.del_num!=0 and a.del_num is not null

SELECT d.pricetype_name,sum(a.del_num),sum(a.del_amount) FROM order_product_list a,Series_list b,Price_type d WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.fact_num !=0 and a.price_type=d.pricetype_id and del_num is not null and del_num!=0 AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE, ' group by d.pricetype_name

SELECT a.ID, '附加品 ', a.ORDER_CODE, a.PRODUCT_NAME, a.order_AMOUNT, a.DEMO,a.fact_AMOUNT,a.del_amount FROM order_product_list a WHERE a.ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,' and a.product_code is null and del_amount is not null

SELECT ORDER_CODE, dbo.getDateTime(DEL_DATE) order_date1, ORDER_MAN,a. AGENT_Code, dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE), PRODCUT_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, ORDER_STS, ORDER_IDEA, a.DEMO,ORDER_CN_NAME,AGENT_NAME,FACT_NUM,FACT_AMOUNT,OUT_DATE,DOMAIN_NAME,del_num,del_amount FROM order_list a WHERE DEL_STS='2' order by DEL_DATE

SELECT a.ID, a.PRODUCT_CODE, a.ORDER_CODE, a.PRODUCT_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,a.PRODUCT_UNTL,a.PRODUCT_PRICE,a.ORDER_NUM, a.ORDER_AMOUNT, c.PRODUCT_NUM-c.abs_num num, SHOP_MAN, a.DEMO,a.FACT_NUM,a.fact_AMOUNT,d.Pricetype_name,a.PACK_NUM,a.PACK_TYPE,case a.PRICE_KIND when '1' then '特价' when '0' then '' end price_kind1,c.ware_code,a.pack_code,a.box_code,a.att_code,case sign((c.PRODUCT_NUM-c.abs_num) -a.FACT_NUM) when 1 then '' when -1 then '不足' when 0 then '' end PRODUCT_TRIP,package_demo,del_num,del_amount,fact_num-isnull(del_num,0) rel_num,fact_amount-isnull(del_amount,0) rel_amount,c.product_color FROM order_product_list a,Series_list b,product_list c,Price_type d WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.product_code=c.product_code and a.fact_num !=0 and a.price_type=d.pricetype_id AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE, '

SELECT sum(isnull(pack_code,0)),sum(isnull(box_code,0)),sum(isnull(att_code,0)),sum(isnull(fact_num,0)),sum(isnull(del_num,0)),sum(isnull(out_num,0)) FROM order_product_list a WHERE a.ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,'

SELECT a.ID, a.PRODUCT_CODE, a.ORDER_CODE, a.PRODUCT_NAME, b.SERIES_NAME, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,a.PRODUCT_UNTL,a.PRODUCT_PRICE,a.ORDER_NUM, a.ORDER_AMOUNT, c.PRODUCT_NUM-c.abs_num num, SHOP_MAN, a.DEMO,a.FACT_NUM,a.fact_AMOUNT,d.Pricetype_name,a.PACK_NUM,a.PACK_TYPE,case a.PRICE_KIND when '1' then '特价' when '0' then '' end price_kind1,c.ware_code,a.pack_code,a.box_code,a.att_code,case sign((c.PRODUCT_NUM-c.abs_num) -a.FACT_NUM) when 1 then '' when -1 then '不足' when 0 then '' end PRODUCT_TRIP,package_demo,del_num,del_amount,fact_num-isnull(del_num,0) rel_num,isnull(out_num,0)*a.product_price rel_amount,c.product_color FROM order_product_list a,Series_list b,product_list c,Price_type d WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.product_code=c.product_code and a.fact_num !=0 and a.fact_num-isnull(a.del_num,0) !=0 and a.price_type=d.pricetype_id AND ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE, '
select dz_id,shdzjc,shdz,jsr,jsrdh,isdefault from bm_shdz where dwbm='@@Agent_Code,'

select upper('@@LS.DWDM,')+dbo.getDateStr(getdate())+case len(cast(count(*) as varchar)) when 1 then '00'+cast(count(*) as varchar) when 2 then '0'+cast(count(*) as varchar) when 3 then cast(count(*) as varchar) end from order_list where dbo.getDateStr1(order_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())

select product_code 货号,product_name 品名,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) 所属系列,product_size 规格,product_color 颜色,product_untl 单位,a.fact_num-isnull(a.del_num,0) 数量, product_price 单价,a.fact_num*a.product_price-isnull(a.del_num,0)*product_price 金额,a.order_code 订单号,dbo.getdatestr1(b.end_date) 销售日期,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) 客户名称 from order_product_list a,order_list b where a.order_code=b.order_code and b.order_sts='5' and b.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,')

select sum(a.fact_num-isnull(a.del_num,0)) num,sum(a.fact_num*a.product_price-isnull(a.del_num,0)*product_price) amount from order_product_list a,order_list b where a.order_code=b.order_code and b.order_sts='5' and b.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,')

select '@@Note_Type,@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(back_code,3))+1,0)) from backList where dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate()) and note_type='@@Note_Type,' and back_code like '@@Note_Type,%' and len(back_code)>11
select * from backlist where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select Back_Code,b.Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num from backList a,agent_List b where a.Agent_Code= b.Agent_Code and back_sts='@@BackSts,' and Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and Opr_Dw='@@LS.DWDM,'

select Product_Code,Product_Name,Product_Color,Product_Size,Product_Untl,Product_Price,Back_Num,Back_Amount,Back_Reason,Back_Code,case back_type when '1' then '正品' else '二等品' end back_type from backDetails where back_Code = '@@BACK_CODE,'
select isNull(sum(Back_Num),0) from backDetails where Opr_Man='@@LS.YHDM,' and Back_Code=' '

select Back_Code, dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date),Back_Demo,Agent_Code,Back_Num, Opr_Man,Audit_Man,Note_Type,Back_Amount,dbo.l2u(Back_Amount,0),Back_Sts,sfsf,ywy,jsdh,dbo.getAgentName(Opr_Dw) Opr_Dw,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,Dis_Amount,Dised_Amount,Tis_Amount,Account_Amount,Taf_Amount,Back_Amount+Taf_Amount+qt_amount-Account_Amount-Tis_Amount-gg_amount-cx_amount-tj_amount-cd_amount Accounting_Amount,isnull(pos_rev,0) pos_rev,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0) kk_amount,Brand_Code,gg_amount,cx_amount,tj_amount,cd_amount,qt_amount,qyzk,sfsf bz,djlx,exp_name,arr_fax,dbo.getdatestr1(pack_date) pack_date,pack_man,ph_man,isnull(lgjy,0) lgjy,isnull(pro_amount,0) pro_amount,isnull(wl_amount,0) wl_amount,back_image,taf_sffs from backList where Back_Code='@@BACK_CODE,'

select Back_Code,b.Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num,case Back_Type when '1' then '正品退货' else '二等品退货' end Back_TypeDemo,Back_Type from backList a,agent_List b where a.Agent_Code= b.Agent_Code and back_sts='0' and Back_Code like '@@LS.DWDM,%'
row.KJSM: T:打回退货单可修改列表

row.SQL: select id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,back_reason,back_code,case back_type when '1' then '正品' else '二等品' end back_type from backDetails where back_code='@@BACK_CODE,'
select isNull(sum(Back_Num),0),sum(Back_Amount) from backDetails where Back_Code='@@BACK_CODE,'
row.KJSM: T:编辑的用户退货单明细合计

row.SQL: select b.Product_Code,b.Product_Name,b.Product_Size,product_color,b.Back_Num,b.Product_Price,b.Back_Amount,dbo.getDateStr1(a.Arr_Date),a.Back_Code,case a.Back_Sts when '1' then '正审核' when '2' then '已退货' else '正在修改' end Sts,d.agent_name,b.Back_Reason,case back_type when '1' then '正品退货' else '次品退货' end back_typedemo from backList a,backDetails b,Series_List c,Agent_List d where a.Back_Code=b.Back_Code and b.Series_Code=c.Series_Code and a.Agent_Code = d.Agent_COde
select sum(b.Back_Num),sum(b.Back_Amount) from backList a,backDetails b,Series_List c,Agent_List d where a.Back_Code=b.Back_Code and b.Series_Code=c.Series_Code and a.Agent_Code = d.Agent_COde

select b.Product_Code,b.Product_Name,b.Product_Size,product_color,b.Back_Num,dbo.getDateStr1(a.Arr_Date),a.Back_Code,d.agent_name ,case a.Back_Sts when '1' then '正审核' when '2' then '已退货' else '正在修改' end Sts,b.Back_Reason,'' back_typedemo from backList a,backDetails b,Series_List c,Agent_List d where a.Back_Code=b.Back_Code and b.Series_Code=c.Series_Code and a.Agent_Code = d.Agent_COde and a.Back_Code like '@@LS.DWDM,%'

select b.Product_Code,b.Product_Name,b.Product_Size,product_color,b.Back_Num,b.Product_Price,b.Back_Amount,dbo.getDateStr1(a.Arr_Date),a.Back_Code,d.agent_name,case a.Back_Sts when '1' then '正审核' when '2' then '已退货' else '正在修改' end Sts,b.Back_Reason,'' back_typedemo from backList a,backDetails b,Series_List c,Agent_List d where a.Back_Code=b.Back_Code and b.Series_Code=c.Series_Code and a.Agent_Code = d.Agent_COde
select ID,Product_Code,Product_Name,Product_Size,' ',Back_Num,Product_Untl,Back_Reason,Product_Color from backDetails where Id ='@@Id,'
select Back_Code,b.Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num from backList a,agent_List b where a.Agent_Code= b.Agent_Code and back_sts='1' and Note_Type='0'
select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num,Opr_Man,Audit_Man from backList where back_sts='0' and Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'
select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num,Opr_Man,Audit_Man from backList where back_sts='1' and Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'
select agent_amount,fact_amount,abs_amount from v_agent_list where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'
select agent_amount,fact_amount,abs_amount from v_agent_list_cw where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'

SELECT ORDER_CODE, dbo.getDateTime(ORDER_DATE), ORDER_MAN,a. AGENT_Code, dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE), PRODCUT_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, ORDER_STS, ORDER_IDEA, a.DEMO,ORDER_CN_NAME,AGENT_NAME,FACT_NUM,FACT_AMOUNT FROM order_list a WHERE ORDER_STS='@@ORDER_STS,'

SELECT ORDER_CODE, dbo.getDateTime(ORDER_DATE), ORDER_MAN,a. AGENT_Code, dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE), PRODCUT_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, ORDER_STS, ORDER_IDEA, a.DEMO,ORDER_CN_NAME,AGENT_NAME,FACT_NUM,FACT_AMOUNT FROM order_list a WHERE order_code in (select distinct order_code from prepare_txm_list) and order_sts='2'

row.SQL: select rtrim(BOX_CODE),sum(show_num) from prepare_txm_list where ORDER_CODE='@@ORDER_CODE,' and product_txm not like 'X%' group by box_code

select metail_code,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl, xq_sl wl_sl, yqcgrq,a.id code,sup_code,mrp_id,(select mc from sc_bm_wldw where bm=a.sup_code) sup_name,dbo.getdatestr1(b.rq) rq from mrp_mx a,MRP_ZB b where a.id=b.id and not exists (select * from cgd_mx where convert(varchar,ref_id)=convert(varchar,a.mrp_id))
select dwbm agent_code,dwmc agent_name,COUNT(*) dbs from PHD_ZB where id not in (select phd_id from tyd_dd)

select rq,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,psid,sl,rk_sl,dwmc,(rk_sl/sl)*100 cgl,cg_id,case isJA when 'F' then '未结案' else '已结案' end isJA from (select dbo.getdatestr1(rq) rq,spbm,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,isnull((select sum(sl) from rkd_mx where wlcg_id=b.cg_id),0) rk_sl,dwmc,cg_id,isJA from cgd_zb a,cgd_mx b where a.id=b.id
select distinct sup_code from mrp_mx where mrp_id in (@@d_Qg_Id,)
select a.product_txm,a.product_code,show_num,product_num,a.product_name,a.product_size,a.product_untl from check_txm_list a,product_list b where a.product_code = b.product_code
select sum(show_num),sum(product_num) from check_txm_list a,product_list b where a.product_code = b.product_code
select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,a.id,psid,spmc,a.sl from rkd_mx a,rkd_zb b where a.id=b.id and wlcg_id='@@d_Product_Id,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,a.id,psid,spmc,case pjlx when '次品进仓' then 0 else a.sl end zps,case pjlx when '次品进仓' then a.sl else 0 end cps from rkd_mx a,rkd_zb b where a.id=b.id and ref_id='@@ref_id,'
select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,a.id,psid,spmc,a.sl,a.wssl from rkd_mx a,rkd_zb b where a.id=b.id and ref_id='@@d_Product_Id,'

select sum(a.order_num-a.fact_num) num,sum(a.order_num*a.product_price-a.fact_num*product_price) amount from order_product_list a,order_list b,series_list c where a.order_code=b.order_code and a.series_code=c.series_code and b.order_sts='5' and a.order_num>a.fact_num and product_code is not null

SELECT PACK_ID, ORDER_CODE, BOX_CODE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PACK_NUM, PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_TXM, BOX_STS, AppadId, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_NUM, PACK_MAN FROM PACK_LIST where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and BOX_CODE=' ' order by pack_id desc
select sum(product_num),sum(pack_num) from PACK_LIST where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and BOX_CODE=' '
select box_code,sum(pack_num) from PACK_LIST where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and box_code != ' ' group by box_code order by box_code desc
select product_code,product_name,pack_num from pack_list where box_code='@@Box_Code,' order by product_code
select sum(pack_num) pack_num from pack_list where box_code='@@Box_Code,'
select count(*) from order_product_list a,product_list b where a.product_code = b.product_code and b.product_txm='@@PRODUCT_TXM,'

SELECT ID, PRODUCT_CODE, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_FLOW, PRODUCT_MATE, PRODUCT_FILL, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRICE_TYPE, WARE_CODE, DEMO, STS, LOWER_NUM, SPEC_PRICE, ADD_DATE, PRODUCT_NUM, ABS_NUM, TYPE_AGENT, TYPE_SALES, TYPE_BAZAAR, PACK_NUM, PACK_TYPE, PRODUCT_TXM, ' ', BAD_NUM FROM product_list where product_code='@@ProductCode,'
row.KJSM: 产品库存调整，入库，出库(单)

row.SQL: select ass_spbm code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,ass_num sl,dj,psid,ysmc,lb,ass_code,ass_sjbm from ass_mx_th where ass_sjbm='@@ass_sjbm,' order by xh
select '@@ID,' code,id metail_code,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,1 wl_sl from product_list where id in (@@d_SPBM,)
select PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_CODE,ID code,PRODUCT_PRICE,demo from combo_list where STS='启用'
select abs(checksum(newid()))

select dbo.getDateStr1(bt_date) 发生日期,Bt_Type 优惠类型,Bt_Amount 优惠金额,agent_name 客户名称,Back_Code 优惠订单号,DOMAIN_MAN 区域经理,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) 省份 from bt_list a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.AGENT_CODE and sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)
select product_code,product_name,product_color,pack_num,product_untl,box_code,order_code,right(box_code,3) from pack_list where box_code != ' '
select sum(Bt_Amount) 优惠金额 from bt_list a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.AGENT_CODE and sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)

select x.ORDER_CODE,Cust_Name,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,FPH,dh_sts+'-'+isnull(qh_sts,'') dh_sts,dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,yqazsj,product_amount order_amount,djje,YWY,sex,isnull(arr_address,'')+isnull(arr_address_detail,'') arr_address_detail,order_src,'' az_sts,isnull(printhits,0) printhits,dbo.getdatestr1(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) end_date,dbo.getdatestr1(ckrq) ckrq,(select sum(col_amount) from ordercol where ordercode=x.order_code) col_amount,qh_sts,cost_amount,isnull(fee_amount,0) fee_amount,product_amount-cost_amount-ISNULL(fee_amount,0) profits_amount,payoff_amount from v_orderlist_orderamount x,( select a.order_code,SUM(product_amount) product_amount,SUM(cost_amount) cost_amount,SUM(payoff_amount) payoff_amount,(select sum(fee_amount) from orderfee where order_code=a.order_code) fee_amount from v_mlfxb a where a.AGENT_CODE='@@AGENT_CODE,' and order_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:00' group by a.order_code ) y where x.ORDER_CODE=y.order_code
select sum(Product_Num) Product_Num,sum(Product_Amount) Product_Amount from sale_Product_list a,sale_list b where a.Sale_Code=b.Sale_Code and b.is_upload='1'
select Terminal_Code,Product_Code,Product_Txm,Product_Name,Product_Color,Product_Size,Product_Untl,Product_Num from pos_stock where Terminal_Code='@@Pos_Code,'
select sum(Product_Num) Product_Num from pos_stock where Terminal_Code='@@Pos_Code,'

row.CS: group by product_code,product_name,product_untl,product_color,product_size ) a order by a.@@SortCol, @@Sort_Desc,
row.SQL: select top @@SortNum, * from ( select product_code,product_name,product_untl,product_color,product_size,sum(product_num) product_num,sum(sale_amount) sale_amount from v_rise_saleproductlist where 1=1

select count(*) from (select Product_COde,product_num,sum(pack_num) pack_num from pack_list where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and product_code is not null group by product_num,Product_COde ) a where a.pack_num>a.product_num

select a.product_code,a.product_name+case a.demo when '' then '' else '('+a.demo+')' end product_name,a.product_size,a.product_color,a.product_untl,a.product_price,d.pack_num rel_num,d.pack_num*a.product_price rel_amount,b.Pricetype_name,right(d.box_code,3)+'#' package_demo,a.order_code,agent_name,dbo.getdatestr1(out_date) out_date from order_product_list a,price_type b,order_list c,pack_list d where a.price_type=b.pricetype_id and a.order_code=c.order_code and a.order_code=d.order_code and a.id=d.appadId and a.order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and a.fact_num-isnull(a.del_num,0) !=0 order by d.box_code,a.id

select product_code 货号,product_name 品名,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) 所属系列,product_size 规格,product_color 颜色,product_untl 单位,isnull(a.out_num,0) 数量, product_price 单价,isnull(a.out_num,0)*product_price 金额,a.order_code 订单号,dbo.getdatestr1(b.end_date) 销售日期,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) 客户名称 from order_product_list a,order_list b where a.order_code=b.order_code and b.order_sts='5'
select sum(isnull(a.out_num,0)) num,sum(isnull(a.out_num,0)*product_price) amount from order_product_list a,order_list b where a.order_code=b.order_code and b.order_sts='5'

select metail_code,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl, xq_sl wl_sl, yqcgrq,a.id code,sup_code,mrp_id,(select mc from sc_bm_wldw where bm=a.sup_code) sup_name,dbo.getdatestr1(b.rq) rq from mrp_mx a,MRP_ZB b where a.id=b.id
select agent_code,agent_name from agent_list where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select isnull(max(agent_code),'8000')+1 from agent_list where sjbm!='20' and agent_code like '8%'
SELECT AGENT_CODE, AGENT_NAME, DOMAIN_MAN, SJBM, AGENT_TYPE, AGENT_PING, AGENT_ADDRESS, AGENT_TEL, AGENT_FAX, CONTACT_MAN FROM Agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,'
SELECT AGENT_CODE, AGENT_NAME, DOMAIN_MAN, SJBM, AGENT_TYPE, AGENT_PING, AGENT_ADDRESS, AGENT_TEL, AGENT_FAX, CONTACT_MAN FROM Agent_list where AGENT_CODE='@@AGENT_CODE,'

SELECT a.PRODUCT_CODE, b.SERIES_NAME, a.PRODUCT_NAME, a.PRODUCT_SIZE, a.PRODUCT_COLOR, a.PRODUCT_Untl, a.Cost_PRICE,a.SERIES_CODE,a.PRICE_TYPE,a.product_num,a.Sale_Price,a.Stock_Id FROM a_stock a,Series_list b where a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select Store_ID,Product_Code,Store_Code,Product_Name,Product_Size,Product_Color,Product_Num,Product_Price,Product_Amount,Agent_Code from A_Store_Detail where Store_Code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select sum(Product_Num),sum(Product_Amount) from A_Store_Detail where Store_Code='@@LS.DWDM,'

row.SQL: select isnull(max(Order_Code),'@@LS.DWDM,00000')+1 Order_Code from A_Order_List a,Agent_list b where a.shop_code=b.agent_code and b.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,'

select Order_Code,Order_num,Order_Amount,Shop_Code,Order_Man,dbo.getDateStr1(Order_Date) Order_Date,Order_Memo,Agent_Name,Dest_Address,Rev_Man,Rev_Tel,dbo.getDateStr1(Out_Date) Out_date,Audit_Man from a_order_list a,agent_list b where a.shop_code = b.agent_code and b.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and Order_Sts='0'

select Order_Code,Shop_Code,dbo.getAgentName(Shop_Code) Agent_Name,dbo.getDateStr1(Out_Date) Out_Date,Order_Memo Demo,Order_Sts,Order_Num prodcut_num,order_amount,Order_Num fact_num,order_amount fact_amount,dbo.getDateStr1(order_date) order_date from a_order_list where Order_Code='@@Order_Code,'
select Order_ID,Product_Code,Order_Code,Product_Name,Product_Size,Product_Color,Product_Num,Product_Price,Product_Amount,Shop_Code,Order_Memo from A_Order_Detail where Order_Code='@@Order_Code,'
select sum(Product_Num),sum(Product_Amount) from A_Order_Detail where Order_Code='@@Order_Code,'
select 'TH'+convert(varchar,(isnull(max(right(Return_Code,8)),'@@LS.DWDM,00000')+1)) Return_Code from A_Return_List where Return_Code like 'TH@@LS.DWDM,%'
select Return_ID,Product_Code,Return_Code,Product_Name,Product_Size,Product_Color,Product_Num,Product_Price,Product_Amount,Return_Memo from A_Return_Detail where Return_Code='@@Return_Code,'
select sum(Product_Num),sum(Product_Amount) from A_Return_Detail where Return_Code='@@Return_Code,'
