row.SQL: select Return_Code,dbo.getDateStr1(Order_Date) Return_date,Agent_Name,Order_Man,Audit_Man,Return_Amount,Shop_Code from a_return_list a,Agent_List b where a.Shop_Code=b.Agent_Code and Return_Code like 'TH@@LS.DWDM,%' and Return_Sts='@@Sts,'

select Return_Code,dbo.getDateStr1(Order_Date) Return_date,Agent_Name,Order_Man,Audit_Man,Return_Amount,Shop_Code from a_return_list a,Agent_List b where a.Shop_Code=b.Agent_Code and Return_Code='@@Return_Code,'

select a.return_code,dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_num,product_price,product_amount from a_return_list a,A_return_detail b,Agent_list c where a.return_code=b.return_code and a.shop_code=c.agent_code and c.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and return_sts='1'

select sum(product_num),sum(product_amount) from a_return_list a,A_return_detail b,Agent_list c where a.return_code=b.return_code and a.shop_code=c.agent_code and c.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and return_sts='1'

select a.order_code,dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_num,product_price,product_amount from a_order_list a,A_order_detail b,Agent_list c where a.order_code=b.order_code and a.shop_code=c.agent_code and c.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and a.order_sts='1'
select sum(product_num),sum(product_amount) from a_order_list a,A_order_detail b,Agent_list c where a.order_code=b.order_code and a.shop_code=c.agent_code and c.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and a.order_sts='1'

select a.store_code,dbo.getdatestr1(store_date) order_date,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_num,product_price,product_amount from a_store_list a,A_store_detail b where a.store_code=b.store_code and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select sum(product_num),sum(product_amount) from a_store_list a,A_store_detail b where a.store_code=b.store_code and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_untl,series_name,type_agent,product_price,type_sales from product_list a,series_list b where a.series_code=b.series_code

select a.Product_Code,a.Product_Name,a.Product_Size,a.Product_Color,a.Product_Num, cost_price,a.product_Num*cost_price cost_amount,sale_price,sale_price*a.product_Num sale_amount,isnull(bad_num,0) from A_Stock a where a.Agent_Code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select sum(a.Product_Num),sum(a.product_Num*cost_price) agent_amount,sum(sale_price*a.product_Num) product_amount,sum(isnull(bad_num,0)) from A_Stock a where a.Agent_Code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select order_code, dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_num,back_num,product_price,product_amount,shop_code from ( select a.order_code, order_date,agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_num,' ' back_num,product_price,product_amount,a.shop_code from a_order_list a,A_order_detail b,Agent_list c where a.order_code=b.order_code and a.shop_code=c.agent_code and c.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and a.order_sts='1' union select a.return_code, order_date,agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,'' send_num,product_num,product_price,-product_amount ,shop_code from a_return_list a,A_return_detail b,Agent_list c where a.return_code=b.return_code and a.shop_code=c.agent_code and c.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and return_sts='1') x where 1=1

select sum(product_num),sum(back_num),sum(product_amount) from ( select a.order_code, order_date,agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_num,' ' back_num,product_price,product_amount,a.shop_code from a_order_list a,A_order_detail b,Agent_list c where a.order_code=b.order_code and a.shop_code=c.agent_code and c.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and a.order_sts='1' union select a.return_code, order_date,agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,'' send_num,product_num,product_price,-product_amount ,shop_code from a_return_list a,A_return_detail b,Agent_list c where a.return_code=b.return_code and a.shop_code=c.agent_code and c.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,' and return_sts='1') x where 1=1

select dbo.getdatestr1(sale_date) sale_date,b.agent_name,a.sale_code,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_untl,product_num,sale_amount,sale_discount,'退'+back_code Memo from V_Rise_saleproductlist a,agent_list b where a.pos_code=b.agent_code and b.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,'
select sum(product_num) product_num,sum(sale_amount) sale_amount from V_Rise_saleproductlist a,agent_list b where a.pos_code=b.agent_code and b.sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,'

select b.PRICETYPE_NAME,isnull(product_num,0) product_num,isnull(product_amount,0.00) product_amount from (select price_type, isnull(sum(Product_Num),0) product_num,isnull(sum(product_amount),0.00) product_amount from a_order_detail where order_code='@@ShopCode,' group by price_type) a,Price_type b where a.PRICE_TYPE =* b.PRICETYPE_ID and b.PRICETYPE_ID in ('1','2')
row.KJSM: 发货单按价格类型统计

row.SQL: select b.PRICETYPE_NAME,isnull(product_num,0) product_num,isnull(product_amount,0.00) product_amount from (select price_type, isnull(sum(Product_Num),0) product_num,isnull(sum(product_amount),0.00) product_amount from a_order_detail where order_code='@@ShopCode,' group by price_type) a,Price_type b where a.PRICE_TYPE =* b.PRICETYPE_ID and b.PRICETYPE_ID in ('3','4')
row.KJSM: 发货单按价格类型统计

row.SQL: select Ip_Id,Ip_Owner,Ip_Address,Ip_Mac from Tj_sys_Ip where 1=1
select id code,zy,zje,1 sl,bz,djq_id from djq_zb where SH='T'
select upper('@@Agent_Code,')+dbo.getDateStr(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(order_code,3))+1,0)) from order_list where dbo.getDateStr1(order_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())

select Order_Code,Agent_Code,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) Agent_Name,dbo.getDateStr1(Out_Date) Out_Date,Demo,Order_Sts,prodcut_num,order_amount,fact_num,fact_amount from order_list where Order_Code='@@Order_Code,'

select id,Product_Code,Product_Name+' '+isnull(Product_Color,'') Product_Name,fact_num-out_num Fact_Num from order_product_list where order_code ='@@Order_Code,' and (product_txm is null or product_txm='')
select pack_id,order_code,box_code,product_code,product_name,pack_num,product_txm,appadId,product_num,box_sts from pack_list where box_code='@@Box_Code,'
select product_code,product_name,fact_num-out_num fact_num from order_product_list where order_code='@@Order_Code,' and product_txm='@@Product_Txm,'
select distinct Box_Code,right(Box_Code,3)+'#'+' '+case Box_Sts when '0' then '未封箱' else '' end Box_Name,Box_Sts from pack_list where order_code='@@Order_Code,' order by Box_Code desc
select count(*) from pack_list where order_code='@@Order_Code,' and Box_Sts='0'
select id,product_code,product_name,product_size,fact_num,out_num,Demo,product_size from order_product_list where order_code='@@Order_Code,' order by series_code desc
select sum(del_num) del_num,sum(del_amount) del_amount from order_product_list where order_code='@@Order_Code,'

select id,product_code product_code,product_name+isnull(product_size,'') product_name,dbo.getSeriesName(SERIES_CODE) series_name,product_color,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,back_reason,back_code,back_type,'' price_type,check_num,check_num-back_num dif_num,dbo.getProductStore(product_id) store_num,ticket_num,reved_num,reven_num,disaccount_price,complete_date,ware_code,product_id,fact_num,series_code from backDetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

SELECT ORDER_CODE, dbo.getDateTime(ORDER_DATE) Order_Date, ORDER_MAN,AGENT_Code, dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE) Out_Date, PRODCUT_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, ORDER_STS,DEMO,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) AGENT_NAME,FACT_NUM,FACT_AMOUNT,dbo.getDateTime(Order_Idea) Order_Idea,fact_num-Del_Num out_num,fact_amount-Del_Amount out_amount FROM order_list WHERE agent_code in(select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,') and ORDER_STS in ('2')
select '@@Note_Type,'+dbo.getDateStr(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(back_code,3))+1,0)) from backList where dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select '@@Order_Code,'+dbo.getDataSeq(isNull(max(right(box_code,3))+1,1)) from pack_list where order_code='@@Order_Code,'

select a.back_code,dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) back_date,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,a.back_num,product_price,back_amount from backDetails a,Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='0' and back_sts='2'
select sum(a.back_num),sum(back_amount) from backDetails a,Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='0' and back_sts='2'

select Back_Code,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) Back_Date,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) AgentName,Back_Num,Back_Amount,Opr_Man,Audit_Man,dbo.getSts(back_sts) from backlist where note_type='@@Note_Type,' and (Opr_Dw='@@LS.DWDM,' or Agent_Code='@@LS.DWDM,')

select product_code,product_name,fact_num,product_store from (select product_code,product_name,fact_num,dbo.getProductStore(product_code) product_store from order_product_list where order_code='@@Order_Code,' and product_code is not null) a where a.fact_num>a.product_store

select pricetype_name,isnull(order_num,0) order_num,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount from price_type a, (select price_type,sum(Back_Num) order_num,sum(back_Amount) order_amount from backDetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' group by price_type ) c where a.pricetype_id*=c.price_type

select a.back_code,dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) back_date,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,a.back_num,product_price,back_amount from backDetails a,Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='0' and back_sts='2' and b.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,')

select sum(a.back_num),sum(back_amount) from backDetails a,Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='0' and back_sts='2' and b.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,')
row.KJSM: 总部退货统计(合计业务员)

row.SQL: select datename(yyyy,oper_date)+'-'+ datename(mm,oper_date)+'-'+datename(dd,oper_date) 发生日期 ,order_code 单据号,a.product_code 货号,product_name 品名,product_size 规格,product_color 颜色,product_untl 单位,Add_Num 入库数,Minus_Num 出库数,Store_Num 结存,Oper_Demo 备注 from product_account a,product_list b where a.product_code=b.product_code and oper_demo not in('分配','释放','二等入库','二等出库','二等退货','二等盘点')
select sum(Add_Num) 入库数,sum(Minus_Num) 出库数,sum(Store_Num) 结存 from product_account a,product_list b where a.product_code=b.product_code and oper_demo not in('分配','释放','二等入库','二等出库','二等退货','二等盘点')

select k.product_code 货号,product_name 品名,product_size 规格,product_untl 单位,Init_Num 上期结存,Init_Num*product_price 金额,Add_Num 本期入库,Minus_Num 本期出库,Store_Num 期末存量,store_num*product_price 金额 from (select product_code,isnull(init_num,0) init_num,add_num,minus_num,isnull(init_num,0)+add_num-minus_num store_num from(select product_code,isnull(init_num,(select top 1 init_num from product_account where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and product_code=n.product_Code and init_num is not null and oper_demo in ('分入库','销售') order by oper_date)) init_num,add_num,minus_num from (select product_code,(select top 1 store_num from product_account where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and oper_demo in ('分入库','销售') order by oper_date desc) init_num,add_num,minus_num from ( select product_code,x.add_num,x.minus_num from (select b.product_code,sum(isnull(add_num,0)) add_num,sum(isnull(minus_num,0)) minus_num from product_account a,product_list_view b where a.product_code=*b.product_code and a.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and oper_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and oper_demo in ('分入库','销售') group by b.product_code) x) m) n) y) k,product_list_view o where k.product_code=o.product_code

select sum(Init_Num) 上期结存,sum(Init_Num*product_price) 金额,sum(Add_Num) 本期入库,sum(Minus_Num) 本期出库,sum(Store_Num) 期末存量,sum(store_num*product_price) 金额 from (select product_code,isnull(init_num,0) init_num,add_num,minus_num,isnull(init_num,0)+add_num-minus_num store_num from(select product_code,isnull(init_num,(select top 1 init_num from product_account where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and product_code=n.product_Code and init_num is not null and oper_demo in ('分入库','销售') order by oper_date)) init_num,add_num,minus_num from (select product_code,(select top 1 store_num from product_account where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and oper_demo in ('分入库','销售') order by oper_date desc) init_num,add_num,minus_num from ( select product_code,x.add_num,x.minus_num from (select b.product_code,sum(isnull(add_num,0)) add_num,sum(isnull(minus_num,0)) minus_num from product_account a,product_list_view b where a.product_code=*b.product_code and a.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and oper_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and oper_demo in ('分入库','销售') group by b.product_code) x) m) n) y) k,product_list_view o where k.product_code=o.product_code

select a.back_code,dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) back_date,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,a.back_num,product_price,back_amount,check_num,check_num-a.back_num from backDetails a,Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='6' and back_sts='2'
select sum(a.back_num),sum(check_num) from backDetails a,Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='6' and back_sts='2'

select dbo.getDateStr(back_date) 日期,a.back_code 单据号,jsdh 结算单号,product_code 货号,product_name 品名,product_size 规格,product_untl 单位,a.back_num 数量,product_price 单价,a.back_amount 金额,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) 客户名称,ywy 负责人 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and b.note_type='XS' and back_sts='2' and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select sum(a.back_num),sum(a.back_amount) from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and b.note_type='XS' and back_sts='2' and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select Back_Code,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) Back_Date,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) AgentName,Back_Num,dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date) Arr_Date,Opr_Man,Audit_Man from backlist where note_type='2' and back_sts='2' and agent_code in(select agent_code from agent_list where domain_man='@@LS.YHDM,')

select a.back_code,dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) back_date,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,a.back_num,product_price,back_amount from backDetails a,Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='2' and back_sts='2'
select sum(a.back_num),sum(back_amount) from backDetails a,Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='2' and back_sts='2'
row.KJSM: 总部二等品出货统计(合计)

row.SQL: SELECT ORDER_CODE, dbo.getDateTime(ORDER_DATE) Order_Date, ORDER_MAN,AGENT_Code, dbo.getDateStr1(OUT_DATE) Out_Date, PRODCUT_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, ORDER_STS,DEMO,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) AGENT_NAME,fact_NUM,fact_AMOUNT,dbo.getDateTime(Order_Idea) Order_Idea,fact_num-Del_Num out_num,fact_amount-Del_Amount out_amount FROM order_list a WHERE ORDER_STS='5' and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,' and is_posrev is null

SELECT a.ID, a.PRODUCT_CODE, a.ORDER_CODE, a.PRODUCT_NAME, dbo.getSeriesName(Series_Code) SERIES_NAME, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,a.PRODUCT_UNTL,a.PRODUCT_PRICE,a.DEMO, dbo.getPriceTypeName(price_type) Pricetype_name,fact_num-isnull(del_num,0) out_num,fact_amount-isnull(del_amount,0) out_amount,product_color FROM order_product_list a where order_code='@@Order_Code,'
select '@@Note_Type,@@LS.DWDM,'+dbo.getDateStr(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(order_code,3))+1,1)) from A_order_List where dbo.getDateStr1(order_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
row.KJSM: K:生成片区系统单据单号

row.SQL: select Product_Code,Product_Name,Product_Num-Abs_Num Product_Num,convert(varchar,pack_num)+product_untl+'/'+pack_type product_untl,bad_num from product_List where product_code='@@Product_Code,'
select Product_Code,Product_Name,Product_Num, product_untl from a_stock where product_code='@@Product_Code,' and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select pricetype_name,isnull(order_num,0) order_num,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount from price_type a, (select price_type,sum(product_Num) order_num,sum(product_Amount) order_amount from a_order_detail where order_code='@@Order_Code,' group by price_type ) c where a.pricetype_id*=c.price_type

select Back_Code,b.Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num from a_backList a,agent_List b where a.Agent_Code= b.Agent_Code and back_sts='0' and Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and a.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date),Back_Demo,Agent_Code,Back_Num,Opr_Man,Audit_Man,Note_Type from a_backList where Back_Code='@@Back_Code,'
select '@@Note_Type,@@Agent_Code,'+dbo.getDateStr(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(back_code,3))+1,0)) from a_backList where dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())

select id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,back_reason,back_code,case back_type when '1' then '正品' else '二等品' end back_type,dbo.getPriceTypeName(Price_Type) price_type,check_num,check_num-back_num dif_num from a_backDetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select pricetype_name,isnull(order_num,0) order_num,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount from price_type a, (select price_type,sum(Back_Num) order_num,sum(back_Amount) order_amount from a_backDetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' group by price_type ) c where a.pricetype_id*=c.price_type
row.KJSM: 片区退货按价格类型统计

row.SQL: select '@@Note_Type,'+dbo.getDateStr(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(back_code,3))+1,0)) from a_backList where dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())

select order_code,dbo.getDateTime(order_date) order_date1,dbo.getAgentName(shop_code) agent_name,order_num,order_amount,dbo.getDateStr1(out_date),order_man,audit_man from a_order_list a where order_sts='1' and shop_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')

select back_code,dbo.getDateTime(back_date) order_date1,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,back_num,dbo.getDateStr1(arr_date),opr_man,audit_man from a_backlist a where back_sts='2' and note_type in ('0','7') and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')
select isNull(sum(Back_Num),0),sum(Back_Amount),sum(check_num),sum(check_num-back_num) from a_backDetails where Back_Code='@@Back_Code,'

select id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,back_reason,back_code,case back_type when '1' then '正品' else '二等品' end back_type,check_num,check_num-back_num dif_num from a_backDetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select back_code,dbo.getDateTime(back_date) order_date1,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,back_num,dbo.getDateStr1(arr_date),opr_man,audit_man from a_backlist a where back_sts='2' and note_type='6' and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select store_code back_code,dbo.getDateTime(store_date) order_date1,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,store_num,'',store_man,'' from a_store_list a where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select Store_Code Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Store_Date),Store_Memo,Agent_Code,store_Num,store_Man from a_store_list where Store_Code='@@Store_Code,'

select store_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,'' product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_amount,' ' back_reason,store_code from a_store_detail where store_code='@@Store_Code,'
row.KJSM: K:片区入库单据信息明细

row.SQL: select sum(product_num),sum(product_amount) from a_store_detail where store_code='@@Store_Code,'

select a.product_code 货号,product_name 品名,product_size 规格,product_color 颜色,product_untl 单位,Init_Num 上期结存,store_num 本期入库,order_num 本期出库,Stock_Num 期末存量 from( select product_code,(select init_num from a_product_account where accountid=x.init_id) init_num,x.store_num,x.order_num ,(select stock_num from a_product_account where accountid=x.stock_id) stock_num from (select product_code,max(accountId) stock_id,min(accountId) init_id,sum(isnull(store_num,0)) store_num,sum(isnull(order_num,0)) order_num from a_product_account where oper_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and len(oper_memo)=2 and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,' group by product_code) x) a,product_list b where a.product_code=b.product_code

select sum(Init_Num) 上期结存,sum(Store_Num) 本期入库,sum(Order_Num) 本期出库,sum(Stock_Num) 期末存量 from( select product_code,(select init_num from a_product_account where accountid=x.init_id) init_num,x.store_num,x.order_num ,(select stock_num from a_product_account where accountid=x.stock_id) stock_num from (select product_code,max(accountId) stock_id,min(accountId) init_id,sum(isnull(store_num,0)) store_num,sum(isnull(order_num,0)) order_num from a_product_account where oper_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and len(oper_memo)=2 and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,' group by product_code) x) a

select dbo.getDateStr1(oper_date) 发生日期 ,receipt_code 单据号, a.product_code 货号,product_name 品名,product_size 规格,product_color 颜色,product_untl 单位,store_Num 入库数,cost_price 进货价,store_num*cost_price 金额,sale_price 零售价,store_num*sale_price 金额 from a_product_account a,a_stock b where a.product_code=b.product_code and oper_Memo in ('入库') and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select sum(store_Num) 入库数,sum(store_num*cost_price) 金额,sum(store_num*sale_price) 金额 from a_product_account a,a_stock b where a.product_code=b.product_code and oper_Memo in ('入库') and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select a.back_code,dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) back_date,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) agent_name,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,a.back_num,product_price,back_amount from a_backDetails a,a_Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='0' and back_sts='2' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')

select sum(a.back_num),sum(back_amount) from a_backDetails a,a_Backlist b where a.Back_code=b.back_code and note_type='0' and back_sts='2' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')

select product_code 货号,product_name 品名,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) 所属系列,product_size 规格,product_color 颜色,' ' 单位,product_num 数量, product_price 单价,product_amount 金额,a.order_code 订单号,dbo.getdatestr1(b.order_date) 销售日期,dbo.getAgentName(b.shop_code) 客户名称 from a_order_detail a,a_order_list b where a.order_code=b.order_code and b.order_sts='1' and b.shop_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')

select sum(product_num) 数量,sum(product_amount) 金额 from a_order_detail a,a_order_list b where a.order_code=b.order_code and b.order_sts='1' and b.shop_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')

select Back_Code,b.Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num from backList a,agent_List b where a.Agent_Code= b.Agent_Code and back_sts='2' and Note_Type='0' and pos_rev is null and a.agent_code= '@@LS.DWDM,'
select * from tj_sys_yh where yhh='@@YHH,' and mm='@@PASSWORD_Auth,'

select sale_date 日期, sum(pay_amount) 销售, sum(pay_cashed) 现金, sum(pay_bankcard) POS, sum(pay_voucher) 礼券, sum(wf_Mon) 应收, sum(Credit_Mon) 预存订金, sum(Xf_Mon) 抵扣订金 from ( select sale_date,agent_code,sum(pay_amount) pay_amount,sum(pay_cashed) pay_cashed,sum(pay_bankcard) pay_bankcard,sum(pay_voucher) pay_voucher,sum(wf_Mon) wf_Mon,sum(Credit_Mon) Credit_Mon,sum(Xf_Mon) Xf_Mon from ( select dbo.getDateStr1(sale_date) sale_date, pay_amount, pay_cashed, pay_bankcard, pay_voucher, wf_Mon,0 Credit_Mon,isnull(Credit_Mon,0) Xf_Mon,a.agent_code from sale_list a,bound_list b where b.opr_flag='4' and a.sale_code*=b.oper_man and a.sale_date between '@@SALE_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@SALE_DATE2, 23:59:59' union all select dbo.getDateStr1(bound_date) sale_date, 0 pay_amount, 0 pay_cashed, 0 pay_bankcard, 0 pay_voucher, 0 wf_Mon,Credit_Mon,0 Xf_Mon,agent_code from bound_list where opr_flag='3' and bound_date between '@@SALE_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@SALE_DATE2, 23:59:59' ) x group by x.sale_date,x.agent_code ) f where 1=1

select o.product_code 货号,product_name 品名,product_size 规格,product_color 颜色,product_untl 单位,Init_Num 上期结存,Init_Num*product_price 金额,isnull(Add_Num,0) 本期进货,isnull(Tb_num,0) 本期调拨,isnull(Minus_Num,0) 本期销售,isnull(pd_Num,0) 本期盘点,isnull(Store_Num,0) 期末存量,isnull(store_num,0)*product_price 金额 from (select product_code,isnull(init_num,0) init_num,add_num,tb_num,minus_num,pd_num,isnull(init_num,0)+add_num+tb_num-minus_num+pd_num store_num from(select product_code,isnull(init_num,(select top 1 init_num from pos_product_account where agent_code='@@Pos_Code,' and product_code=n.product_Code and init_num is not null order by oper_date)) init_num,add_num,tb_num,minus_num,pd_num from (select product_code,(select top 1 store_num from pos_product_account where agent_code='@@Pos_Code,' and product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@SALE_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by oper_date desc) init_num,add_num,tb_num,minus_num,pd_num from (select product_code,x.add_num,x.tb_num,x.minus_num,x.pd_num from (select z.product_code,sum(add_num-back_num) add_num,sum(tbr_num-tbc_num) tb_num,sum(isnull(minus_num,0)) minus_num,sum(pdy_num-pdk_num) pd_num from (select product_code,case oper_demo when '分店入库' then Add_Num else 0 end add_num,case oper_demo when '分店退货' then Minus_Num else 0 end back_num,case oper_demo when '分店调入' then Add_Num else 0 end tbr_num,case oper_demo when '分店调出' then Minus_Num else 0 end tbc_num,case oper_demo when '分店出库' then Minus_Num else 0 end minus_num,case oper_demo when '分店盘点' then add_Num else 0 end pdy_num,case oper_demo when '分店盘点' then minus_Num else 0 end pdk_num from pos_product_account where agent_code='@@Pos_Code,' and oper_date between '@@SALE_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@SALE_DATE2, 23:59:59' ) z group by z.product_code ) x) m) n) y) k,product_list o where k.product_code=*o.product_code

select sum(Init_Num) 上期结存,sum(Init_Num*product_price) 金额,sum(isnull(Add_Num,0)) 本期进货,sum(isnull(Tb_num,0)) 本期调拨,sum(isnull(Minus_Num,0)) 本期销售,sum(isnull(pd_Num,0)) 本期盘点,sum(isnull(Store_Num,0)) 期末存量,sum(isnull(store_num,0)*product_price )金额 from (select product_code,isnull(init_num,0) init_num,add_num,tb_num,minus_num,pd_num,isnull(init_num,0)+add_num+tb_num-minus_num+pd_num store_num from(select product_code,isnull(init_num,(select top 1 init_num from pos_product_account where agent_code='@@Pos_Code,' and product_code=n.product_Code and init_num is not null order by oper_date)) init_num,add_num,tb_num,minus_num,pd_num from (select product_code,(select top 1 store_num from pos_product_account where agent_code='@@Pos_Code,' and product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@SALE_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by oper_date desc) init_num,add_num,tb_num,minus_num,pd_num from (select product_code,x.add_num,x.tb_num,x.minus_num,x.pd_num from (select z.product_code,sum(add_num-back_num) add_num,sum(tbr_num-tbc_num) tb_num,sum(isnull(minus_num,0)) minus_num,sum(pdy_num-pdk_num) pd_num from (select product_code,case oper_demo when '分店入库' then Add_Num else 0 end add_num,case oper_demo when '分店退货' then Minus_Num else 0 end back_num,case oper_demo when '分店调入' then Add_Num else 0 end tbr_num,case oper_demo when '分店调出' then Minus_Num else 0 end tbc_num,case oper_demo when '分店出库' then Minus_Num else 0 end minus_num,case oper_demo when '分店盘点' then add_Num else 0 end pdy_num,case oper_demo when '分店盘点' then minus_Num else 0 end pdk_num from pos_product_account where agent_code='@@Pos_Code,' and oper_date between '@@SALE_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@SALE_DATE2, 23:59:59' ) z group by z.product_code ) x) m) n) y) k,product_list o where k.product_code=*o.product_code
row.KJSM: 店面进销存汇总表(合计)

row.SQL: select Back_Code,b.Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num from a_backList a,agent_List b where a.Agent_Code= b.Agent_Code and back_sts='0' and Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and a.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')
select Back_Code,b.Agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num from backList a,agent_List b where a.Agent_Code= b.Agent_Code and back_sts='1' and Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date),dbo.getDateTime(Arr_Date),Back_Num,dbo.getSts(back_sts),dbo.getAgentName(a.opr_Dw) opr_Dw from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and Agent_Code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select k.product_code 货号,product_name 品名,product_size 规格,product_untl 单位,Init_Num 上期结存,Init_amount 金额,Add_Num 本期入库,add_amount 金额,Minus_Num 本期出库,minus_amount 金额,Store_Num 期末存量,store_amount 金额 from (select x.product_code,isnull(x.init_num,0) init_num,isnull(x.init_amount,0) init_amount,add_num,add_amount,minus_num,minus_amount,isnull(init_num,0)+add_num-minus_num store_num,isnull(init_amount,0)+add_amount-minus_amount store_amount from (select m.product_code,(select top 1 store_num from product_account where product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by oper_date desc) init_num,(select top 1 store_num*product_price from product_account where product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by oper_date desc) init_amount,add_num,add_amount,minus_num,minus_amount from (select b.product_code,isnull(sum(add_num),0) add_num,isnull(sum(add_num*a.product_price),0) add_amount,isnull(sum(minus_num),0) minus_num,isnull(sum(minus_num*a.product_price),0) minus_amount from product_account a,product_list b where a.product_code=*b.product_code and b.agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,' and a.agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,' and oper_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by b.product_code) m) x where (init_num>0 or add_num>0 or minus_num>0) ) k,product_list o where k.product_code=o.product_code and o.agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,'

select sum(Init_Num) 上期结存,sum(Init_amount) 金额,sum(Add_Num) 本期入库,sum(add_amount) 金额,sum(Minus_Num) 本期出库,sum(minus_amount) 金额,sum(Store_Num) 期末存量,sum(store_amount) 金额 from (select x.product_code,isnull(x.init_num,0) init_num,isnull(x.init_amount,0) init_amount,add_num,add_amount,minus_num,minus_amount,isnull(init_num,0)+add_num-minus_num store_num,isnull(init_amount,0)+add_amount-minus_amount store_amount from (select m.product_code,(select top 1 store_num from product_account where product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by oper_date desc) init_num,(select top 1 store_num*product_price from product_account where product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by oper_date desc) init_amount,add_num,add_amount,minus_num,minus_amount from (select b.product_code,isnull(sum(add_num),0) add_num,isnull(sum(add_num*a.product_price),0) add_amount,isnull(sum(minus_num),0) minus_num,isnull(sum(minus_num*a.product_price),0) minus_amount from product_account a,product_list b where a.product_code=*b.product_code and b.agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,' and a.agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,' and oper_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by b.product_code) m) x where (init_num>0 or add_num>0 or minus_num>0)) k,product_list o where k.product_code=o.product_code and o.agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,'
row.KJSM: 总部进销存汇总表(合计)

row.SQL: select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date) Arr_Date,Back_Num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,dbo.getUserChnName(Opr_Man) Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.back_sts in ('2','5') and n.jsdh=a.back_code and n.note_type in ('FL','CK')) outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,(select case sign(count(*)) when 1 then '已安排生产' else '没安排生产' end sc from backlist where jsdh=a.back_code) sc,(select count(*) from backlist where jsdh=a.back_code) sc_num,case isnull(pos_rev,0) when 0 then '未打印' else '配货中' end ph,brand_code,dbo.getDateTime(sh_Date) sh_date from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,Arr_Date,Back_Num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,dbo.getUserChnName(Opr_Man) Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.back_sts in ('2','5') and n.jsdh=a.back_code and n.note_type in ('FL','CK')) outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,dbo.getAgentName(Opr_Dw) Opr_Dw from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,Arr_Date,Back_Num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,dbo.getUserChnName(Opr_Man) Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.back_sts in ('2','5') and n.jsdh=a.back_code and n.note_type in ('FL','CK')) outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,back_amount from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,Arr_Date,Back_Num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,dbo.getUserChnName(Opr_Man) Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.back_sts in ('2','5') and n.jsdh=a.back_code and n.note_type in ('FL','CK')) outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,back_amount from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm='@@LS.DWDM,')

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) back_date,x.agent_code,back_code,back_amount,dbo.getUserChnName(opr_man) opr_man,note_type,dbo.getAgentName(x.agent_code) agent_name,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) sjbm from (select back_date,agent_code,back_code,back_amount,opr_man,note_type from backlist where note_type='XS' and back_sts='2' and sfsf='1' union select back_date,agent_code,back_code,-back_amount back_amount,opr_man,note_type from backlist where note_type='SK' and back_sts='2' ) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code

select sum(back_amount) back_amount from (select back_date,agent_code,back_code,back_amount,opr_man,note_type from backlist where note_type='XS' and back_sts='2' and sfsf='1' union select back_date,agent_code,back_code,-back_amount back_amount,opr_man,note_type from backlist where note_type='SK' and back_sts='2' ) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code
select dbo.getagentname(agent_code) agent_name,by_back_amount,sy_back_amount from v_m_agent_backlist where by_back_amount<sy_back_amount order by by_back_amount desc

select dbo.getdatestr1(oper_date) oper_date,rtrim(a.back_code) back_code,dbo.getAgentName(c.agent_code) agent_name,dbo.getUserChnName(c.opr_Man) opr_man,a.product_code,a.product_name+a.product_size product_name,a.product_untl,b.add_num,b.product_price,b.add_num*b.product_price product_amount,c.note_type,dbo.getNoteTypeHTML(c.note_type) note_typehtml from backdetails a,product_account b,backlist c where a.product_code=b.product_code and a.back_code=b.order_code and a.back_code=c.back_code and b.add_num>0

select sum(b.add_num) add_num,sum(b.add_num*b.product_price) product_amount from backdetails a,product_account b,backlist c where a.product_code=b.product_code and a.back_code=b.order_code and a.back_code=c.back_code and b.add_num>0

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 发生日期,rtrim(a.back_code) 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) 类型,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+a.product_size 名称,a.product_untl 单位,dbo.clearzero(a.back_num) 数量,a.product_price 折后价,a.back_amount 金额,b.note_type ,dbo.getNoteTypeHTML(b.note_type) note_typehtml,a.disaccount_price 单价,ywy 业务员,sfsf 托运单号,substring(b.back_code,7,len(b.back_code)) back_code1,b.brand_code,case product_mj when '' then '' else dbo.clearzero( isnull(product_mj,0)*a.back_num) end product_mj from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code
select dbo.clearzero(sum(a.back_num)) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount,0 product_mj from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code

select dbo.getdatestr1(sh_date) 下单日期,rtrim(a.back_code) 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) 类型,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+a.product_size 名称,a.product_untl 单位,dbo.clearzero(a.back_num) 数量,a.product_price 折后价,a.back_amount 金额,b.note_type ,dbo.getNoteTypeHTML(b.note_type) note_typehtml,a.disaccount_price 单价,ywy 业务员,sfsf 托运单号,substring(b.back_code,7,len(b.back_code)) back_code1,b.brand_code,a.fact_num,a.back_reason from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and agent_code in(select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))

select dbo.clearzero(sum(a.back_num)) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE 货号 , PRODUCT_NAME 品名,PRODUCT_SIZE 规格,(select series_name from Series_list_z where agent_code=a.Agent_Code and SERIES_CODE=a.SERIES_CODE ) 所属类型, PRODUCT_Untl 单位, dbo.clearzero(PRODUCT_NUM) 库存, dbo.clearzero(isnull(fact_num,0)) 在途数,lower_num 库存警戒线,a.product_id 产品ID,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) 门店编码,product_price 成本价,convert(decimal(12,2),product_num*product_price) 金额,a.agent_code FROM kc_kcdtb a,v_AbsProductList b where a.product_id*=b.product_id and a.Agent_Code=b.agent_code and a.Agent_Code='@@Agent_Code,'

SELECT dbo.clearzero(sum(PRODUCT_NUM)) 库存, dbo.clearzero(sum(isnull(fact_num,0))) 在途数,0 不良品数,sum(product_amount) 金额 FROM kc_kcdtb a,v_AbsProductList b where a.product_id*=b.product_id and a.Agent_Code=b.agent_code and a.agent_code ='@@Agent_Code,'

select back_code,agent_name,back_date,'' arr_date1,opr_man,back_num,back_amount,dxje,back_demo,jsdh,ywy,sfsf,opr_dw,agent_code,jsdh,arr_date,sjbm,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,dis_amount,dised_amount,tis_amount,account_amount,taf_amount,accounting_amount,pos_rev,brand_code,brand_tel,brand_fax,gg_amount,cx_amount,tj_amount,cd_amount,qt_amount,sh_date,case sign(accounting_amount) when 1 then '请贵方总计办款 '+convert(varchar,accounting_amount)+' 元' else '剩余 '+convert(varchar,abs(accounting_amount))+' 元' end ms,tis_memo+gg_memo+tj_memo+cx_memo bt_memo,back_amount-tis_amount-gg_amount-tj_amount-cx_amount yf_amount from (select a.back_code,b.agent_name,dbo.getdatestr1(a.back_date) back_date,dbo.getdatestr1(arr_date) arr_date,opr_man,back_num,back_amount,dbo.l2u(Back_Amount,0) dxje,back_demo,jsdh,ywy,dbo.getSFSFName(sfsf) sfsf,dbo.getAgentName(opr_dw) opr_dw,a.agent_code, dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) sjbm,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,a.dis_amount,a.dised_amount,a.tis_amount,a.account_amount,a.taf_amount,back_amount+a.taf_amount+a.qt_amount-a.account_amount-a.tis_amount-gg_amount-cx_amount-cd_amount-tj_amount accounting_amount,isnull(pos_rev,0)+1 pos_rev,b.brand_code,(select top 1 brand_tel from brand_list where brand_name=b.brand_code) brand_tel,(select top 1brand_fax from brand_list where brand_name=b.brand_code) brand_fax,gg_amount,cx_amount,tj_amount,cd_amount,qt_amount,dbo.getdatestr1(sh_date) sh_date,case tis_amount when 0 then '' else '-装修补贴:'+convert(varchar,tis_amount) end tis_memo ,case gg_amount when 0 then '' else '-市场活动补贴:'+convert(varchar,gg_amount) end gg_memo,case tj_amount when 0 then '' else '-折扣返利补贴:'+convert(varchar,tj_amount) end tj_memo ,case cx_amount when 0 then '' else '-其他补贴:'+convert(varchar,cx_amount) end cx_memo from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and back_code='@@Back_Code,' ) x

select product_code,product_name+product_size product_name,product_untl,back_num,product_price,back_amount,back_reason,disaccount_price,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) Series_Name,Complete_date,ware_code from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_num >0

select dbo.getdatestr1(oper_date) oper_date,back_code,agent_name,opr_man,product_code,product_name,product_untl,back_num,product_price,back_amount,note_type,note_typehtml,back_num-need_num q_num from (select back_date oper_date,rtrim(a.back_code) back_code,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) agent_name,dbo.getUserChnName(b.opr_Man) opr_man,a.product_code,a.product_name+a.product_size product_name,a.product_untl,a.back_num,a.product_price,a.back_amount,b.note_type,dbo.getNoteTypeHTML(b.note_type) note_typehtml,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.jsdh=a.back_code and m.product_code=a.product_code and n.note_type ='FL') need_num,b.agent_code,series_code from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and Note_Type='@@Note_Type,') x where back_num-need_num>0

select sum(back_num),sum(back_amount),sum(back_num-need_num) q_num from (select back_date oper_date,rtrim(a.back_code) back_code,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) agent_name,dbo.getUserChnName(b.opr_Man) opr_man,a.product_code,a.product_name+a.product_size product_name,a.product_untl,a.back_num,a.product_price,a.back_amount,b.note_type,dbo.getNoteTypeHTML(b.note_type) note_typehtml,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.jsdh=a.back_code and m.product_code=a.product_code and n.note_type ='FL') need_num,b.agent_code,series_code from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and Note_Type='@@Note_Type,') x where back_num-need_num>0

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 日期,back_code 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) 客户名称,jsdh 结算单号,ywy 业务员,back_demo 备注,back_num 数量,back_amount 金额,taf_amount 代垫运费,a.agent_code 客户编号,dbo.getNoteTypeHtml(note_type) 单据类型,note_type,agent_amount 账上余额,case sign(back_amount-agent_amount) when 0 then '' when -1 then '' else 'red' end color_flag,case agent_amount when 0 then 'hidden' else 'visible' end vis_flag, sign(agent_amount-back_amount-taf_amount+tis_amount) kk_flag,dbo.getSts(back_sts) back_st,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) sjbm,tis_amount,back_demo,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0) kk_amount,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0)-agent_amount ysk11,case sign(agent_amount-back_amount-taf_amount+tis_amount) when -1 then '强行发货' else '发货' end FH,back_num fhc,case back_type when '2' then 'disabled' else '' end isShowD,b.brand_code,arr_address,sfsf,(select sum(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_code=a.back_code) yfh,qt_amount,dbo.getBTFHGZ(qt_amount) bttfgz from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and b.sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)

select sum(back_num) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(agent_amount) agent_amount,sum(back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0)-agent_amount) ysk,sum(tis_amount) tis_amount,sum(taf_amount) taf_amount from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and a.agent_code in (@@LS.QXCK,)

select a.agent_code 客户编号,agent_name 客户名称,contact_man 联系人,agent_tel 电话,agent_amount 账上余额,bzj_amount 保证金,dised_amount 已返回额,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) 上级编码,pro_amount 特价余额,wl_amount 物料余额,lgjy 龙骨结余,dbo.clearzero((select sum(back_num) from backdetails where back_code='XS'+a.agent_code)) 购货车数量,(select sum(back_amount) from backdetails where back_code='XS'+a.agent_code) 购货车金额 from agent_list a where agent_type in ('shop','agent') and sjbm!='00'
select sum(agent_amount),sum(bzj_amount),sum(dised_amount),sum(pro_amount),sum(wl_amount),sum(lgjy) from agent_list a where agent_type in ('shop','agent') and sjbm!='00'

row.CS: group by agent_code,series_code,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_id ) x,product_list y where x.product_id*=y.id order by x.series_code
row.SQL: select 货号,名称,单位,数量,金额 ,dbo.getAgentName(x.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getSeriesName(x.series_code) 类型,techcode,(select mc from xl_list where bm=xl_code) 系列 from (select agent_code,series_code,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+isnull(a.product_size,'') 名称,a.product_untl 单位,sum(a.back_num) 数量,sum(a.back_amount) 金额,Product_Id from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code
select * from backlist where back_sts='0' and note_type='@@Note_Type,' and opr_man='@@LS.YHDM,'

select Back_Code 单据号,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) 客户名称,dbo.getDatestr1(sh_Date) 日期,dbo.getdatestr1(arr_date) Arr_Date,dbo.clearzero(Back_Num) back_num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,'' outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,back_amount,brand_code,tis_amount 返点金额,taf_amount 代垫运费,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) end_date from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'

select Back_Code 单据号,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) 客户名称,dbo.getDatestr1(sh_Date) 日期,dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) Arr_Date,dbo.clearzero(Back_Num) back_num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,'' outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,back_amount,brand_code,tis_amount 返点金额,taf_amount 代垫运费,dbo.getDatestr1(end_Date) 发货日期,dbo.getdatestr1(pack_date) 配货日期 from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and back_sts!='9' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))
select dbo.clearzero(sum(back_num)) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(disaccount_price) disaccout_price from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,'
select product_code,back_num,product_price,back_amount,disaccount_price,back_reason from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_num >0 and series_code='101'
select sum(back_num) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(disaccount_price) disaccout_price from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_num >0 and series_code='101'

select product_name+product_size product_code,back_num,product_price,back_amount,disaccount_price,back_reason from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_num >0 and series_code in ('103','104')
select sum(back_num) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(disaccount_price) disaccout_price from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_num >0 and series_code in ('103','104')
select product_name+product_size product_code,back_num,product_price,back_amount,disaccount_price,back_reason from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_num >0 and series_code='102'
select sum(back_num) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(disaccount_price) disaccout_price from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_num >0 and series_code='102'

select top 10 product_code,back_num,back_amount from ( select product_code,sum(a.back_num) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and back_sts='2' and note_type='XS' group by product_code ) x order by back_amount desc

select ywy,back_num,back_amount from ( select ywy,sum(a.back_num) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and back_sts='2' and note_type='XS' group by ywy ) x order by back_amount desc

select top 10 dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,back_num,back_amount from ( select agent_code,sum(back_num) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount from backlist b where back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and back_sts='2' and note_type='SK' group by agent_code ) x order by back_amount desc

select top 10 dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,back_num,back_amount from ( select agent_code,sum(a.back_num) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and back_sts='2' and note_type='XS' group by agent_code ) x order by back_amount desc

select dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,back_num,back_amount from ( select agent_code,sum(a.back_num) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and back_sts='2' and note_type='XS' group by agent_code having (sum(a.back_amount)<'@@YSE,')) x order by back_amount
select agent_name from agent_list where agent_code not in (select distinct agent_code from backlist where back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59') and sjbm!='-1'

select dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,back_amount from ( select sjbm agent_code,sum(a.back_num) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount from backdetails a,backlist b,agent_list c where a.back_code=b.back_code and b.agent_code=c.agent_code and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and back_sts='2' and note_type='XS' group by sjbm ) x order by back_amount desc

row.CS: group by DATEPART(month, back_date) ) x,v_month y where x.date_mm =* y.mm_code
row.SQL: select y.mm_name,isnull(back_num,0) back_num,isnull(back_amount,0) back_amount from ( select DATEPART(month, back_date) date_mm,sum(a.back_num) back_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount from backlist a where back_sts='2' and note_type='SK' and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, dbo.getSeriesName(SERIES_CODE) SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_PRICE,a.DEMO,ID,a.SERIES_CODE,a.STS,a.LOWER_NUM,PACK_NUM,PACK_TYPE,product_txm,ware_code,product_num FROM product_list a where series_code in (select series_code from series_list where series_type='物料')
select '@@SERIES_CODE,'+dbo.lpad('0',5,isnull(max(right(product_code,5)),0)+1) product_code from product_list where series_code='@@SERIES_CODE,'
select * FROM product_list WHERE series_code='@@SERIES_CODE,'

select a.id,a.Product_code,Metail_Code,'@@Back_Num,'*metail_num metail_num,product_price metail_price,'@@Back_Num,'*metail_num*product_price metail_amount,bom_memo,product_name+' '+product_size product_name,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) series_Name,product_untl,product_num,product_num-'@@Back_Num,'*metail_Num dif_num from metails_bom a,product_list b where b.id=a.metail_code and a.product_code='@@M_Product_Code,'

SELECT AGENT_CODE, AGENT_NAME, dbo.getUserChnName(a.domain_man) domain_name,a.DOMAIN_MAN,'' AGENT_TYPE_NAME,AGENT_TYPE,agent_address,agent_tel,agent_fax,contact_man,agent_mobile1,agent_mobile2,open_flag FROM sup_list a where 1=1
select 'S'+dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(agent_code,3)),0)+1) product_code from sup_list

select a.back_code,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,dbo.getdatestr1(a.back_date) back_date,arr_date, opr_man,back_num,back_amount,dbo.l2u(Back_Amount,0) dxje,back_demo,jsdh,ywy,dbo.getSFSFName(sfsf) sfsf,dbo.getAgentName(opr_dw) opr_dw,a.agent_code,jsdh,dbo.getdatestr1(a.arr_date) arr_date,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,a.dis_amount,a.dised_amount,a.tis_amount,a.account_amount,a.taf_amount,back_amount+a.taf_amount-a.account_amount-a.tis_amount accounting_amount,brand_code,(select sum(reved_num) from backdetails where back_code=a.back_code) reved_num,'摘要[生产'+(select top 1 product_code from backdetails where back_code=a.back_code)+'等]' zy from backlist a where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

SELECT iD, PRODUCT_CODE, a.series_code, b.SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_NUM, ' ' PRODUCT_MAN, a.DEMO,a.ware_code ,bad_num FROM product_list a,series_list b WHERE a.SERIES_CODE=b.SERIES_CODE and b.series_name like '半成品%'

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,Arr_Date,Back_Num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,dbo.getUserChnName(Opr_Man) Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.back_sts in ('2','5') and n.jsdh=a.back_code and n.note_type in ('FL','CK')) outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,case sign((select count(*) from backlist where jsdh=a.back_code)) when 1 then '正在处理' else '' end isProduct from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'

select id,product_code product_code,product_name+product_size product_name,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) product_size,product_color,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,back_reason,back_code,case back_type when '1' then '正品' else '二等品' end back_type,'' price_type,check_num,check_num-back_num dif_num,dbo.getMetailsStore(product_code) store_num,ticket_num,reved_num,reven_num,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.jsdh=a.back_code and m.product_code=a.product_code and n.note_type in ('FL','CK')) need_num,disaccount_price,complete_date,case sign((select count(*) from backlist where jsdh=a.back_code and sfsf=a.product_code)) when 1 then '已安排' else '' end isProc from backDetails a where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select m.product_code,metail_code,needMetail_num,product_num,product_num-needMetail_num buyNum,product_price,(product_num-needMetail_num)*product_price buyAmount from (select x.product_code,metail_code,metail_num*back_num needMetail_num from (select b.product_code,sum(b.back_num) back_num from backlist a,backdetails b where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.back_sts='2' and a.note_type='JH' group by b.product_code ) x,metails_bom y where x.product_code=y.product_code ) m,product_list n where m.metail_code=n.product_code

select a.id,a.Product_code,Metail_Code,metail_num,metail_price, metail_amount,bom_memo,product_name+' '+product_size product_name,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) series_Name,product_untl,product_num,product_num-metail_Num dif_num from order_bom a,product_list b where b.id=a.metail_code and a.product_code='@@M_Product_Code,' and a.back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select a.id,back_code,dbo.getOrderAgentName(back_code)+' 客户购买'+a.product_code+'时，缺料！生产单号：'+back_code agentName,a.Product_code,Metail_Code,metail_num,product_name+' '+product_size product_name,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) series_Name,product_untl,product_num from buy_list a,product_list b where b.product_code=a.metail_code and a.opr_type='1'

select metail_code product_code,product_name+product_size product_name,product_untl,metail_num,ware_code,' 'back_memo,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.jsdh=a.back_code and back_sts='2' and product_id=a.metail_code) reved_num,b.product_num from (select metail_code,back_code,sum(metail_num) metail_num from order_bom where back_code='@@Back_Code,' group by metail_code,back_code) a,product_list b where a.metail_code=b.id

select id,product_code product_code,product_name+product_size product_name,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) product_size,product_color,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,back_reason,back_code,(select product_num from product_list where product_code=a.product_code) store_num,disaccount_price,complete_date,ware_code,(select sum(product_num-metail_num) from order_bom x,product_list y where x.metail_code=y.product_code and back_code=a.back_code and x.product_code=a.product_code) metail_need,reved_num from backDetails a where back_code='@@Back_Code,'
select sum(metail_num) from order_bom a,product_list b where a.metail_code=b.product_code and back_code='@@Back_Code,'
row.KJSM: 需领料的物料清单(合计)

row.SQL: select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date) Arr_Date,Back_Num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,(select sum(metail_num) from order_bom where back_code=a.back_code) tictet_num,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.back_sts in ('2','5') and n.jsdh=a.back_code and n.note_type in ('FL','CK')) outed_num,back_demo,back_type,'摘要[生产'+(select top 1 product_code from backdetails where back_code=a.back_code)+'等]' zy,brand_code from backList a where Note_Type in('JH','CJ') and back_sts in (@@BackSts,)

select product_price value,product_price name from product_list where product_code='@@Product_Code,' union select type_sales value,type_sales name from product_list where product_code='@@Product_Code,' union select type_agent value, type_agent name from product_list where product_code='@@Product_Code,'
select agent_amount-isnull(back_amount,0) agent_amount from agent_list a,v_AbsAmount_cw b where a.agent_code*=b.agent_code and a.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'

select dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) series_name,product_code,product_name,dbo.clearzero(back_num) back_num,dbo.clearzero(product_price) product_price,disaccount_price,back_amount,back_reason,product_size,product_untl,zk,pack_memo,pack_nums,pack_num,case pcs_dj when 'PCS' then '长度MM:'+product_mj else '' end product_mj from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,'
select dbo.clearzero(sum(back_num)),sum(back_amount) from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select back_code,opr_man,back_num,back_amount,dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) back_date,back_demo,case back_sts when '1' then '正在处理' when '0' then '未处理' else '已完成' end stsname,back_sts from backlist where jsdh='@@Back_Code,'

select product_code,product_name+product_size product_name,product_untl,back_num,product_price,back_amount,back_reason,disaccount_price,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) Series_Name,Complete_date,ware_code,reved_num from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and reved_num >0
select brand_id,brand_name,brand_chnname,brand_tel,brand_fax from brand_list

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date) Arr_Date,dbo.clearzero(Back_Num) back_num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,0 outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,'' sc,0 sc_num,case isnull(pos_rev,0) when 0 then '未打印' else '配货中' end ph,brand_code, case isupdate when '否' then 'red' else '' end isupdate,isnull(Back_Src,'客服代下') back_src from backList a where Note_Type='XS' and back_sts='@@BackSts,' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))
select dbo.clearzero(sum(Back_Num)),sum(back_amount),sum(isnull(tis_amount,0)),sum(isnull(taf_amount,0)) from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'

select brand_code 品牌,dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 发生日期,rtrim(a.back_code) 单据编号,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) 类型,a.product_code 型号,a.product_name+a.product_size 名称,a.product_untl 单位,a.back_num 实产数量,a.reved_num 预产数量 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.back_num>0 and back_sts='2' and note_type='@@Note_Type,' and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select sum(a.back_num) 实产数量,sum(a.reved_num) 预产数量 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.back_num>0 and back_sts='2' and note_type='@@Note_Type,' and back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select bm,mc,sjbm from xl_list
select pack_id,pack_name,pack_tj,pack_type,pxh from pack_list
select exp_id,exp_name,exp_tel from exp_list
select bm,mc from bm_project
select yhh,yhxm,lxfs,qx_cd,qx_ck,qx_qt,yhz from tj_sys_yh where sts='0' and yhz!='终端店面'
select yhh,yhxm,lxfs,qx_cd,qx_ck,qx_qt,yhz from tj_sys_yh where sts='0' and yhz='终端店面'

select bm,mc,xhgg,sccj,jldw,min_kc,max_kc,jj,lb,kcsl,tjrq,qy_flag,(select mc from sc_bm_splb where bm=a.lb) lbmc,case qy_flag when 'T' then '启用' else '停用' end qy_mc,convert(decimal(12,2),kcsl*jj) kcje from sc_bm_sp a where 1=1
select '合计：' jldw,sum(kcsl) kcsl,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(kcsl*jj)) kcje from sc_bm_sp a where 1=1
select series_code bm,series_name mc,case sts when '0' then '启用' else '停用' end qy_mc,sts qy_flag,series_type lb from series_list where 1=1

select product_code code,metail_code spbm,metail_name spmc,metail_size xhgg,metail_untl jldw,jj dj,bom_num sl,jj*bom_num je,memo bz,a.lb,(select bm+'_'+mc from sc_bm_splb where bm=a.lb) lb_mc from sc_bom a,sc_bm_sp b where a.metail_code=b.bm and product_code='@@ID,'

select id bm,product_name+' '+isnull(product_color,'') mc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,product_price jj,product_num sl,product_price*product_num je,series_code lb ,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) lbmc,'closed' state,(select count(*) from sc_bom where product_code=a.product_code) wls,agent_code,product_code from product_list a where series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)
select gxzb,gxmc,bz from sc_bm_gx
select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,gxzb,gxmc,gj,dbgj,hxgj,jsdw,bz,tzgj from sc_gjb where spbm='@@BM,'
select bm,mc,xhgg,sccj,jldw,min_kc,max_kc,jj,lb,kcsl,tjrq,qy_flag,(select mc from sc_bm_splb where bm=a.lb) lbmc,case qy_flag when 'T' then '启用' else '停用' end qy_mc from sc_bm_sp a where 1=1

select '@@ID,' code,metail_code spbm,metail_name spmc,metail_size xhgg,metail_untl jldw,bom_num*'@@sl,' sl,bom_num dh_sl,jj dj,(bom_num*'@@sl,')*jj je,kcsl,kcsl-(bom_num*'@@sl,') ce from sc_bom a,sc_bm_sp b where a.metail_code=b.bm and product_code='@@SPBM,'

select a.rwd_id,xh,a.id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw, sl,yqwcrq,a.bz,sc_flag,case sc_flag when 'F' then '未安排' else '已安排' end sc_flag_mc,sccj,psid,dbo.getDateStr1(sjwcrq) sjwcrq,(select count(*) from ckd_zb where id_rwd=a.rwd_id and sh='T') cks from jhd_mx a,jhd_zb b where a.id=b.id and sh='T'
select rwd_id,id,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw, sl,yqwcrq,bz from jhd_mx where rwd_id='@@ID,'
select bm,mc,zb,bz,qy_flag from sc_bm_gx
select '@@id,' id,product_code spbm,product_name+product_color spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,0 dj, 0 je, '' bz,'' ygmc from product_list where product_code='@@d_SPBM,'

SELECT BM, MC, XB, SR, DH, DZ, ZW, MM, HF, SFZ, XL, JCRQ, ZZRQ, HTQX, SGZRQ, MRCK, QXZ, QX_CD, QX_DJ, QX_CK, QX_QT, COMPUTER_NAME, COMPUTER_IP, LIMIT, CSJE, QY_FLAG,case qy_flag when 'T' then '正常' else '离职' end qy_mc,zbbm,(select mc from sc_bm_sczb where bm=a.zbbm) zbmc FROM SC_BM_YG a where 1=1
select isnull(max(bm)+1,'1001') bm from sc_bm_yg

select bm,mc,dz,dh,sj,cz,lxr,case qy_flag when 'T' then '启用' else '停用' end qy_mc,case lx when '1' then '供货商' when '2' then '加工商' else '' end lxmc,lx,lxr_zw,zw_khh,zw_zh,zw_hm,zw_sh,email,wz,szcs,bz from sc_bm_wldw where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select isnull(max(bm)+1,'1001') bm from sc_bm_wldw

select spbm,spmc,dbo.getdateStr1(rq) rq,sl,dj,je,demo from (select spbm,spmc,rq,sl,dj,je,'入库' demo from rkd_zb a,rkd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='T' union all select spbm,spmc,rq,-sl,dj,-je,'出库' demo from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='T') x where spbm='@@SPBM,'
select id,dbo.getdatestr1(rq) rq,zdr,shr,pzh,zsl,zje,zse,zhj,zy,bz,sh,ghsbm,ghsmc from sc_cgd_zb where 1=1
select id,xh,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,dj_hs,je,se,hj,bz from sc_cgd_mx where id='@@ID,'
select '5_@@LS.YHDM,@@LS.YEAR,@@LS.MONTH,@@LS.DAY,'+dbo.lpad('0',2,isnull(max(right(id,2))+1,1)) from sc_cgd_zb where rq between '@@LS.CURDATE, 00:00:00' and '@@LS.CURDATE, 23:59:59'

select '@@ID,' id,metail_code spbm,metail_name spmc,metail_size xhgg,metail_untl jldw,bom_num*'@@im_SL,' sl,bom_num dh_sl,jj dj,(bom_num*'@@im_SL,')*jj je,kcsl,kcsl-(bom_num*'@@im_SL,') ce from sc_bom a,sc_bm_sp b where a.metail_code=b.bm and product_code='@@im_SPBM,'
select '@@ID,' id,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,je,'' bz from sc_rwd_wl where id='@@pzh,'
select '@@id,' id, spbm, spmc, xhgg,jldw,1 sl,0 dj, 0 je, '' bz,'' ygmc,a.id rwd_id from sc_jhd_mx a,sc_jhd_zb b where a.code=b.code and a.id='@@d_SPBM,'
select mc,mc from sc_bm_gx
select product_code,product_name+' '+product_color+' '+product_size product_name from product_list where product_code='@@BM,'
select product_code spbm,product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,'' gxzb,'' gxmc,'' gj,'' dbgj,'' hxgj,'' jsdw,'' bz,'' tzgj from product_list where product_code='@@BM,'

select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,yssl,id,rq from (select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,isnull((select sum(sl) from rkd_mx where ref_id=a.id and spbm=a.spbm),0) yssl,a.id,dbo.getDateStr(rq) rq from cgd_mx a,cgd_zb b where a.id=b.id and sh='T') z where (sl-yssl)>0
select '@@id,' id,bm spbm,mc spmc,xhgg,jldw,1 sl,jj dj, 1*jj je, '' bz,'@@ref_id,' cgd_id from sc_bm_sp where bm='@@d_SPBM,'

select a.product_code,a.product_code+' '+product_name+' '+product_color+' '+product_size product_name,metail_code spbm,metail_name spmc,metail_size xhgg,metail_untl jldw,metail_price dj,metail_amount je,bom_num from sc_bom a,product_list b where a.product_code=b.product_code
select bmbm bm,bmmc mc,bz,qy_flag from sc_bm_bm

select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,yssl,id,psid from (select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,isnull((select sum(sl) from ckd_mx where ref_id=a.id and spbm=a.spbm),0) yssl,a.id,psid from sc_rwd_wl a where a.id='@@ID_RWD,') z where (sl-yssl)>0

select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,yssl,id,psid from (select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,isnull((select sum(sl) from ckd_mx where ref_id=a.id and spbm=a.spbm),0) yssl,a.id,psid from sc_rwd_wl a where a.id='@@ID_RWD,') z where 1=1

row.CS: group by bm,b.mc,b.xhgg,b.jldw) x order by spbm
row.SQL: select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,qcsj,rksl,cksl,qcsj+rksl-cksl qmsj from (select b.bm spbm,b.mc spmc,b.xhgg,b.jldw,(select isnull(sum(rksl-cksl),0) from v_crkmx where spbm=b.bm and rq < '@@ORDER_DATE1,') qcsj,sum(rksl) rksl,sum(cksl) cksl,sum(rkje) rkje,sum(ckje) ckje from v_crkmx a,sc_bm_sp b where a.spbm=*b.bm and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,'

select sum(qcsj),sum(rksl),sum(cksl),sum(qcsj+rksl-cksl) qmsj from (select b.bm spbm,b.mc spmc,b.xhgg,b.jldw,(select isnull(sum(rksl-cksl),0) from v_crkmx where spbm=b.bm and rq < '@@ORDER_DATE1,') qcsj,sum(rksl) rksl,sum(cksl) cksl,sum(rkje) rkje,sum(ckje) ckje from v_crkmx a,sc_bm_sp b where a.spbm=*b.bm and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,'
select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,yj,dj,je,zk,pfj,lsj,bz,zkje,ref_id,sccj,psid,wssl,wlcg_id,jssl,cd,tplj,ysbm,ysmc from rkd_mx_z where id='@@ID,' order by xh
select '2_@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from rkd_zb_z where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select '@@ID,' code, spbm, spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,yj,dj, dj*sl je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id,sccj,psid,0 wssl from cgd_mx where id='@@ref_id,'

select '@@ID,' code,id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,type_bazaar yj, type_bazaar dj, type_bazaar je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id from product_list where id in (@@d_SPBM,)
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,dwbm,dwmc,jbrbm,jsfsbm,zdr,shr,zdzk,zsl,zje,zhj,tje,yjs,xjs,ejs,wjs,zzk,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc,pzh,pjlx,ckmc,zse,shrq from rkd_zb_z where id='@@ID,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy,zse,shrq from rkd_zb_z a where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and note_type='@@Note_Type,' and ckbm='@@Agent_Code,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,je,a.id,zdr,shr,a.bz,dwmc,psid from rkd_zb a,rkd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select '合计' jldw,sum(sl) sl,sum(je) je from rkd_zb a,rkd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,yj,dj,je,zk,pfj,lsj,bz,zkje,ref_id,sccj,psid,xh,yt,cg_id,jhq from cgd_mx a where id='@@ID,'
select '5_@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from cgd_zb where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select b.bm spbm,mc,xhgg,jldw,kcsl,jj,pfj,lsj from kc_kcdtb a,bm_sp b where a.spbm=*b.bm and ckbm='@@CK,'

select '@@ID,' code,a.id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,dj yj, dj dj, dj je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id from product_list a,product_wldw b where a.id=b.product_id and a.id in (@@d_SPBM,) and dwbm='@@DWBM,'
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,dwbm,dwmc,jbrbm,jsfsbm,zdr,shr,zdzk,zsl,zje,zhj,tje,yjs,xjs,ejs,wjs,zzk,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc,pzh,pjhm from cgd_zb where id='@@ID,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '未审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy,dwbm,isnull((select sum(x.sl) from rkd_mx x,cgd_mx y where x.wlcg_id=y.cg_id and y.id=a.id),0) ysl,pjhm from cgd_zb a where note_type='@@Note_Type,'

select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,yj,dj,je,zk,pfj,lsj,bz,zkje,ref_id,sccj,psid,isnull((select product_num from kc_kcdtb where product_id=a.spbm and Agent_Code='@@LS.DWDM,'),0) kcsl,sxbm,cd,case isnull(cd,'') when '' then '' else '长度：'+cd+'MM' end cd_memo,0 kcsl2,YSBM,YSMC from ckd_mx_z a where id='@@ID,' order by xh
select '3_@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from ckd_zb_z where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())

select '@@ID,' code,spbm,spmc,z.xhgg,z.jldw,(sl-yssl) sl,product_price yj, product_price dj, product_price*(sl-yssl) je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id,psid from (select spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,isnull((select sum(sl) from ckd_mx where ref_id=a.id and spbm=a.spbm),0) yssl,a.id,psid from sc_rwd_wl a where a.id='@@ref_id,') z ,product_list b where z.spbm=b.id and (sl-yssl)>0

select '@@ID,' code,product_id spbm,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,isnull(product_price,0) yj, isnull(product_price,0) dj, isnull(product_price,0) je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id,'' sccj,product_code psid,0 kcsl2,product_num kcsl from kc_kcdtb where product_id in(@@d_SPBM,) and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,dwbm,dwmc,jbrbm,jsfsbm,zdr,shr,zdzk,zsl,zje,zhj,tje,yjs,xjs,ejs,wjs,zzk,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc,id_rwd,pjlx,case pjlx when '2' then '委外送货' else '正常出库' end pjlxmc,rwdmc from ckd_zb_z where id='@@ID,'
select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' when 'F' then '未提交' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy,rwdmc from ckd_zb_z a where ckbm='@@Agent_Code,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,je,a.id,zdr,shr,a.bz,psid from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select '合计' jldw,sum(sl) sl,sum(je) je from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select '@@ID,' code,id spbm,product_code psid,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,type_bazaar dj, 1*type_bazaar je, '' bz,series_code,(select convert(varchar,series_code)+'_'+series_name from series_list where series_code=a.series_code) lb_mc from product_list a where id in (@@d_SPBM,)

select a.product_code code,metail_code spbm,product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,type_bazaar dj,bom_num sl,convert(decimal(12,2),type_bazaar*bom_num) je,memo bz,a.lb,(select mc from xl_list where bm=b.xl_code) lb_mc,product_num kcsl,psid from sc_bom a,product_list b where a.metail_code=b.id and a.product_code='@@ID,'
select sum(bom_num) sl,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(type_bazaar*bom_num)) je from sc_bom a,product_list b where a.metail_code=b.id and a.product_code='@@ID,'
select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,yqwcrq,bz,rwd_id,ref_id,sccj,psid,jgdj from jhd_mx where id='@@ID,' order by xh
select '1_@@LS.YHDM,@@LS.YEAR,@@LS.MONTH,@@LS.DAY,'+dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from jhd_zb where rq between '@@LS.CURDATE, 00:00:00' and '@@LS.CURDATE, 23:59:59'
select '@@ID,' code,bm spbm,mc spmc,a.xhgg,a.jldw,sl,jj yj, jj dj, jj*sl je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id from sc_bm_sp a,cgd_mx b where a.bm=b.spbm and b.id='@@ref_id,'

select '@@ID,' code,id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,'' yqwcrq,'SS@@LS.CURSHORTDATE,_'+right('@@ID,',2) rwd_id,'@@ref_id,' ref_id,isnull((select top 1 dj from product_wldw where product_id=a.id and dwbm='@@DWBM,'),0) jgdj from product_list a where id in(@@d_SPBM,)
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,dwbm,dwmc,jbrbm,jsfsbm,zdr,shr,zdzk,zsl,zje,zhj,tje,yjs,xjs,ejs,wjs,zzk,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc from jhd_zb where id='@@ID,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy,isnull((select sum(sl) from rkd_mx where ref_id=a.id),0) ysl from jhd_zb a where zdr='@@LS.XM,' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select bm,mc,bz,fzr,qy_flag,pxh from sc_bm_sczb

select '4_@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from jld_zb where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select '@@ID,' code,bm spbm,mc spmc,a.xhgg,a.jldw,sl,jj yj, jj dj, jj*sl je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id from sc_bm_sp a,cgd_mx b where a.bm=b.spbm and b.id='@@ref_id,'
select '@@ID,' code, spbm, spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,0 yj, 0 dj, 0 je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,rwd_id ref_id,'' gxbm, '' gxmc,'' czr,sccj,psid from jhd_zb a,jhd_mx b where a.id=b.id and rwd_id='@@d_SPBM,'
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,dwbm,dwmc,jbrbm,jsfsbm,zdr,shr,zdzk,zsl,zje,zhj,tje,yjs,xjs,ejs,wjs,zzk,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc from jld_zb where id='@@ID,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy from jld_zb a where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select spbm code,zbbm,convert(varchar,pxh)+'.'+zbmc zbmc,gxbm,gxmc,dj,a.bz,pxh from sc_gjb a,sc_bm_sczb b where a.zbbm=b.bm and spbm='@@ID,'
select sum(dj) dj from sc_gjb where spbm='@@ID,'

row.SQL: select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,dwmc,czr,gxmc,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,je from jld_mx a,jld_zb b where sh='T'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,a.rwd_id,xh,a.id,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw, sl,yqwcrq,a.bz,sc_flag,case sc_flag when 'F' then '未安排' else '已安排' end sc_flag_mc from jhd_mx a,jhd_zb b where a.id=b.id and sh='T'

select a.id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,dj,sl,dh_sl,je,bz,series_code lb,(select convert(varchar,series_code)+'_'+series_name from series_list where series_code=b.series_code) lb_mc,b.product_num,b.product_num-sl ce,psid from sc_rwd_wl a,product_list b where a.spbm=b.id and a.id='@@RWD_ID,'
select sum(dh_sl) dh_sl,sum(sl) sl,sum(je) je from sc_rwd_wl a,product_list b where a.spbm=b.id and a.id='@@RWD_ID,'

row.SQL: select '@@ID,' code,metail_code spbm,metail_name spmc,metail_size xhgg,metail_untl jldw,product_price dj,bom_num sl,convert(decimal(12,2),product_price*bom_num) je,memo bz,a.lb,(select bm+'_'+mc from sc_bm_splb where bm=a.lb) lb_mc,b.product_num kcsl,b.product_code psid from sc_bom a,product_list b where a.metail_code=b.id and a.product_code='@@SRC_ID,'
