select dbo.getdatestr1(rq) rq,dwmc+'-'+gxmc gxmc,sl from jld_zb a,jld_mx b where a.id=b.id and b.ref_id='@@SPBM,'
select czr,sum(sl) sl,sum(je) je from jld_mx a,jld_zb b where sh='T'
select product_code spbm,product_name mc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,product_num kcsl,product_price jj,type_agent pfj,type_sales lsj from product_list where agent_code='@@CK,'
select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,zmsl,spsl,sl,dj,je,kcje,hwbh,flag,sccj,psid,cd,bz from pdd_mx where id='@@ID,' order by xh
select '6_@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from pdd_zb where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) sj,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz from pdd_zb a where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select '@@ID,' code,product_id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,isnull(product_num,0) zmsl,isnull(product_num,0) sl,isnull(product_amount,0) kcje,isnull(product_price,0) dj,0 je,'' cd from kc_kcdtb where product_id in(@@d_SPBM,) and agent_code='@@CK,'
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,'' dwbm,'' dwmc,jbrbm,'' jsfsbm,zdr,shr,'' zdzk,zsl,zje,'' zhj,'' tje,'' yjs,'' xjs,'' ejs,'' wjs,'' zzk,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc,ckmc from pdd_zb where id='@@ID,'

select '@@ID,' code, spbm,mc spmc,xhgg,jldw,kcsl zmsl,spsl,sl,jj dj,sl*jj je,kcje,psid,sccj,'' cd from (select convert(int,b.product_id) spbm,product_name mc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,type_bazaar jj,isnull(product_num,0) kcsl,isnull(实盘数,0) spsl,实盘数-isnull(a.product_num,0) sl,product_amount kcje,product_code psid,agent_code sccj from product_list a,opendatasource( 'Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0','Data Source="@@d_SPBM,";User ID=;Password=;Extended properties=Excel 8.0')...[sheet1$] b where a.id=b.product_id ) x

select top 10 a.bm 商品编码,mc 商品名称,xhgg 规格,jldw 单位,(select mc from bm_splb where bm=a.lb) 类别,kcsl 账面数量,'' 实盘数量 from bm_sp a ,kc_kcdtb b where a.bm*=b.spbm and ckbm='@@CK,' and lb not in ('185','186','181') order by lb

select '@@RWD_ID,' code,id spbm,product_code psid,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1*@@SL, sl,1 dh_sl,product_price dj, 1*@@SL,*product_price je, '' bz,series_code,(select convert(varchar,series_code)+'_'+series_name from series_list where series_code=a.series_code) lb_mc from product_list a where id in (@@d_SPBM,)
select dbo.getdatestr1(sjwcrq) 生产日期,sccj 品牌,psid 型号,spmc 名称,jldw 单位,sl 数量 from jhd_mx where sjwcrq is not null and sjwcrq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select sum(sl) 数量 from jhd_mx where sjwcrq is not null and sjwcrq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select product_code 货号,product_name 名称,product_untl 单位,sl 数量,je 金额,cbje 成本,je-cbje 毛利,case sign(je) when 0 then 0 else convert(int,round((je-cbje)/je*100,2)) end 毛利率 from(select a.product_code,a.product_name+isnull(a.product_size,'') product_name,a.product_untl,sum(a.back_num) sl,sum(a.back_amount) je,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(a.back_num*type_bazaar)) cbje from backdetails a,backlist b,product_list c where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.product_id=c.id and back_sts in('2','1','7')

select sum(sl) 数量,sum(je) 金额,sum(cbje) 成本,sum(je-cbje) 毛利,case sign(sum(je)) when 0 then 0 else convert(int,round((sum(je-cbje))/sum(je)*100,2)) end 毛利率 from(select a.product_code,a.product_name+a.product_size product_name,a.product_untl,sum(a.back_num) sl,sum(a.back_amount) je,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(a.back_num*type_bazaar)) cbje from backdetails a,backlist b,product_list c where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.product_id=c.id and back_sts in('2','1','7')

select '@@ID,' code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,product_price yj, product_price dj,sl*product_price je,100 zk,type_agent pfj, type_sales lsj,'' bz,0 zkje,'' ref_id,sccj,psid from jhd_mx a,product_list b where a.id='@@ID_DHD,' and a.spbm=b.id

select dbo.getDateStr1(opr_date) 日期,right(back_code,9)+opr_memo 销售单号及摘要,dbo.getZeroNum(hk_amount) 汇款金额, dbo.getZeroNum(bt_amount) 装修补贴,dbo.getZeroNum(gg_amount) 广告活动,dbo.getZeroNum(cx_amount) 上样补贴,dbo.getZeroNum(tj_amount) 折扣返利,dbo.getZeroNum(cd_amount) 退货冲款,dbo.getZeroNum(hg_amount) 调账金额,dbo.getZeroNum(stand_amount) 返利货款,dbo.getZeroNum(h_bfl_amount) 不返利货款,dbo.getZeroNum(h_gc_amount) 工程,dbo.getZeroNum(h_cy_amount) 出样,dbo.getZeroNum(yf_amount) 代垫运费,dbo.getZeroNum(qt_amount) 其他补贴,init_amount 期初结余,store_amount 期末结余,dbo.getAgentName(Agent_Code) 客户名称,back_code,dbo.getNoteTypeHTML(substring(back_code,1,2)) typehtml from amount_account where opr_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select sum(hk_amount) 汇款金额,sum(bt_amount) 补贴费用,sum(gg_amount) 广告,sum(cx_amount) 促销,sum(tj_amount) 特价,sum(cd_amount) 超低品,sum(hg_amount) 其他,sum(stand_amount) 正价,sum(h_bfl_amount) 正价,sum(h_gc_amount) 正价,sum(h_cy_amount) 正价,sum(yf_amount) 代垫运费,sum(qt_amount) 代垫手续费 from amount_account where opr_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select dbo.getAgentName(x.agent_code) 客户名称,isnull(init_amount,0) 期初结余,hk_amount 货款,bt_amount 装修补贴,gg_amount 市场活动,cx_amount 其他补贴,tj_amount 折扣返利,cd_amount 退货冲款,hg_amount 调账,stand_amount 货款1,h_bfl_amount 货款2,h_cy_amount 出样,h_gc_amount 工程,yf_amount 代垫运费,qt_amount 代垫手续费,isnull(init_amount,0)+(hk_amount+bt_amount+gg_amount+cx_amount+tj_amount+cd_amount+hg_amount)-(stand_amount+h_bfl_amount+h_cy_amount+h_gc_amount)+qt_amount+yf_amount 期末结余,dbo.getPQName(x.agent_code) 片区,isnull(bzj_amount,0) 保证金结余,y.domain_man 区域经理 from (select m.agent_code, dbo.getInitAmount(m.agent_Code,'@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' ) init_amount,(select top 1 store_bzj from amount_account where agent_code=m.agent_Code and opr_memo in ('保证金') and opr_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by id desc) init_bzj,stand_amount,h_bfl_amount,h_gc_amount,h_cy_amount,gg_amount,cx_amount,tj_amount,cd_amount,bt_amount,ch_amount,hg_amount,yf_amount,hk_amount,hb_amount,qt_amount from (select b.agent_code,sum(isnull(stand_amount,0)) stand_amount,sum(isnull(h_bfl_amount,0)) h_bfl_amount,sum(isnull(h_gc_amount,0)) h_gc_amount,sum(isnull(h_cy_amount,0)) h_cy_amount,sum(isnull(gg_amount,0)) gg_amount,sum(isnull(cx_amount,0)) cx_amount,sum(isnull(tj_amount,0)) tj_amount,sum(isnull(cd_amount,0)) cd_amount,sum(isnull(bt_amount,0)) bt_amount,sum(isnull(ch_amount,0)) ch_amount,sum(isnull(hg_amount,0)) hg_amount,sum(isnull(yf_amount,0)) yf_amount,sum(isnull(qt_amount,0)) qt_amount,sum(isnull(hk_amount,0)) hk_amount,sum(case opr_memo when '货款' then 0 else isnull(hg_amount,0) end) hb_amount from amount_account a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=*b.agent_code and b.sjbm in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm=-1) and opr_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by b.agent_code) m) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code and sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)

select sum(isnull(init_amount,0)) 起初结余,sum(hk_amount) 货款,sum(bt_amount) 装修补贴,sum(gg_amount) 广告补贴,sum(cx_amount) 上样补贴,sum(tj_amount) 年度返利,sum(cd_amount) 退货冲款,sum(hg_amount) 其他补贴,sum(stand_amount) 货款1,sum(h_bfl_amount) 货款2,sum(h_cy_amount) 出样,sum(h_gc_amount) 工程,sum(yf_amount) 代垫运费,sum(qt_amount) 代垫手续费,sum(isnull(init_amount,0)+(hk_amount+bt_amount+gg_amount+cx_amount+tj_amount+cd_amount+hg_amount)-(stand_amount+h_bfl_amount+h_cy_amount+h_gc_amount)+qt_amount+yf_amount) 期末结余,sum(isnull(bzj_amount,0)) 保证金结余 from (select m.agent_code, dbo.getInitAmount(m.agent_Code,'@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' ) init_amount,(select top 1 store_bzj from amount_account where agent_code=m.agent_Code and opr_memo in ('保证金') and opr_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by id desc) init_bzj,stand_amount,h_bfl_amount,h_gc_amount,h_cy_amount,gg_amount,cx_amount,tj_amount,cd_amount,bt_amount,ch_amount,hg_amount,yf_amount,hk_amount,hb_amount,qt_amount from (select b.agent_code,sum(isnull(stand_amount,0)) stand_amount,sum(isnull(h_bfl_amount,0)) h_bfl_amount,sum(isnull(h_gc_amount,0)) h_gc_amount,sum(isnull(h_cy_amount,0)) h_cy_amount,sum(isnull(gg_amount,0)) gg_amount,sum(isnull(cx_amount,0)) cx_amount,sum(isnull(tj_amount,0)) tj_amount,sum(isnull(cd_amount,0)) cd_amount,sum(isnull(bt_amount,0)) bt_amount,sum(isnull(ch_amount,0)) ch_amount,sum(isnull(hg_amount,0)) hg_amount,sum(isnull(yf_amount,0)) yf_amount,sum(isnull(qt_amount,0)) qt_amount,sum(isnull(hk_amount,0)) hk_amount,sum(case opr_memo when '货款' then 0 else isnull(hg_amount,0) end) hb_amount from amount_account a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=*b.agent_code and b.sjbm in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm=-1) and opr_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by b.agent_code) m) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code and sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)

select product_code,product_name,isnull(product_num,0)-isnull(fact_num,0) product_num, isnull(fact_num,0) abs_num from product_List a,v_absproductlist b where a.id*=b.product_id and a.id='@@Product_Id,'

select dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) 日期,psid 商品编码,spmc 商品名称,xhgg 型号规格,jldw 单位,sccj 品牌,dbo.clearzero(sl) 数量,dj 单据,je 金额,b.bz 备注 ,pzh 凭证号,zdr 制单人,dwmc 供货商名称,a.id 入库单编号 from rkd_zb a,rkd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.spbm=c.id and sh='T' and end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:00' and series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select dbo.clearzero(sum(sl)) sl,sum(je) je from rkd_zb a,rkd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.spbm=c.id and sh='T' and sc_flag='@@SC_FLAG,' and end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:58:00' and series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) 领用日期,psid 商品编码,spmc 商品名称,xhgg 型号规格,jldw 单位,jbrmc 领用人,dbo.clearzero(sl) 数量,dj 单据,je 金额,b.bz 备注 ,id_rwd 凭证号,a.id 出库单编号 from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.spbm=c.id and sh='T' and end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:58:00' and series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select dbo.clearzero(sum(sl)) sl,sum(je) je from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.spbm=c.id and sh='T' and end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:58:00' and series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select spbm 编号,psid 商品编码,spmc 商品名称,xhgg 型号规格,jldw 单位,sccj 品牌,convert(int,qcsl) 期初数量,qcje 期初金额,convert(int,rksl) 入库数量,rkje 入库金额,convert(int,xssl) 销售数量,xsje 销售金额,convert(int,qcsl+rksl-xssl) 期末数量,qcje+rkje-xsje 期末金额 from (select spbm,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sccj,(select isnull(sum(isnull(rksl,0)-isnull(xssl,0)),0) from v_cp_account where spbm=a.spbm and rq < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00') qcsl,(select isnull(sum(isnull(rkje,0)-isnull(xsje,0)),0) from v_cp_account where spbm=a.spbm and rq < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00') qcje,rksl,rkje,xssl,xsje from (select spbm,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sccj,sum(rksl) rksl,sum(rkje) rkje,sum(xssl) xssl,sum(xsje) xsje from v_cp_account where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by spbm,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sccj) a) b where 1=1

select convert(int,sum(qcsl)) 期初数量,sum(qcje) 期初金额,convert(int,sum(rksl)) 入库数量,sum(rkje) 入库金额,convert(int,sum(xssl)) 销售数量,sum(xsje) 销售金额,convert(int,sum(qcsl+rksl-xssl)) 期末数量,sum(qcje+rkje-xsje) 期末数量 from (select spbm,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sccj,(select isnull(sum(isnull(rksl,0)-isnull(xssl,0)),0) from v_cp_account where spbm=a.spbm and rq < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00') qcsl,(select isnull(sum(isnull(rkje,0)-isnull(xsje,0)),0) from v_cp_account where spbm=a.spbm and rq < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00') qcje,rksl,rkje,xssl,xsje from (select spbm,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sccj,sum(rksl) rksl,sum(rkje) rkje,sum(xssl) xssl,sum(xsje) xsje from v_cp_account where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by spbm,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sccj) a) b where 1=1

select id 编号,product_code 商品编码, product_name 商品名称, product_size 规格, product_untl 单位, agent_code 品牌, init_num 上期结存, init_amount 结存金额, add_num 本期入库, add_amount 入库金额, minus_num 本期出库, minus_amount 出库金额,store_num 期末存量,store_amount 期末金额,(select mc from xl_list where bm=a.xl_code) 系列名称 from dbo.v_jxchzb('@@ORDER_DATE1,','@@ORDER_DATE2,') a where 1=1

select id 编号,product_code 商品编码, product_name 商品名称, product_size 规格, product_untl 单位, agent_code 品牌, init_num 上期结存, add_num 本期入库, minus_num 本期出库,store_num 期末存量,(select mc from xl_list where bm=a.xl_code) 系列名称 from dbo.v_jxchzb('@@ORDER_DATE1,','@@ORDER_DATE2,') a where 1=1

select a.product_code code,metail_code spbm,metail_name spmc,metail_size xhgg,metail_untl jldw,product_price dj,bom_num*'@@P_NUM,' sl,memo bz,product_num kcsl,psid from sc_bom a,product_list b where a.metail_code=b.id and a.product_code='@@ID,'

select '@@ID,' code,b.id spbm,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,bom_num*'@@P_NUM,' sl,type_bazaar yj, type_bazaar dj, type_bazaar*bom_num*'@@P_NUM,' je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id,agent_code sccj,b.product_code psid from sc_bom a,product_list b where a.metail_code=b.id and a.product_code='@@PRODUCT_ID,' and b.id in (@@d_SPBM,)
row.KJSM: 按BOM选择物料添加到出库单

row.SQL: select dbo.getdatetime(sh_date) 下单日期,back_code 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getdatetime(pack_date) 打包日期,pack_man 打包人,back_num 数量,case back_type when '2' then 'disabled' else '' end isShowD,a.agent_code 客户编号,jsdh 结算单号,ywy 业务员,ph_man 配货人,agent_tel1 客户电话 from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select id,product_code product_code,product_name,dbo.getSeriesName(series_code) series_name, isnull(product_size,'') product_size,product_color,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,back_reason,back_code,back_type,price_type,check_num,check_num-back_num dif_num,ticket_num,reved_num,store_num,disaccount_price,complete_date,ware_code,reved_num,product_id,fact_num,zk,pxh,fact_amount,pack_memo,pack_num,pack_nums,isnull(type_agent,0) type_agent,type_ls,series_code,product_mj,pcs_dj,case price_type when '返利' then '正价品' else '特价品' end product_attr from backDetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select dbo.getdatestr1(pack_date) 发生日期,rtrim(a.back_code) 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) 类型,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+isnull(a.product_size,'') 名称,a.product_untl 单位,dbo.clearzero(a.fact_num) 订货量,dbo.clearzero(a.back_num) 实发数,dbo.clearzero(a.fact_num-a.back_num) 欠货数,ywy 业务员,substring(b.back_code,7,len(b.back_code)) back_code1,b.brand_code,dbo.clearzero(c.product_num-isnull(d.fact_num,0)) kcsl,a.product_id,a.id,a.product_price,a.back_reason from backdetails a,backlist b,product_list c,v_absproductlist d where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.product_id=c.id and c.id*=d.product_id and a.back_num!=a.fact_num and back_sts in ('2','7') and qh_sts is null and sh_date >'2016-03-01' and b.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)) and not exists (select * from backdetails where (ware_code=a.back_code and product_id=a.product_id) or (convert(varchar,ware_code)=convert(varchar,a.id)))

select dbo.clearzero(sum(a.fact_num)) 订货量,dbo.clearzero(sum(a.back_num)) 实发数,dbo.clearzero(sum(a.fact_num-a.back_num)) 欠货数 from backdetails a,backlist b,product_list c,v_absproductlist d where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.product_id=c.id and c.id*=d.product_id and a.back_num!=a.fact_num and back_sts in ('2','7') and qh_sts is null and b.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)) and not exists (select * from backdetails where (ware_code=a.back_code and product_id=a.product_id) or (convert(varchar,ware_code)=convert(varchar,a.id)) )

select dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getdatestr1(sh_date) 下单日期,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name 名称,a.product_size 规格,a.product_untl 单位,sum(a.fact_num) 订货量,product_mj 长度 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and charindex('3',product_attr)>0 and sh_date is not null
select sum(a.fact_num) 订货量 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and charindex('3',product_attr)>0 and sh_date is not null
select back_code,xh,pack_id,pack_name,pack_tj,pack_price,pack_amount, pack_num,pack_bz,id code,pack_hj from backpack where back_code='@@Back_Code,'
select back_code,xh,pack_id,pack_name,pack_hj,pack_price,pack_amount, pack_num,pack_bz,id code from backpack where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and pack_num>0
select sum(pack_num),sum(pack_amount) from backpack where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and pack_num>0
select '@@Sjbm,'+ dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(agent_code,3))+1,1)) from agent_list where sjbm='@@Sjbm,'
select '@@SERIES_CODE,'+dbo.lpad('0',4,isnull(max(right(product_code,4))+1,1)) product_code from product_list where series_code='@@SERIES_CODE,' and series_code in ('106','107','108','109','110')

select series_name,a.product_code,a.product_name,dbo.clearzero(back_num) back_num,a.product_price,disaccount_price,back_amount,back_reason,a.product_size,a.product_untl,pack_memo,pack_nums,'' tip from backdetails a,series_list b where a.series_code*=b.series_code and back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select Back_Code,dbo.getAgentName(a.Agent_Code) agent_Name,dbo.getDateTime(Back_Date) back_date,dbo.getDateStr1(Arr_Date) Arr_Date,dbo.clearzero(Back_Num) back_num,dbo.getSts(back_sts) sts,dbo.getUserChnName(Opr_Man) Opr_Man,jsdh,back_sts,agent_code,0 outed_num,back_demo,(select agent_address from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) arr_address,ywy Opr_Dw,back_type,0 sc,0 sc_num,case isnull(pos_rev,0) when 0 then '未打印' else '配货中' end ph,brand_code,dbo.getDateTime(sh_Date) sh_date,back_amount,isnull(back_src,'客服代下') back_src from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,'

select a.agent_code sjbm, agent_name,sum(M01) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,sum(M02) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,sum(M03) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,sum(M04) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,sum(M05) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,sum(M06) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,sum(M07) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,sum(M08) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,sum(M09) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,sum(M10) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,sum(M11) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,sum(M12) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,sum(M13) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13,domain_man,agent_area,auth_amount,agent_level,agent_starLevel from dbo.v_xshzb1('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '99','合计：' agent_name,sum(M01) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,sum(M02) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,sum(M03) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,sum(M04) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,sum(M05) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,sum(M06) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,sum(M07) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,sum(M08) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,sum(M09) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,sum(M10) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,sum(M11) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,sum(M12) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,sum(M13) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13 from dbo.v_xshzb1('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select a.agent_code sjbm, agent_name,sum(M01) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,sum(M02) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,sum(M03) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,sum(M04) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,sum(M05) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,sum(M06) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,sum(M07) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,sum(M08) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,sum(M09) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,sum(M10) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,sum(M11) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,sum(M12) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,sum(M13) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13,domain_man,agent_area,auth_amount,agent_level,agent_starLevel from dbo.v_xshzb2('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '99','合计：' agent_name,sum(M01) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,sum(M02) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,sum(M03) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,sum(M04) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,sum(M05) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,sum(M06) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,sum(M07) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,sum(M08) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,sum(M09) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,sum(M10) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,sum(M11) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,sum(M12) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,sum(M13) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13 from dbo.v_xshzb2('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

row.CS: group by domain_man order by sjbm
row.SQL: select '' sjbm,domain_man,sum(M01) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,sum(M02) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,sum(M03) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,sum(M04) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,sum(M05) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,sum(M06) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,sum(M07) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,sum(M08) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,sum(M09) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,sum(M10) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,sum(M11) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,sum(M12) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,sum(M13) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13 from dbo.v_xshzb1('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

row.CS: group by domain_man order by sjbm
row.SQL: select '' sjbm,domain_man,sum(M01) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,sum(M02) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,sum(M03) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,sum(M04) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,sum(M05) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,sum(M06) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,sum(M07) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,sum(M08) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,sum(M09) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,sum(M10) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,sum(M11) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,sum(M12) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,sum(M13) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13 from dbo.v_xshzb2('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select dbo.clearzero(sum(Back_Num)),sum(back_amount),sum(isnull(tis_amount,0)),sum(isnull(taf_amount,0)) from backList a where Note_Type='@@Note_Type,' and agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,))
select dwmc,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,shsl,hlsl,shsl-hlsl cwwz,spbm,code,sxbm,rq from v_cgrkd a where (shsl-(hlsl+hlwssl))>0
select sum(shsl),sum(hlsl),sum(shsl-hlsl) cwwz from v_cgrkd a where (shsl-(hlsl+hlwssl))>0

select dwmc,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,shsl,hlsl,hlwssl,shsl-hlsl cwwz,spbm,code,dbo.getdatestr1(rq) rq,convert(decimal(12,2),(hlwssl/shsl)*100) wsl from v_cgrkd a where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select dbo.getdatestr1(pack_date) 打包日期,rtrim(a.back_code) 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) 类型,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+isnull(a.product_size,'') 名称,a.product_untl 单位,a.fact_num 订货量,a.back_num 实发数,a.fact_num-a.back_num 欠货数,ywy 业务员,substring(b.back_code,7,len(b.back_code)) back_code1,b.brand_code,c.product_num-isnull(d.fact_num,0) kcsl,a.product_id,a.id from backdetails a,backlist b,product_list c,v_absproductlist d where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.product_id=c.id and c.id*=d.product_id and a.back_num!=a.fact_num and back_sts in ('2','7') and qh_sts is null and b.agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)) and not exists (select * from backdetails where (ware_code=a.back_code and product_id=a.product_id) or (convert(varchar,ware_code)=convert(varchar,a.id)) )

select sum(a.fact_num) 订货量,sum(a.back_num) 实发数,sum(a.fact_num-a.back_num) 欠货数 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.back_num!=a.fact_num and back_sts in ('2','7') and sh_date >'2016-03-01' and qh_sts is null and not exists (select * from backdetails where ware_code=convert(varchar,a.id))

select (select isnull(sum(back_amount),0) from backdetails where series_code in (100,101,102,120 ) and back_code='@@Back_Code,') dqxj,(select isnull(sum(back_amount),0) from backdetails where series_code in (105,104) and back_code='@@Back_Code,' ) pjxj

select agent_code,agent_name,dq,convert(decimal(12,2),(dq/(dq+mk+lg))*100) dqzb,mk,convert(decimal(12,2),(mk/(dq+mk+lg))*100) mkzb,lg, convert(decimal(12,2),(lg/(dq+mk+lg))*100) lgzb,pj,(select domain_man from agent_list where agent_code=m.agent_code) domain_man,(select open_flag from agent_list where agent_code=m.agent_code) open_flag,convert(decimal(18,2),meter) meter from (select x.agent_code,y.agent_name,sum(dq_amount) dq,sum(mk_amount) mk,sum(lg_amount) lg,sum(pj_amount) pj,sum(mk_squaremeter) meter from (select agent_code,case series_code when '100' then b.back_amount else 0 end dq_amount,case series_code when '101' then b.back_amount else 0 end mk_amount, case series_code when '101' then dbo.getSquareMeter(product_size)*b.BACK_NUM else 0 end mk_squaremeter,case series_code when '102' then case sign(b.back_amount) when -1 then 0 else b.back_amount end else 0 end lg_amount,case series_code when '104' then b.back_amount else 0 end pj_amount from backlist a,backdetails b where a.back_code=b.back_code and series_code in (100,101,102,104) and sh_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:00:00' ) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code

select sum(dq),sum(mk),sum(lg), sum(pj),sum(meter) meter from (select x.agent_code,y.agent_name,sum(dq_amount) dq,sum(mk_amount) mk,sum(lg_amount) lg,sum(pj_amount) pj,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(mk_squaremeter)) meter from (select agent_code,case series_code when '100' then b.back_amount else 0 end dq_amount,case series_code when '101' then b.back_amount else 0 end mk_amount, case series_code when '101' then dbo.getSquareMeter(product_size)*b.BACK_NUM else 0 end mk_squaremeter, case series_code when '102' then case sign(b.back_amount) when -1 then 0 else b.back_amount end else 0 end lg_amount,case series_code when '104' then b.back_amount else 0 end pj_amount from backlist a,backdetails b where a.back_code=b.back_code and series_code in (100,101,102,104) and sh_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:00:00' ) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 发生日期,rtrim(a.back_code) 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) 客户名称,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) 类型,a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+a.product_size 名称,a.product_untl 单位,a.back_num 数量,convert(decimal(12,2),a.product_price/@@LS.ZOOM,) 折后价,convert(decimal(12,2),a.back_amount/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额,b.note_type ,dbo.getNoteTypeHTML(b.note_type) note_typehtml,convert(decimal(12,2),a.disaccount_price/@@LS.ZOOM,) 单价,ywy 业务员,sfsf 托运单号,substring(b.back_code,7,len(b.back_code)) back_code1,b.brand_code from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and back_sts='2'
select sum(a.back_num) back_num,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(a.back_amount)/@@LS.ZOOM,) back_amount from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and back_sts='2'

select a.product_code 货号,a.product_name+isnull(a.product_size,'') 名称,a.product_untl 单位,sum(a.back_num) 数量,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(a.back_amount)/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额 from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and back_sts='2'

select sjbm,(select agent_name from agent_list where agent_code=b.sjbm) agent_name,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M01)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M02)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M03)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M04)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M05)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M06)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M07)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M08)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M09)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M10)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M11)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M12)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M13)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13 from dbo.v_xshzb1('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code group by sjbm

select '99','合计：' agent_name,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M01)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M02)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M03)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M04)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M05)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M06)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M07)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M08)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M09)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M10)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M11)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M12)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M13)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13 from dbo.v_xshzb1('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '' sjbm,domain_man,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M01)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M02)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M03)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M04)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M05)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M06)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M07)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M08)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M09)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M10)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M11)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M12)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(M13)/@@LS.ZOOM,) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13 from dbo.v_xshzb1('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code group by domain_man

select k.product_code 编号,o.product_code 商品编码,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') 商品名称,product_size 规格,product_untl 单位,agent_code 品牌,Init_Num 上期结存,convert(decimal(12,2),init_num*product_price/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额,Add_Num 本期入库,convert(decimal(12,2),add_num*product_price/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额,Minus_Num 本期出库,convert(decimal(12,2),minus_num*product_price/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额,Store_Num 期末存量,convert(decimal(12,2),Store_Num*product_price/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额 from (select product_code,isnull(init_num,0) init_num,isnull(init_amount,0) init_amount,add_num,add_amount,minus_num,minus_amount,isnull(init_num,0)+add_num-minus_num store_num,isnull(init_amount,0)+add_amount-minus_amount store_amount from(select product_code,(select top 1 store_num from product_account where product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by id desc) init_num,(select top 1 store_num*isnull(cost_price,0) from product_account where product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by id desc) init_amount,add_num,add_amount,minus_num,minus_amount from (select product_code,x.add_num,x.add_amount,x.minus_num,x.minus_amount from (select b.id product_code,sum(isnull(add_num,0)) add_num,sum(isnull(add_num,0)*isnull(cost_price,0)) add_amount,sum(isnull(minus_num,0)) minus_num,sum(isnull(minus_num,0)*isnull(cost_price,0)) minus_amount from product_account a,product_list b where a.product_code =*b.id and b.id in (select distinct product_code from product_account) and oper_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by b.id) x) m) y) k,product_list o where k.product_code=o.id and o.series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select sum(Init_Num) 上期结存,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(init_num*product_price)/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额,sum(Add_Num) 本期入库,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(add_num*product_price)/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额,sum(Minus_Num) 本期出库,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(minus_num*product_price)/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额,sum(Store_Num) 期末存量,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(store_num*product_price)/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额 from (select product_code,isnull(init_num,0) init_num,isnull(init_amount,0) init_amount,add_num,add_amount,minus_num,minus_amount,isnull(init_num,0)+add_num-minus_num store_num,isnull(init_amount,0)+add_amount-minus_amount store_amount from(select product_code,(select top 1 store_num from product_account where product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by id desc) init_num,(select top 1 store_num*isnull(cost_price,0) from product_account where product_code=m.product_Code and oper_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by id desc) init_amount,add_num,add_amount,minus_num,minus_amount from (select product_code,x.add_num,x.add_amount,x.minus_num,x.minus_amount from (select b.id product_code,sum(isnull(add_num,0)) add_num,sum(isnull(add_num,0)*isnull(cost_price,0)) add_amount,sum(isnull(minus_num,0)) minus_num,sum(isnull(minus_num,0)*isnull(cost_price,0)) minus_amount from product_account a,product_list b where a.product_code =*b.id and b.id in (select distinct product_code from product_account) and oper_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by b.id) x) m) y) k,product_list o where k.product_code=o.id and o.series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 日期,back_code 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) 客户名称,jsdh 结算单号,ywy 业务员,back_demo 备注,back_num 数量,convert(decimal(12,2),back_amount/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额,taf_amount 代垫运费,a.agent_code 客户编号,dbo.getNoteTypeHtml(note_type) 单据类型,note_type,agent_amount 账上余额,case sign(back_amount-agent_amount) when 0 then '' when -1 then '' else 'red' end color_flag,case agent_amount when 0 then 'hidden' else 'visible' end vis_flag, sign(agent_amount-back_amount-taf_amount+tis_amount) kk_flag,dbo.getSts(back_sts) back_st,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) sjbm,tis_amount,back_demo,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0) kk_amount,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0)-agent_amount ysk11,case sign(agent_amount-back_amount-taf_amount+tis_amount) when -1 then '强行发货' else '发货' end FH,back_num-(select sum(reved_num) from backdetails where back_code=a.back_code) fhc,case back_type when '2' then 'disabled' else '' end isShowD,b.brand_code from backlist a,v_agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select sum(back_num) back_num,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(back_amount)/@@LS.ZOOM,) back_amount,sum(agent_amount) agent_amount,sum(back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0)-agent_amount) ysk,sum(tis_amount) tis_amount,sum(taf_amount) taf_amount from backlist a,v_agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select agent_code 客户编号,agent_name 客户名称,contact_man 联系人,agent_tel 电话,convert(decimal(12,2),agent_amount/@@LS.ZOOM,) 账上余额,dis_amount 装修返还,dised_amount 已返回额,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) 上级编码 from agent_list where agent_type in ('shop','agent')
select convert(decimal(12,2),sum(agent_amount)/@@LS.ZOOM,) amount,sum(dis_amount),sum(dised_amount) from agent_list where agent_type in ('shop','agent')

select agent_code,agent_name,convert(decimal(12,2),dq/@@LS.ZOOM,),convert(decimal(12,2),(dq/(dq+mk+lg))*100) dqzb,convert(decimal(12,2),mk/@@LS.ZOOM,),convert(decimal(12,2),(mk/(dq+mk+lg))*100) mkzb,convert(decimal(12,2),lg/@@LS.ZOOM,), convert(decimal(12,2),(lg/(dq+mk+lg))*100) lgzb,convert(decimal(12,2),pj/@@LS.ZOOM,) from (select x.agent_code,y.agent_name,sum(dq_amount) dq,sum(mk_amount) mk,sum(lg_amount) lg,sum(pj_amount) pj from (select agent_code,case series_code when '100' then b.back_amount else 0 end dq_amount,case series_code when '101' then b.back_amount else 0 end mk_amount, case series_code when '102' then b.back_amount else 0 end lg_amount,case series_code when '105' then b.back_amount else 0 end pj_amount from backlist a,backdetails b where a.back_code=b.back_code and series_code in (100,101,102,105) and end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,' ) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code

select convert(decimal(12,2),sum(dq)/@@LS.ZOOM,),convert(decimal(12,2),sum(mk)/@@LS.ZOOM,),convert(decimal(12,2),sum(lg)/@@LS.ZOOM,), convert(decimal(12,2),sum(pj)/@@LS.ZOOM,) from (select x.agent_code,y.agent_name,sum(dq_amount) dq,sum(mk_amount) mk,sum(lg_amount) lg,sum(pj_amount) pj from (select agent_code,case series_code when '100' then b.back_amount else 0 end dq_amount,case series_code when '101' then b.back_amount else 0 end mk_amount, case series_code when '102' then b.back_amount else 0 end lg_amount,case series_code when '105' then b.back_amount else 0 end pj_amount from backlist a,backdetails b where a.back_code=b.back_code and series_code in (100,101,102,105) and end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,' ) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code

select dbo.getdatestr1(rq) 领用日期,psid 商品编码,spmc 商品名称,xhgg 型号规格,jldw 单位,jbrmc 领用人,sl 数量,convert(decimal(12,2),dj/@@LS.ZOOM,) 单价,convert(decimal(12,2),je/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额 from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.spbm=c.id and sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,' and series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select sum(sl) sl,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(je)/@@LS.ZOOM,) je from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.spbm=c.id and sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,' and series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select dbo.getdatestr1(rq) 日期,psid 商品编码,spmc 商品名称,xhgg 型号规格,jldw 单位,sccj 品牌,sl 数量,convert(decimal(12,2),dj/@@LS.ZOOM,) 单价,convert(decimal(12,2),je/@@LS.ZOOM,) 金额 from rkd_zb a,rkd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.spbm=c.id and sh='T' and sc_flag='@@SC_FLAG,' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,' and series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)

select sum(sl) sl,convert(decimal(12,2),sum(je)/@@LS.ZOOM,) je from rkd_zb a,rkd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.spbm=c.id and sh='T' and sc_flag='@@SC_FLAG,' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,' and series_code in (@@LS.QXDJ,)
select dbo.getdatestr1(rq) wsdate,a.id code,psid,sl from cgd_zb a,cgd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='F' and spbm='@@SPBM,' and note_type='@@Note_Type,'
select dbo.getdatestr1(rq) wsdate,m.id code,psid,sl from rkd_zb m,rkd_mx n where m.id=n.id and m.sh='T' and ref_id='@@CGD_ID,' and spbm='@@SPBM,'

select product_code,product_name product_name,product_size,product_untl,convert(decimal(12,2),product_price) product_price,'' price_type,product_memo demo,dbo.clearZero(product_num) product_num,type_sales,id code,rand() rand,product_color,'' type_agent,pack_num,isnull(pack_type,'') pack_type,'' iszx,dbo.getHttpImagePath(product_image,'@@LS.URL,') product_image,'' product_md,series_code,product_id,agent_code from kc_kcdtb a where sts='0' and agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'

select agent_code,domain_man,agent_address,agent_tel,contact_man,agent_amount,qyzk,join_date,end_date,agent_name,brand_code,'' pq,agent_level,dised_amount,0 gis_amount,wl_amount,agent_tel1,agent_qq,pro_amount,(select dh from tj_sys_yh where yhh=a.domain_man) qyjldh,(select sum(back_amount) from backlist where note_type='SK' and back_sts='2' and agent_code=a.agent_code) ljdke,(select sum(back_amount) from backlist where note_type='BT' and back_sts='2' and agent_code=a.agent_code) ljbte,(select mc from bm_jglx where bm=a.agent_type) jglx,xsrw,wcje,rwwcl from agent_list a,dbo.v_xsrwwcl('@@LS.DWDM,') b where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select x.Agent_Code,xsrw,orderamount,hk_amount,case xsrw when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(12,2),(hk_amount/(xsrw)*100)) end wcl from (select agent_code,SUM(M1+M2+M3+M4+M5+M6+M7+M8+M9+M10+M11+M12) xsrw from Year_Plan where Agent_Code='@@LS.DWDM,' and A_Year=datepart(yyyy,getdate()) group by agent_code) x,dbo.v_xsrwwcb('@@LS.YEAR,') y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code

select a.agent_code 客户编号,agent_name 客户名称,agent_tel 电话,stand_amount 销售金额,dis_amount,dised_amount,isnull(zxjt_amount,0) 装修计提,isnull(gg_amount,0) gg_amount,isnull(gis_amount,0) gis_amount,isnull(ggjt_amount,0) 广告计提,wl_amount 物料结余,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) 上级编码,a.agent_amount 账上余额,convert(int,a.dis_fee*100) 返回率,pro_amount 赠补余额,isnull(agent_amount,0)+isnull(pro_amount,0)+isnull(wl_amount,0) 余额小计 from agent_list a,v_stand_amount b where a.agent_code*=b.agent_code and sjbm!=-1

select sum(stand_amount) 销售金额,sum(dis_amount),sum(dised_amount),sum(isnull(zxjt_amount,0)) ji_zx,sum(gg_amount),sum(gis_amount),sum(isnull(ggjt_amount,0)) jt_gg,sum(isnull(wl_amount,0)) jt_wl,sum(a.agent_amount) agent_amount,sum(a.pro_amount) pro_amount,sum(isnull(agent_amount,0)+isnull(pro_amount,0)+isnull(wl_amount,0)) ye_total from agent_list a,v_stand_amount b where a.agent_code*=b.agent_code and sjbm!=-1

select '@@ID,' code, spbm, spmc,xhgg,b.product_untl jldw,sl,type_bazaar yj,type_bazaar dj, type_bazaar*sl je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,a.jh_id ref_id,agent_code sccj, psid,0 wssl,product_color ysmc from jhd_mx a,product_list b where a.spbm=b.id and jh_id in (@@d_SPBM,)
row.KJSM: 整计划单商品添加入库单

row.CS: group by DATEPART(month, opr_date) ) x,v_month y where x.date_mm =* y.mm_code order by y.mm_code
row.SQL: select y.mm_name,isnull(back_num,0) back_num,isnull(back_amount,0) back_amount from ( select DATEPART(month, opr_date) date_mm,SUM(ISNULL(hk_amount,0)) back_amount,0 back_num from Amount_Account where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,' and opr_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select top 5 newid,title,dbo.getdatestr1(datatime) datatiem,is_good,is_read from news where newid<(select max(newid) from news)
select newid,title,dbo.getdatestr1(datatime) datatiem,is_good,is_read,content from news where newid='@@ID,'
select top 1 newid,title,dbo.getdatestr1(datatime) datatiem,is_good,is_read from news
select newid,title,dbo.getdatestr1(datatime) datatiem,is_good,is_read,news_url from news where 1=1
select newid from news where is_read='是' and newid not in(select newsid from newsread where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,')
select bm,mc from warelist

select bm,mc,XL from xl_list_z where sjbm='@@SJBM,' and agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'
select id code,dbo.getdatestr1(sssj1) sssj1,dbo.getdatestr1(sssj2) sssj2,gms,gmdw,'达到'+gmdw+'' +convert(varchar,gms)+'时，送' act_memo,fl,famc,fasm,gms2,product_attr,jtfs from msd_zb where id='@@ID,'
select spbm, spmc,lb,lbmc,id code from act_xl_info where id='@@ID,'
select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,psid,ysmc,sl,dj,je,bz,sssj1,sssj2,sccj,zsje,zsbl from msd_mx where id='@@ID,' order by xh

select '@@ID,' code,'' spbm,'' spmc,'@@Series_Code,' lb,'@@Series_Name,' lbmc

select ass_spbm id,spmc,dj,dbo.getdatestr1(sssj1) sssj1,dbo.getdatestr1(sssj2) sssj2 from ass_zb where ass_spbm='@@ID,'

select agent_name,agent_level,M01,H01,Z01,M02,H02,Z02,M03,H03,Z03,M04,H04,Z04,M05,H05,Z05,M06,H06,Z06,M07,H07,Z07,M08,H08,Z08,M09,H09,Z09,M10,H10,Z10,M11,H11,Z11,M12,H12,Z12,M13,H13,Z13,b.domain_man,b.open_flag from dbo.v_xsrwb3('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '合计：' agent_name,'' agent_level,sum(M01),sum(H01),case sum(H01) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M01)/sum(H01)*100) end Z01,sum(M02),sum(H02),case sum(H02) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M02)/sum(H02)*100) end Z02,sum(M03),sum(H03),case sum(H03) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M03)/sum(H03)*100) end Z03,sum(M04),sum(H04),case sum(H04) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M04)/sum(H04)*100) end Z04,sum(M05),sum(H05),case sum(H05) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M05)/sum(H05)*100) end Z05,sum(M06),sum(H06),case sum(H06) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M06)/sum(H06)*100) end Z06,sum(M07),sum(H07),case sum(H07) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M07)/sum(H07)*100) end Z07,sum(M08),sum(H08),case sum(H08) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M08)/sum(H08)*100) end Z08,sum(M09),sum(H09),case sum(H09) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M09)/sum(H09)*100) end Z09,sum(M10),sum(H10),case sum(H10) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M10)/sum(H10)*100) end Z10,sum(M11),sum(H11),case sum(H11) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M11)/sum(H11)*100) end Z11,sum(M12),sum(H12),case sum(H12) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M12)/sum(H12)*100) end Z12,sum(M13),sum(H13),case sum(H13) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M13)/sum(H13)*100) end Z13 from dbo.v_xsrwb3('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code
select agent_name,agent_level,M01,H01,Z01,M02,H02,Z02,M03,H03,Z03,M04,H04,Z04,M13,H13,Z13,domain_man,b.open_flag from dbo.v_xsrwb2('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '合计：' agent_name,'' agent_level,sum(M01),sum(H01),case sum(H01) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M01)/sum(H01)*100) end Z01,sum(M02),sum(H02),case sum(H02) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M02)/sum(H02)*100) end Z02,sum(M03),sum(H03),case sum(H03) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M03)/sum(H03)*100) end Z03,sum(M04),sum(H04),case sum(H04) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M04)/sum(H04)*100) end Z04,sum(M13),sum(H13),case sum(H13) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M13)/sum(H13)*100) end Z13 from dbo.v_xsrwb2('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code
select agent_name,agent_level,M01,H01,Z01,M02,H02,Z02,M03,H03,Z03,M04,H04,Z04,M13,H13,Z13,domain_man,b.open_flag from dbo.v_xsrwb4('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '合计：' agent_name,'' agent_level,sum(M01),sum(H01),case sum(H01) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M01)/sum(H01)*100) end Z01,sum(M02),sum(H02),case sum(H02) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M02)/sum(H02)*100) end Z02,sum(M03),sum(H03),case sum(H03) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M03)/sum(H03)*100) end Z03,sum(M04),sum(H04),case sum(H04) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M04)/sum(H04)*100) end Z04,sum(M13),sum(H13),case sum(H13) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M13)/sum(H13)*100) end Z13 from dbo.v_xsrwb4('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select ticks,finall_amount,agent_amount,agent_amount-finall_amount pay_amount,case sign(agent_amount-finall_amount) when -1 then '请贵方总计办款：'+convert(varchar,abs(agent_amount-finall_amount))+'元.' else '无需汇款，谢谢！' end pay_memo from v_AbsAmount where agent_code in (select agent_code from backlist where back_code='@@Back_Code,')

select domain_man,'',sum(M01),sum(H01),case sum(H01) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(m01)/sum(h01)*100) end Z01,sum(M02),sum(H02),case sum(H02) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(m02)/sum(h02)*100) end Z02,sum(M03),sum(H03),case sum(H03) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(m03)/sum(h03)*100) end Z03,sum(M04),sum(H04),case sum(H04) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(m04)/sum(h04)*100) end Z04,sum(M13),sum(H13),case sum(H13) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(m13)/sum(h13)*100) end Z13 from dbo.v_xsrwb2('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code group by domain_man
select agent_name,agent_level,M01,H01,Z01,M02,H02,Z02,M03,H03,Z03,M04,H04,Z04,M13,H13,Z13,domain_man,b.open_flag from dbo.v_xsrwb_led('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '合计：' agent_name,'' agent_level,sum(M01),sum(H01),case sum(H01) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M01)/sum(H01)*100) end Z01,sum(M02),sum(H02),case sum(H02) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M02)/sum(H02)*100) end Z02,sum(M03),sum(H03),case sum(H03) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M03)/sum(H03)*100) end Z03,sum(M04),sum(H04),case sum(H04) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M04)/sum(H04)*100) end Z04,sum(M13),sum(H13),case sum(H13) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M13)/sum(H13)*100) end Z13 from dbo.v_xsrwb_led('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code
select a.id,product_id,product_name,product_size,dwbm,mc,a.dj,a.bz from product_wldw a,product_list b,sc_bm_wldw c where a.product_id=b.id and a.dwbm=c.bm and product_id='@@ID,'

select a.id code,a.product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,cbjj type_bazaar,dj,a.bz from Product_WLDW a,kc_kcdtb b where b.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,' and a.product_id=b.product_id and dwbm='@@DWBM,'
select '8_@@LS.YEAR,@@LS.MONTH,'+dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from mrp_zb where rq between '@@LS.FIRSTDAYSOFCURMONTH, 00:00:00' and '@@LS.LASTDAYSOFCURMONTH, 23:59:59'

select '@@ID,' code,spbm,psid,ysmc,spmc,xhgg,sl,metail_code,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,wl_sl,isnull(product_num,0) product_num,isnull(lower_num,0) lower_num,isnull(wl_sl,0)-isnull(product_num,0)+isnull(lower_num,0) xq_sl from (select spbm,x.psid,ysmc,spmc,xhgg,sl,metail_code,sl*bom_num wl_sl from (select spbm,psid,ysmc,spmc,xhgg,sum(sl) sl from jhd_mx where jh_id='@@ref_id,' group by spbm,psid,ysmc,spmc,xhgg ) x,sc_bom y where x.spbm=y.product_code ) m,product_list n where m.metail_code=n.id
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,dwbm,dwmc,jbrbm,jsfsbm,zdr,shr,zdzk,zsl,zje,zhj,tje,yjs,xjs,ejs,wjs,zzk,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc,pjlx,sclx,xqly,yqwcrq,id_dhd from mrp_zb where id='@@ID,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' when 'J' then '已结案' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy,isnull((select isnull(sum(sl),0) from rkd_mx where ref_id=a.id),0) ysl,pjlx,sclx,xqly,yqwcrq,id_dhd from mrp_zb a where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select id code,spbm,psid,ysmc,spmc,xhgg,sl,metail_code,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,wl_sl,product_num,lower_num,0 cg_sl,xq_sl,xh,yqcgrq from mrp_mx where id='@@ID,'

select ref_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,sl,psid,dwmc,rq,ck_id,rksl from(select ref_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,sl,psid,dwmc,dbo.getdatetime(rq) rq,ck_id,isnull((select sum(sl+isnull(wssl,0)) from rkd_mx where ref_id=convert(varchar,ck_id)),0) rksl from ckd_zb a,ckd_mx b,product_list c where a.id=b.id and b.ref_id=c.id and sh='T' and pjlx='2' and isja='F'
row.KJSM: 委外送货明细回收选择

row.SQL: select '@@ID,' code, a.id spbm, product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,sl,isnull(c.dj,0) yj, isnull(c.dj,0) dj, isnull(c.dj,0)*sl je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,ck_id ref_id,sccj,product_code psid,0 wssl from product_list a,ckd_mx b,Product_WLDW c where a.id=b.ref_id and a.ID=c.Product_Id and c.DWBM='@@DWBM,' and b.ck_id='@@ref_id,'
row.KJSM: 委外送货明细回收选择添加入库单

row.SQL: select * from bt_list where bt_code='@@Back_Code,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' when 'F' then '未提交' else '待审核' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy from shd_zb a where rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' and sh='@@SH,'
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,dwbm,dwmc,jbrbm,jsfsbm,zdr,shr,zsl,zje,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc,pjlx,zse from shd_zb where id='@@ID,'
select '1_@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from shd_zb where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,z_sl,b_sl,dj,je,bz,ref_id,sccj,psid,shyy from shd_mx where id='@@ID,' order by xh

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 日期,back_code 单据编号,mc 供货商名称,jsdh 结算单号,ywy 业务员,back_demo 备注,back_num 数量,back_amount 金额,a.agent_code 供货商编号,wldw_amount 账上余额,back_demo,arr_address,sfsf,dbo.getSts(back_sts) back_sts from backlist a,sc_bm_wldw b where a.agent_code=b.bm
select sum(back_amount) 金额 from backlist a,sc_bm_wldw b where a.agent_code=b.bm
select product_code 货号,product_name 品名,product_size 规格,product_untl 单位,product_price 单价,back_num 数量,back_amount 金额,back_reason 备注 from backdetails where back_code='@@BACK_CODE,'
select '@@DEPT,'+dbo.lpad('0',2,isnull(max(right(yhh,2))+1,1)) TUser_Id from tj_sys_yh where dept='@@DEPT,'
select yhh,yhxm,case bm when '8888' then '老板' else '员工' end yhz,yhid,sts,case sts when '1' then '禁用' else '正常' end stsName,lxfs,yhjb,bm from tj_sys_yh where dept='@@AGENT_CODE,'

select id,product_code product_code,product_name product_name,isnull(product_size,'') product_size,series_name,product_color,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,back_reason,back_code,back_type,price_type,check_num,check_num-back_num dif_num,ticket_num,store_num,reven_num,disaccount_price,complete_date,ware_code,reved_num,product_id,fact_num,zk,pxh,fact_amount,pack_memo,pack_num,pack_nums,isnull(type_agent,0) type_agent,type_ls,a.series_code,product_mj,store_no,pcs_dj,product_code+'('+product_name+')' product_info from backDetails a,series_list b where a.series_code=b.series_code and back_code='@@Back_Code,'

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 日期,back_code 单据编号,sfsf 补贴类型,back_amount 补贴金额,dbo.getBTFHGZ(qt_amount) 返还规则,(select sum(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_code=a.back_code) 已返还金额,back_demo 备注 from backlist a where note_type='BT' and back_sts='2' and Qt_Amount>0 and Qt_Amount<=1 and agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,'

select sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(yfh) yfh from (select back_amount,(select sum(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_code=a.back_code) yfh from backlist a where note_type='BT' and back_sts='2' and Qt_Amount>0 and Qt_Amount<=1 and agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,' ) x

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) 日期,back_code 单据编号,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) 客户名称,jsdh 结算单号,ywy 业务员,back_demo 备注,back_num 数量,back_amount 金额,taf_amount 代垫运费,a.agent_code 客户编号,dbo.getNoteTypeHtml(note_type) 单据类型,note_type,agent_amount 账上余额,case sign(back_amount-agent_amount) when 0 then '' when -1 then '' else 'red' end color_flag,case agent_amount when 0 then 'hidden' else 'visible' end vis_flag, sign(agent_amount-back_amount-taf_amount+tis_amount) kk_flag,dbo.getSts(back_sts) back_st,dbo.getAgentName(sjbm) sjbm,tis_amount,back_demo,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0) kk_amount,back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0)-agent_amount ysk11,'' FH,back_num fhc,'' isShowD,b.brand_code,arr_address,sfsf,(select sum(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_code=a.back_code) yfh,qt_amount,dbo.getBTFHGZ(qt_amount) bttfgz from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)

select sum(back_num) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(agent_amount) agent_amount,sum(back_amount+isnull(taf_amount,0)-isnull(tis_amount,0)-agent_amount) ysk,sum(tis_amount) tis_amount,sum(taf_amount) taf_amount from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code AND sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)

select id 单号,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) 日期,dwmc 供货商,zdr 制单人,shr 审核人,dbo.clearzero(zsl) 总数量,zje 总金额,pzh 凭证号,zy 摘要 from rkd_zb where sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select id 单号,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) 日期,jbrmc 领用人,zdr 制单人,shr 审核人,dbo.clearzero(zsl) 总数量,zje 总金额,pzh 凭证号,zy 摘要,case pjlx when '1' then '普通出库-'+id_rwd when '3' then '提料出库' when '2' then '次品出库' end 出库类型 from ckd_zb where sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select pic_code, short_path,style,layout,pic_mj,pic_price,pic_position,pic_name,housetype,rand() rand,agent_name,dbo.getdatestr1(a.add_date) add_date,a.agent_code,full_path from bm_tp a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
select pic_code,pro_id,proshortpath,rand() rand,pro_code+''+pro_name+''+isnull(pro_size,'') product_name,pic_pro_id from bm_tp_sp where pic_code='@@BM,'

select dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agentName,product_size,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount,sum(product_mj*a.back_num) mj from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and series_code='100' and end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,'

select sum(a.back_amount) back_amount,sum(product_mj*a.back_num) mj from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and series_code='100' and end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1,' and '@@ORDER_DATE2,'

select '@@ID,' code,a.product_id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,product_price yj, product_price dj, product_price je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id,product_image tplj,'' cd from kc_kcdtb a where a.product_id in (@@d_SPBM,) and a.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'
select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,id,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' when 'J' then '待审核' else '未提交' end sh,ckmc,dwmc,zsl,zje,jbrmc,zdr,shr,bz,zy,rwdmc from ckd_zb a where pjlx='@@PJLX,'
select id,a_year,m1,m2,m3,m4,m5,m6,m7,m8,m9,m10,m11,m12,agent_code,agent_name,plan_type,memo,m1+m2+m3+m4+m5+m6+m7+m8+m9+m10+m11+m12 m_total from year_plan where plan_type='回款' and a_year='@@Year,'
select id,a_year,m1,m2,m3,m4,m5,m6,m7,m8,m9,m10,m11,m12,agent_level,agent_name,plan_type,memo,m1+m2+m3+m4+m5+m6+m7+m8+m9+m10+m11+m12 m_total from level_plan where plan_type='回款' and a_year='@@Year,'
select id code,spbm,spmc,sl,dj,je,xh,ff_id,dwbm,dwmc,sssj1,sssj2,bz,isja,psid,ffrq from djqffd_mx a where id='@@ID,'

select '@@ID,' code,agent_code dwbm,agent_name dwmc,djq_id spbm,zy spmc,id psid,@@d_SL, sl,zje dj, @@d_SL,*zje je,'@@SSSJ1,' sssj1,'@@SSSJ2,' sssj2,'F' isja,'@@RQ,' ffrq from agent_list a,DJQ_ZB b where AGENT_CODE in (@@d_Cust_Id,) and b.djq_ID in (@@d_Djq_Id,)
row.KJSM: 代金券添加到客户列表

row.SQL: select ID,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ZDR,SHR,ZSL,ZJE,ZHJ,case SH when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh,SSSJ1,sssj2,zy,bz from djqffd_zb where 1=1
row.KJSM: 代金券添加到客户列表

row.SQL: select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,jbrbm,jsfsbm,zdr,shr,zsl,zje,zhj,zy,bz,sh,jbrmc,pzh,pjhm,sssj1,sssj2 from djqffd_zb where id='@@ID,'
select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,pfj_old,pfj,psid,ysmc,bz from tjd_mx where id='@@ID,' order by xh
select '7_@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from tjd_zb where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())

select '@@ID,' code,id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,product_price pfj_old,product_price pfj,product_color ysmc from product_list where id in (@@d_SPBM,)
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,ckmc,jbrbm,jbrmc,zdr,shr,dbo.getdatestr1(sssj1) sssj1,dbo.getdatestr1(sssj2) sssj2,bz,sh from tjd_zb where id='@@ID,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,dbo.getdatestr1(sssj1) sssj1,dbo.getdatestr1(sssj2) sssj2,psid,spmc,xhgg,pfj_old,pfj,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh,a.id,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name from tjd_zb a,tjd_mx b,TJD_KH c where a.id=b.id and a.ID=c.id
select 'PH@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from phd_zb where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select id code,spbm,spmc,psid,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,je,bz,back_id,back_code,store_no,ysl,cd,right(rtrim(back_code),9) short_back_code,series_code,zxgg from phd_mx where id='@@ID,' order by series_code

select code,spbm,spmc,psid,xhgg,jldw,sum(sl) sl,sum(ysl) ysl,dj,je,bz,back_id,back_code,store_no,cd,short_back_code,series_code,zxgg from (select '@@ID,' code,product_id spbm,PRODUCT_NAME spmc,PRODUCT_CODE psid,product_size xhgg ,PRODUCT_UNTL jldw,wait_NUM sl,wait_NUM ysl,PRODUCT_PRICE dj,BACK_AMOUNT je,back_reason bz,ID back_id,back_code,store_no,isnull(product_mj,'') cd,right(rtrim(back_code),9) short_back_code,series_code,pack_num zxgg from dbo.v_WaitingSendDetails_b('@@d_Cust_Id,')) x group by code,spbm,spmc,psid,xhgg,jldw,DJ,je,bz,back_id,back_code,store_no,cd,short_back_code,series_code,zxgg
select ID,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,dwbm,dwmc,zdr,shr,zsl,zje,zy,sh,jbrmc,shdz,jsr,jsrdh,taf_sffs,case sh when 'F' then '待录入' else '已录入' end sh_mc,print_hit,ckmc,isjd from phd_zb where zdr='@@LS.XM,'
select 'TY@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from tyd_zb where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select id code,spbm,spmc,sl,tj,dj,je,bz,tjhj,ckmc from tyd_mx where id='@@ID,' order by xh

select code,spbm,spmc,isnull(t_sl,sl) sl,tj,dj,isnull(t_sl,sl)*dj*tj je,flag,bz,ckmc,t_sl*tj tjhj from (select '@@ID,' code,pack_id spbm,Pack_Name spmc,0 sl,Pack_TJ tj,case pack_type when '1' then yf_xt*yf_xs when '2' then yf_jx*yf_xs when '3' then yf_lg*yf_xs when '4' then yf_dqxt*yf_xs else 0 end dj,0 je,'F' flag,'' bz,pxh from Pack_List a,agent_list b where AGENT_CODE='@@DWBM,') x,(select ckmc,ZY,COUNT(*) t_sl from ZXD_ZB where ID_PHD in (@@d_Cust_Id,) group by ckmc,zy ) y where x.spmc*=y.ZY order by CKMC,pxh
select ID,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,dwbm,dwmc,zdr,shr,zsl,ztj,zje,zy,shdz,lxr,dh,taf_sffs,ddze,sh,jbrmc,taf_amount,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh_mc from tyd_zb where 1=1

select ID,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,dwbm,dwmc,zdr,shr,zsl,zje,zy,sh,jbrmc,shdz,jsr,jsrdh,taf_sffs,case sh when 'F' then '待录入' else '已录入' end sh_mc,bz,(print_hit+1) print_hit,ckmc from phd_zb where id='@@ID,'

select ID,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,dwbm,dwmc,zdr,shr,zsl,ztj,zje,zy,shdz,lxr,dh,taf_sffs,ddze,sh,jbrmc,taf_amount,case sh when 'T' then '已审核' else '待审核' end sh_mc,bz,taf_company,pzh from tyd_zb where id='@@ID,'
select id code,spbm,spmc,sl,tj,dbo.clearZero(dj) dj,je,bz,tjhj,ckmc from tyd_mx where id='@@ID,' and sl>0 order by xh
select sum(convert(decimal(12,3),case tjhj when '' then 0.000 else isnull(tjhj,0.000) end)) tjhj from tyd_mx where id='@@ID,' and sl>0

select store_no,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,bz,series_code,right(rtrim(back_code),9) short_back_code from (select store_no,SPMC,case cd when '' then xhgg else isnull(xhgg,'')+'长度MM:'+cd end XHGG,PSID,JLDW,dbo.clearZero(sum(SL)) sl,bz,MAX(series_code) series_code,min(back_code) back_code from PHD_MX where ID='@@ID,' and store_no='318产品仓' group by store_no,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,bz,cd) x order by series_code
select dbo.clearzero(sum(SL)) sl from PHD_MX where ID='@@ID,' and store_no='318产品仓'

select store_no,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,bz,series_code,right(rtrim(back_code),9) short_back_code from (select store_no,SPMC,case cd when '' then xhgg else isnull(xhgg,'')+'长度MM:'+cd end XHGG,PSID,JLDW,dbo.clearZero(sum(SL)) sl,bz,MAX(series_code) series_code,min(back_code) back_code from PHD_MX where ID='@@ID,' and store_no='477产品仓' group by store_no,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,bz,cd) x order by series_code
select dbo.clearzero(sum(SL)) sl from PHD_MX where ID='@@ID,' and store_no='477产品仓'

select store_no,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,bz,series_code,right(rtrim(back_code),9) short_back_code from (select store_no,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,dbo.clearZero(sum(SL)) sl,bz,MAX(series_code) series_code,min(back_code) back_code from PHD_MX where ID='@@ID,' and store_no='礼品仓' group by store_no,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,bz) x order by series_code
select dbo.clearzero(sum(SL)) sl from PHD_MX where ID='@@ID,' and store_no='礼品仓'

select store_no,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,bz,series_code,right(rtrim(back_code),9) short_back_code from (select store_no,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,dbo.clearZero(sum(SL)) sl,bz,MAX(series_code) series_code,min(back_code) back_code from PHD_MX where ID='@@ID,' and store_no='其他产品仓' group by store_no,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,bz) x order by series_code

select agent_name,agent_level,M01,H01,Z01,M02,H02,Z02,M03,H03,Z03,M04,H04,Z04,M13,H13,Z13,domain_man,b.open_flag from dbo.v_xsrwb_jx('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '合计：' agent_name,'' agent_level,sum(M01),sum(H01),case sum(H01) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M01)/sum(H01)*100) end Z01,sum(M02),sum(H02),case sum(H02) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M02)/sum(H02)*100) end Z02,sum(M03),sum(H03),case sum(H03) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M03)/sum(H03)*100) end Z03,sum(M04),sum(H04),case sum(H04) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M04)/sum(H04)*100) end Z04,sum(M13),sum(H13),case sum(H13) when 0 then 0 else convert(decimal(10,2),sum(M13)/sum(H13)*100) end Z13 from dbo.v_xsrwb_jx('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code
select agent_name,agent_level,M01,H01,Z01,M02,H02,Z02,M03,H03,Z03,M04,H04,Z04,M13,H13,Z13,domain_man,b.open_flag from dbo.v_xsrwb_318or477('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select '合计：' agent_name,'' agent_level,sum(M01),sum(H01),sum(Z01) Z01,sum(M02),sum(H02),sum(Z02) Z02,sum(M03),sum(H03),sum(Z03) Z03,sum(M04),sum(H04),sum(Z04) Z04,sum(M13),sum(H13),sum(Z13) Z13 from dbo.v_xsrwb_318or477('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select ywy,back_amount,agent_amount,ROUND(tcbl,6,1) tcbl,convert(decimal(12,2),back_amount*ROUND(tcbl,6,1)+agent_amount*0.002) tc_amount from (select ywy,back_amount, case sign(tcbl-fds) when 1 then fds else tcbl end tcbl,agent_amount from (select ywy, back_amount,case sign(s_tcbl-tcbl) when 1 then s_tcbl else tcbl end tcbl ,agent_amount,fds from ( select ywy,back_amount,((back_amount-tcds)/tczs)*0.001+tcbl s_tcbl,agent_amount,tcbl,case sign(back_amount-800000) when 1 then 0.015 else 0.016 end fds from ( select ywy,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(agent_amount) agent_amount from v_ywygz where back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by ywy ) x,tj_sys_yh y where x.ywy=y.yhxm) m) n) p

select sum(back_amount),sum(agent_amount),sum(convert(decimal(12,2),back_amount*ROUND(tcbl,6,1)+agent_amount*0.002)) tc_amount from (select ywy,back_amount,case sign(tcbl-fds) when 1 then fds else tcbl end tcbl,agent_amount from (select ywy, back_amount,case sign(s_tcbl-tcbl) when 1 then s_tcbl else tcbl end tcbl ,agent_amount,fds from ( select ywy,back_amount,((back_amount-tcds)/tczs)*0.001+tcbl s_tcbl,agent_amount,tcbl,case sign(back_amount-800000) when 1 then 0.015 else 0.016 end fds from ( select ywy,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(agent_amount) agent_amount from v_ywygz where back_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by ywy ) x,tj_sys_yh y where x.ywy=y.yhxm) m) n) p
select qus_id,agent_code,qus_man,dbo.getdatestr1(qus_date) qus_date,qus_content,ans_man,dbo.getdatestr1(ans_date) ans_date,ans_content,bz from qus_list where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

select qus_id,agent_code,qus_man,dbo.getdatestr1(qus_date) qus_date,qus_content,ans_man,dbo.getdatestr1(ans_date) ans_date,isnull(ans_content,'') ans_content,bz,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name from qus_list where agent_code in (@@LS.QXCK,)

select qus_id,agent_code,qus_man,dbo.getdatestr1(qus_date) qus_date,qus_content,ans_man,dbo.getdatestr1(ans_date) ans_date,isnull(ans_content,'') ans_content,bz,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name from qus_list where 1=1

select id,product_name,product_num,back_num from (select a.id,a.product_name,product_num-isnull((select fact_num from v_absproductlist where product_id=b.id),0) product_num,back_num from backdetails a,product_list b where a.product_id=b.id and back_code='@@Back_Code,' ) x where x.back_num>x.product_num

select a.agent_code sjbm, agent_name,sum(M01) M01,convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M01)/max(H01))*100) Z01,sum(M02) M02, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M02)/max(H02))*100) Z02,sum(M03) M03, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M03)/max(H03))*100) Z03,sum(M04) M04, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M04)/max(H04))*100) Z04,sum(M05) M05, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M05)/max(H05))*100) Z05,sum(M06) M06, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M06)/max(H06))*100) Z06,sum(M07) M07, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M07)/max(H07))*100) Z07,sum(M08) M08, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M08)/max(H08))*100) Z08,sum(M09) M09, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M09)/max(H09))*100) Z09,sum(M10) M10, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M10)/max(H10))*100) Z10,sum(M11) M11, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M11)/max(H11))*100) Z11,sum(M12) M12, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M12)/max(H12))*100) Z12,sum(M13) M13, convert(decimal(10,2),(sum(M13)/max(H13))*100) Z13,domain_man,agent_area,auth_amount,agent_level,agent_starLevel from dbo.v_xshzb3('@@YEAR,') a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code

row.CS: group by domain_man order by sjbm

select memo from dbo.v_orderwlfhmemo('@@ID,')

select m.[客户名称],n.[期初余额]+m.[期初结余] [期初结余] ,n.[货款]+m.货款 货款,n.[装修补贴]+m.[装修补贴] [装修补贴],n.[市场活动]+m.[市场活动] [市场活动],n.[其他补贴]+m.[其他补贴] [其他补贴],n.[折扣返利]+m.[折扣返利] [折扣返利],n.[退货冲款]+m.[退货冲款] [退货冲款],n.[调账]+m.[调账] [调账],n.[货款1]+m.[货款1] [货款1],n.[货款2]+m.[货款2] [货款2],n.[出样]+m.[出样] [出样],n.[工程]+m.[工程] [工程],n.[代垫运费]+m.[代垫运费] [代垫运费],n.[代垫手续费]+m.[代垫手续费] [代垫手续费],n.[期末余额]+m.[期末结余] [期末结余] from (select x.agent_code,dbo.getAgentName(x.agent_code) 客户名称,isnull(init_amount,0) 期初结余,hk_amount 货款,bt_amount 装修补贴,gg_amount 市场活动,cx_amount 其他补贴,tj_amount 折扣返利,cd_amount 退货冲款,hg_amount 调账,stand_amount 货款1,h_bfl_amount 货款2,h_cy_amount 出样,h_gc_amount 工程,yf_amount 代垫运费,qt_amount 代垫手续费,isnull(init_amount,0)+(hk_amount+bt_amount+gg_amount+cx_amount+tj_amount+cd_amount+hg_amount)-(stand_amount+h_bfl_amount+h_cy_amount+h_gc_amount)+qt_amount+yf_amount 期末结余,dbo.getPQName(x.agent_code) 片区,isnull(bzj_amount,0) 保证金结余,y.domain_man 区域经理 from (select m.agent_code, dbo.getInitAmount(m.agent_Code,'@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' ) init_amount,(select top 1 store_bzj from amount_account where agent_code=m.agent_Code and opr_memo in ('保证金') and opr_date < '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' order by id desc) init_bzj,stand_amount,h_bfl_amount,h_gc_amount,h_cy_amount,gg_amount,cx_amount,tj_amount,cd_amount,bt_amount,ch_amount,hg_amount,yf_amount,hk_amount,hb_amount,qt_amount from (select b.agent_code,sum(isnull(stand_amount,0)) stand_amount,sum(isnull(h_bfl_amount,0)) h_bfl_amount,sum(isnull(h_gc_amount,0)) h_gc_amount,sum(isnull(h_cy_amount,0)) h_cy_amount,sum(isnull(gg_amount,0)) gg_amount,sum(isnull(cx_amount,0)) cx_amount,sum(isnull(tj_amount,0)) tj_amount,sum(isnull(cd_amount,0)) cd_amount,sum(isnull(bt_amount,0)) bt_amount,sum(isnull(ch_amount,0)) ch_amount,sum(isnull(hg_amount,0)) hg_amount,sum(isnull(yf_amount,0)) yf_amount,sum(isnull(qt_amount,0)) qt_amount,sum(isnull(hk_amount,0)) hk_amount,sum(case opr_memo when '货款' then 0 else isnull(hg_amount,0) end) hb_amount from amount_account a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=*b.agent_code and b.sjbm in (select agent_code from agent_list where sjbm=-1) and opr_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by b.agent_code) m) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code and sjbm in (@@LS.QXCK,)) m,fhdzdjxc_jz n where m.agent_code*=n.agent_code

select store_no,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,bz,series_code,right(rtrim(back_code),9) short_back_code from (select store_no,SPMC,case cd when '' then xhgg else isnull(xhgg,'')+'长度MM:'+cd end XHGG,PSID,JLDW,dbo.clearZero(sum(SL)) sl,bz,MAX(series_code) series_code,min(back_code) back_code from PHD_MX where ID='@@ID,' and store_no='@@CKMC,' group by store_no,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,bz,cd) x order by series_code

select ORDER_CODE,dbo.getdatestr1(Order_DATE) order_date,YWY,order_amount,ht_bz,agent_code,yqazsj,dh_sts,(select top 1 allowDiscount from tj_sys_yh where lxfs=a.ywy_tel) allowDiscount,isnull(printHits,0) printHits,metails_amount,arr_man+arr_tel+arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_man ,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,arr_address_detail,djje,dbo.getdatestr1(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) end_date,dbo.getdatestr1(ckrq) ckrq,az_man,az_tel,az_date from OrderList a where ORDER_CODE='@@ID,'

select product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,type_sales product_price,1 product_num,type_sales product_amount,type_sales,'10' discount,'@@ID,' order_code,product_price cost_price,product_image,'' product_mj,1*type_sales sales_amount,product_price cost_amount,1 cost_sl,type_sales-product_price gross_amount,'' azwz,'' dhrq,'' sccj from kc_kcdtb where product_id in (@@d_SPBM,) and Agent_Code='@@Agent_Code,'

select id code,product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,dbo.clearZero(product_num) product_num,product_amount,product_price,discount,order_code,product_amount,order_memo,product_mj from orderproduct where order_code='@@ID,'

select product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,kcsl,fact_num,yds,cgs,allot_num from dbo.v_yjhbb_abs('@@Agent_Code,') where 1=1

select a.product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,b.product_num kcsl,back_num cgs,ISNULL(rks,0) rks,back_num-ISNULL(rks,0) wds from v_ydhs a,kc_kcdtb b where a.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and a.agent_code=b.agent_code and a.product_id=b.product_id

sELECT PRODUCT_CODE, c.SERIES_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, isnull(PRODUCT_SIZE,'') product_size, PRODUCT_COLOR, ''store_no, '' zxyh , '' PRODUCT_FILL, PRODUCT_Untl, PRODUCT_PRICE,isnull(a.product_mEMO,'') demo,ID,a.SERIES_CODE,'' PRICETYPE_Name,'' STS,a.LOWER_NUM,'' SPEC_PRICE,'' TYPE_AGENT,a.TYPE_SALES,'' TYPE_BAZAAR,PACK_NUM,PACK_TYPE,'' agent_code,lower_num,b.mc xl_name,'' price_type,'' cgzq,'' qdl,'' cbjj,'' product_attr,'' ware_code FROM import_kcdtb_brand a,xl_list b,series_list c where a.xl_code=b.bm and a.series_code=c.series_code and a.brand_code='@@Brand_Code,'

select ORDER_CODE,Cust_Name,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,FPH,dh_sts,dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,yqazsj,Order_Amount,djje,YWY,sex,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address_detail,order_src from OrderList where AGENT_CODE in (select agent_code from agent_list where brand_code='@@Brand_Code,' and is330KH='是') and order_sts!='9'

select arr_man 业主姓名,arr_tel 电话,arr_address+arr_address_detail 地址,Col_Amount 金额,Col_Memo 备注,YWY 业务员,dbo.getDateTime(col_date) 收款时间,col_sts 状态,dbo.getdatetime(a.end_date) 确认时间,b.order_code 订单编号,cust_name 店铺名称 from OrderCol a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and AGENT_CODE in (select agent_code from agent_list where brand_code='@@Brand_Code,' and is330KH='是')

select b.agent_code,agent_name,xzkhs,jdkhs,cjkhs,jrhke,qdhte,lxwke,rzbxs,rzcys,0 yggz,AGENT_TEL,msr from (select agent_code,SUM(xzkhs) xzkhs,SUM(jdkhs) jdkhs,SUM(cjkhs) cjkhs,SUM(jrhke) jrhke,SUM(qdhte) qdhte,SUM(lxwke) lxwke,SUM(rzbxs) rzbxs,SUM(rzcys) rzcys,sum(msr) msr from dbo.v_ygyjb('@@date1,','@@date2,') where agent_code in (select agent_code from agent_list where brand_code='@@Brand_Code,' and is330KH='是') group by agent_code) a,agent_list b where b.agent_code*=a.agent_code and b.AGENT_CODE in (select agent_code from agent_list where brand_code='@@Brand_Code,' and is330KH='是')

row.SQL: select ORDER_CODE,Cust_Name,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,FPH,dh_sts+'-'+isnull(qh_sts,'') dh_sts,dbo.getdatestr1(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,dbo.getdatetime(az_sjdate) az_sjdate,yqazsj,Order_Amount,djje,YWY,sex,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address_detail,order_src,case isnull(az_sjdate,'') when '' then case isnull(az_man,'') when '' then '未派人安装' else '已派'+az_man+'在'+az_date+' 内安装' end else '已安装' end az_sts from OrderList where AGENT_CODE='@@AGENT_CODE,'
