select product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_num,product_price,product_amount,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,YWY,YWY_TEL,AGENT_CODE,data_src,order_code,ysl, dbo.getseriesName((select series_code from product_list where product_code=v.product_code ),(select Brand_Code from agent_list where AGENT_CODE='@@Agent_Code,') ) series_name from v_mlfxb v where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'
select a.id order_code,SPBM,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,SL,DJ,JE from rkd_mx_z a left join RKD_ZB_z b on a.ID=b.ID where CKBM='@@Agent_Code,'

select id code,product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_amount,type_sales,discount,order_code,convert(decimal(12,2),type_sales*product_num*case product_mj when '' then '1' else product_mj end) sales_amount,order_memo,case product_mj when '' then '' else '长度：'+product_mj+'米' end product_mj from orderparts where srv_ID='@@Srv_Id,'
select sum(product_num) product_num,sum(type_sales*product_num*case product_mj when '' then '1' else product_mj end) sales_amount from orderparts where srv_ID='@@Srv_Id,'
select Image_Id,Image_Path,image_name from OrderImage where (ordercode='@@Order_Code,') and Image_Type='@@Image_Type,'
select series_code bm,series_name mc,series_type lb,Series_Pxh xl from series_list where brand_code='@@Brand_Code,'
select bm,mc,XL from xl_list where sjbm='@@SJBM,' and brand_code='@@Brand_Code,'

select product_code,product_name+isnull(product_color,'') product_name,product_size,product_untl,convert(decimal(12,2),product_price) product_price,dbo.clearZero(product_num) product_num,type_sales,id code,rand() rand,product_color,pack_num,isnull(pack_type,'') pack_type,case charindex('http',product_image) when 1 then product_image else 'salsa/product_photo/'+product_image end product_image,series_code,product_txm product_id,brand_code from import_kcdtb_brand a where brand_code='@@Brand_Code,'
select pic_code,short_path,style,layout,pic_mj,pic_price,pic_position,pic_name,housetype,rand() rand from bm_tp where brand_code='@@Brand_Code,'

select Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(tzshrq) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end ismeter,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' when '0' then '已成交' when '1' then '测量中' when '2' then '待设计' when '3' then '待安装' when '5' then '已安装' end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,opr_dw,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then 25-datediff(dd,groom_date,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getJLAZDate(yqazsj,ORDER_STS,az_date) jl_day ,djje,dh_sts,fph,sex,isattent,qh_sts,dbo.getdatetime(tzshrq) tzshrq from orderList a where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and (sjqh_sts ='欠货')
select full_path,short_path,agent_code from BM_TP where Pic_Code='@@BM,'
select fee_id,fee_name,fee_amount,order_code from orderfee where order_code='@@ID,'

select id,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,users_name,a_year,m1,m2,m3,m4,m5,m6,m7,m8,m9,m10,m11,m12,agent_code,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,users_name,memo,m1+m2+m3+m4+m5+m6+m7+m8+m9+m10+m11+m12 m_total from Year_Salary where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,' and a_year='@@Year,'
select BM,mc ,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name from bm_fylb where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'

select fee_code,Fee_ID, Fee_Type,fee_man,Fee_Tel,dbo.getdatestr1(Fee_date) Fee_date,Fee_Amount,Fee_Memo,opr_man,Opr_Tel,dbo.getdatestr1(Opr_Date) Opr_Date from emp_fee where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'
select sum(Fee_Amount) Fee_Amount from emp_fee where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'

row.SQL: select Image_Id,Image_Path,image_name from OrderImage where OrderCode='@@BM,' and Image_Type='@@Image_Type,'

select id 单号,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) 日期,jbrmc 领用人,zdr 制单人,shr 审核人,dbo.clearzero(zsl) 总数量,zje 总金额,pzh 凭证号,zy 摘要,case pjlx when '1' then '普通出库-'+id_rwd when '3' then '提料出库' when '2' then '次品出库' end 出库类型 from ckd_zb_Z where sh='T' and rq between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'
select AGENT_NAME from tj_sys_yh t, Agent_list a where a.agent_code=t.dept and LXFS='@@lxfs,'
select YHH,YHXM,yhjb,LXFS,STS,dept from tj_sys_yh where YHH='@@yhh,'

select brand_code,Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(order_Date) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address,case order_sts when '0' then '未提交' when '1' then '等待测量' when '2' then '等待设计' when '3' then '等待出库' when '4' then '等待结项' when '5' then '已完成' end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man from orderList a where order_sts='@@BackSts,'

select '@@Note_Type,@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(order_code,3))+1,0)) from orderList where dbo.getDateStr1(order_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate()) and note_type='@@Note_Type,' and order_code like '@@Note_Type,%'

select Order_Code,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,order_src,order_amount,0 fk_amount1,ywy,cl_date,order_memo,order_Sts,agent_code,0 fk_amount2,0 fk_amount3,order_mj,az_man,0 qk_amount,0 yf_amount,isfp,fph,fpdz,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,ywy,ywy_tel,agent_code,dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,dbo.getdatestr1(az_date) az_date from orderList a where order_code='@@Back_Code,'

select Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(order_Date) order_date,arr_man,arr_Tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,order_amount,order_src,agent_code,order_sts,dbo.getdatestr1(az_date) end_date,case order_sts when '0' then '未提交' when '1' then '等待测量' when '2' then '等待设计' when '3' then '等待出库' when '4' then '等待结项' when '5' then '已完成' end ordersts_memo,order_mj,0 fk_amount,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name from orderList a where agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,' and (order_sts='5' or dh_sts='已安装')

select track_id id,ordercode order_code,'' cust_name,custname,cust_tel,b.arr_address,b.srv_man,track_content srv_memo,b.srv_amount,b.srv_result,dbo.getdatestr1(b.srv_sjdate) srv_date,case b.srv_sts when '2' then '已完工' when '1' then '已派单' else '处理中' end srv_stsname,srv_yjdate +' '+srv_yjtime srv_yjdate from OrderTrack a,OrderSrv b where a.Track_Id*=b.Order_Code and a.Track_Memo in('报修','完工') and OrderCode='@@Back_Code,'

select track_content srv_memo,srv_man,srv_mantel,srv_amount,srv_result,srv_sts,dbo.getdatestr1(srv_sjdate) srv_sjdate,dbo.getdatestr1(track_date) srv_date,Srv_YjDate,Srv_YjTime from OrderTrack a,OrderSrv b where a.track_id*=b.order_code and Track_Id='@@Srv_Id,'

select a.id,a.order_code,cust_name,c.arr_man,c.arr_tel,c.arr_address+c.arr_address_detail arr_address,a.srv_man,a.srv_memo,a.srv_amount,a.srv_result,dbo.getdatestr1(a.srv_date) srv_date from ordersrv a,OrderTrack b,OrderList c where a.order_code=b.track_id and b.OrderCode=c.ORDER_CODE and a.order_code='@@Srv_Id,'

select sum(isnull(ht_amount,0)) ht_amount,sum(isnull(order_mj,0)),sum(isnull(fk_amount1,0)+isnull(fk_amount2,0)+isnull(fk_amount3,0)+isnull(fk_amount4,0)) fk_amount,count(*) num from orderList a where 1=1

select az_man,order_mj,azgz from (select az_man,sum(isnull(order_mj,0)) order_mj,sum(isnull(order_mj,0)*25) azgz from orderlist where end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by az_man) x where 1=1

select sum(order_mj),sum(azgz) from (select az_man,sum(isnull(order_mj,0)) order_mj,sum(isnull(order_mj,0)*25) azgz from orderlist where end_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59' group by az_man) x where 1=1

select id code,product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_amount,type_sales,discount,order_code,type_sales*product_num* case product_mj when '' then 1 else product_mj end sales_amount,cost_price,product_mj,product_image,order_code,srv_id from orderparts where srv_id='@@ID,'
row.KJSM: 维修更换的配件及添加的产品

row.SQL: select product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,type_sales product_price,1 product_num,type_sales product_amount,type_sales,'10' discount,'@@ID,' srv_id,'@@Back_Code,' order_code,isnull(product_image,'') product_image,'' product_mj,product_price cost_price from kc_kcdtb where product_id in (@@d_SPBM,) and Agent_Code='@@Agent_Code,'

select Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,track_id,dbo.getdatestr1(track_date) track_date,Track_Man,YWY,YWY_TEL,az_date,srv_memo,wxxz,fyxs,fwxs,agent_code,srv_sts,dh_stsmemo,qh_sts,dh_sts,track_amount from (select a.Arr_Man,a.Arr_Tel,a.Arr_Address,track_id, track_date,Track_Man,YWY,YWY_TEL,az_date,a.srv_memo,wxxz,fyxs,fwxs,a.agent_code,case ISNULL(srv_sts,'9') when '9' then '未安排' when '0' then '已派单' when '1' then '维修中' when '2' then '已完工' end srv_sts,dh_sts+'-'+isnull(qh_sts,'') dh_stsmemo,qh_sts,dh_sts,track_amount from v_maintenance_list a,OrderSrv b where a.track_id*=b.order_code and a.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and track_memo in ('报修','完工') ) x where 1=1

select a.Arr_Man,a.Arr_Tel,a.Arr_Address,track_id, dbo.getdatestr1(track_date) track_date,Track_Man,YWY,YWY_TEL,az_date,a.srv_memo,wxxz,fyxs,fwxs,a.agent_code,case ISNULL(srv_sts,'9') when '9' then '未安排' when '0' then '安排中' when '1' then '已派单' when '2' then '已完工' end srv_sts,a.order_code,dh_sts,track_amount from v_maintenance_list a,OrderSrv b where a.track_id*=b.order_code and a.track_id='@@ID,'
select order_code,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,AGENT_CODE,srv_memo groom_memo,ywy,dh_sts,qh_sts from v_maintenance_list a where track_id='@@ID,'

select a.id,a.product_id,a.product_code,a.product_name,a.product_size,a.product_untl,a.product_price,a.product_num,a.product_amount,a.product_image,order_code,product_mj,order_memo,isnull(ysl,0) ysl,a.type_sales,a.product_num*a.type_sales sales_amount,b.product_num kcsl,(a.product_num-ysl) qh_num,is_send,a.curr_kcsl from orderparts a,kc_kcdtb b where a.product_id=b.product_id and b.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and srv_id='@@ID,'

select Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(tzshrq) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end ismeter,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,opr_dw,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then 25-datediff(dd,groom_date,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getJLAZDate(yqazsj,ORDER_STS,az_date) jl_day ,djje,dh_sts,fph,sex,isattent,qh_sts,isnull((select SUM(product_num*type_sales) from OrderProduct where order_code=a.order_code),0) sales_amount from orderList a where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and qh_sts='@@Sts,'

select a.id,a.product_id,a.product_code,a.product_name,a.product_size,a.product_untl,a.product_price,a.product_num,a.product_amount,a.product_image,order_code,product_mj,order_memo,ysl,a.type_sales,a.product_num*a.type_sales sales_amount,b.product_num kcsl,a.product_num*b.product_price cost_amount,b.product_price cost_price from orderparts a,kc_kcdtb b where a.product_id=b.product_id and b.agent_code='@@Agent_Code,' and srv_id='@@ID,'

select tid,buyer_nick,case order_sts when '1' then '配货中' when '6' then '已作废' when '7' then '等待发货' when '2' then '已发货' when '3' then '已配货' else '待处理' end sts,'' product_name ,dbo.getTbSts(status) status,payment,post_fee,total_fee,invoice_name,receiver_name,receiver_state,receiver_city,receiver_district,receiver_state+' '+receiver_city+' '+receiver_district+' '+receiver_address address,receiver_mobile,buyer_message,buyer_memo,exp_name,(select exp_name from exp_tb_list where exp_code=a.exp_name) exp_cnname,exp_num,order_weight,seller_memo,is_merge,dbo.getDateTime(pay_time) created,isnull(print_hits,0) print_hits,isnull(print_hits,0)+1 show_print_hits,dbo.getdatetime(prc_date) prc_date,order_sts,receiver_address,prc_memo,seller_nick,type,dbo.getdatetime(weight_date) weight_date,prc_man,weight_man,order_weight,kf_man,dbo.getdatetime(print_date) print_date,print_man from v_trade a where 1=1
select outer_sku_id,title,price,num,discount_fee,total_fee,payment,adjust_fee,sku_properties_name,outer_iid,oid,tid,ttid,order_id from v_order where tid='@@Back_Code,'
select id code,xh,spbm,ysmc,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,dj,je,bz from order_mx where id='@@Back_Code,'
row.KJSM: 电商对应内部订单明细表

row.SQL: select tid,buyer_nick,case order_sts when '1' then '配货中' when '6' then '已作废' when '7' then '等待发货' when '2' then '已发货' else '待处理' end sts,'' product_name ,dbo.getTbSts(status) status,payment,post_fee,total_fee,invoice_name,receiver_name,receiver_state,receiver_city,receiver_district,receiver_state+' '+receiver_city+' '+receiver_district+' '+receiver_address address,receiver_mobile,buyer_message,buyer_memo,exp_name,(select exp_name from exp_tb_list where exp_code=a.exp_name) exp_cnname,exp_num,order_weight,dbo.getDateTime(weight_date) weight_date,alipay_id,is_merge,weight_man from v_unpack_trade a where exp_num is not null and weight_date is not null and not exists (select * from waybill where tid=a.tid)

select '@@Back_Code,' code,id spbm,agent_code sccj,product_code psid,product_name spmc,product_size xhgg,product_untl jldw,1 sl,product_price yj, product_price dj, product_price je,100 zk,'' bz,0 zkje,'@@ref_id,' ref_id,product_color ysmc from product_list where id in (@@d_SPBM,)

select a.tid,buyer_nick,case order_sts when '1' then '配货中' when '6' then '打包称重' when '7' then '等待发货' when '2' then '已发货' else '待处理' end sts,'' product_name ,dbo.getTbSts(status) status,payment,post_fee,total_fee,invoice_name,receiver_name,receiver_state,receiver_city,receiver_district,receiver_state+' '+receiver_city+' '+receiver_district+' '+receiver_address address,receiver_mobile,buyer_message,buyer_memo,exp_name,(select exp_name from exp_tb_list where exp_code=a.exp_name) exp_cnname,exp_num,order_weight,dbo.getDateTime(weight_date) weight_date,alipay_id,case send when '1' then '已发货' else '正在发货' end send from v_trade a,waybill b where a.tid=b.tid
row.KJSM: 电商订单发货查询列表

row.SQL: select count(*) num from order_mx where id='@@Back_Code,'
row.KJSM: 判断是否有映射内部单

row.SQL: select 'B'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(tid,3))+1,0)) from trade where tid like 'B%'
select id code,spbm,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,je,ref_id,sccj,psid,ysmc,sxmc,bz from tbd_mx a where id='@@ID,' order by xh
select '9_@@LS.YHDM,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(id,3))+1,1)) id from tbd_zb where dbo.getDateStr1(rq) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())
select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckmc,dwmc,zdr,shr,zsl,zje,zy,bz,sh,dz,dh,jsr,exp_name,exp_num,ckbm,srv_reason from tbd_zb where id='@@ID,'

select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckmc,dwmc,zdr,shr,zsl,zje,zy,bz,sh,dz,dh,jsr,exp_name,exp_num,case sh when '0' then '待审核' when '1' then '配货中' else '已发货' end sh,(select exp_name from exp_tb_list where exp_code=a.exp_name) exp_cnname,print_hits from tbd_zb a where 1=1

select dbo.getdatetime(a.pay_time) pay_time,a.seller_nick,a.tid,a.buyer_nick,case order_sts when '1' then '配货中' when '6' then '已作废' when '7' then '等待发货' when '2' then '已发货' when '3' then '已配货' else '待处理' end order_sts,b.title,b.num,b.total_fee,b.payment,receiver_name,receiver_mobile,receiver_address,prc_memo,seller_memo,buyer_message,exp_name,exp_num,kf_man,prc_man,dbo.getdatetime(prc_date) prc_date,print_man,print_date,weight_man,dbo.getdatetime(weight_date) weight_date,order_weight,dbo.getdatetime(end_date) end_date from trade a,[order] b where a.tid=b.tid
select sum(payment) payment from trade where 1=1

select id tid,dbo.getdatestr(rq) rq,ckmc,dwmc,exp_num,(select exp_name from exp_tb_list where exp_code=a.exp_name ) exp_cnname,zy,jsr,dbo.getdatetime(weight_date) weight_date,order_weight,bz from tbd_zb a where weight_date is not null and sh='1'
select id tid,exp_num from tbd_zb a where Exp_Num='@@Exp_Num,'
select tid,exp_num,receiver_name from trade where tid in (@@d_Qg_Id,) and (weight_man is null or weight_man='')
select dbo.getdatestr1(weight_date) weight_date,seller_nick,type,tid,buyer_nick,psid,ysmc,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,a.bz from order_mx a,trade b where a.id=b.tid

select dbo.getdatestr1(weight_date) 发货日期,jsr 收货人,dwmc 买家呢称,psid 编码,ysmc 型号,spmc 名称,xhgg 规格,jldw 单位,sl 数量,srv_reason 售后原因,a.id 单据号,Weight_Date from tbd_zb a,tbd_mx b where a.id=b.id and sh='2' and weight_date between '@@ORDER_DATE1, 00:00:00' and '@@ORDER_DATE2, 23:59:59'

select buyer_nick 买家昵称,case order_sts when '1' then '配货中' when '6' then '已作废' when '7' then '等待发货' when '2' then '已发货' when '3' then '已配货' else '待处理' end 处理状态,kf_man ,dbo.getdatetime(created) 订货日期,dbo.getdatetime(prc_date) 下单日期,prc_man 下单人,dbo.getdatetime(print_date) 打印日期,print_man 打印人,print_hits 打印次数,dbo.getdatetime(weight_date) 称重日期 ,weight_man 称重人 ,order_weight 重量,payment 成交额,post_fee 运费,(select exp_name from exp_tb_list where exp_code=a.exp_name) 快递公司,exp_num 快递单号,seller_memo 卖家留言,receiver_name 收货人, receiver_mobile 手机号,buyer_message 买家留言,tid 单号,dbo.getDateTime(end_date) 发货日期 from v_trade a where 1=1
select sum(payment) 成交额,sum(post_fee) 运费 from v_trade a where 1=1
row.KJSM: 电商订单列表(报表合计)

row.SQL: select tid,buyer_nick,case order_sts when '1' then '配货中' when '6' then '已作废' when '7' then '等待发货' when '2' then '已发货' when '3' then '已配货' else '待处理' end sts,'' product_name ,dbo.getTbSts(status) status,payment,post_fee,total_fee,invoice_name,receiver_name,receiver_state,receiver_city,receiver_district,receiver_state+' '+receiver_city+' '+receiver_district+' '+receiver_address address,receiver_mobile,buyer_message,buyer_memo,exp_name,(select exp_name from exp_tb_list where exp_code=a.exp_name) exp_cnname,exp_num,order_weight,seller_memo,is_merge,dbo.getDateTime(pay_time) created,isnull(print_hits,0) print_hits,isnull(print_hits,0)+1 show_print_hits,dbo.getdatetime(prc_date) prc_date,order_sts,receiver_address,prc_memo,seller_nick,type,dbo.getdatetime(weight_date) weight_date,prc_man,weight_man,order_weight,kf_man,dbo.getdatetime(print_date) print_date,print_man from v_trade a where 1=1

select id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckmc,dwmc,zdr,shr,zsl,zje,zy,bz,sh,dz,dh,jsr,exp_name,exp_num,case sh when '0' then '待审核' when '1' then '配货中' when 'C' then '已配货' else '已发货' end sh,(select exp_name from exp_tb_list where exp_code=a.exp_name) exp_cnname,print_hits from tbd_zb a where 1=1

select isnull(DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),end_date),'-999999') yxts,end_date yxq,'' dept,brand_url,Brand_ChnName,brand_imageurl,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) end_date,isnull(brand_level,'Z') brand_level,brand_price,iscooper,brand_pay,brand_name,brand_fee from verify_adh_list a,brand_list b where a.brand_code=b.brand_name and agent_tel='@@lxfs,'
select vercode,ostype,verurl,isnull(vercontent,'') vercontent from bm_ver where ostype='@@ostype,'

select isnull(DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),end_date),'-999999') yxts,end_date yxq,'' dept,kcc_url brand_url,'' Brand_ChnName,kcc_imageurl brand_imageurl,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) end_date from agent_AGL_list a,bm_kcc b where app_id='KCC' and agent_tel='@@lxfs,'
select top 1 365 yxts,'2010-12-30' yxq,'' dept,kcc_url brand_url,'' Brand_ChnName,kcc_imageurl brand_imageurl,'2010-12-30' end_date from bm_kcc

select kcc_url brand_url,'' Brand_ChnName,kcc_imageurl brand_imageurl,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) end_date,agent_code,brand_code from agent_AGL_list a,bm_kcc b where app_id='KCC' and agent_tel='@@request_code,'

select isnull(DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),end_date),'-999999') yxts,end_date yxq,dept,kcc_url brand_url, brand_chnname Brand_ChnName,kcc_imageurl brand_imageurl,dbo.getdatestr1(end_date) end_date,kcc_price,yhjb,isnull(brand_url,'') product_url,isnull(brand_imageUrl,'') prdouct_iamgeurl,iscooper,brand_pay from tj_sys_yh a,bm_kcc b,agent_list c,Brand_List d where app_id='KCC' and lxfs='@@lxfs,' and a.DEPT=c.AGENT_CODE and c.Brand_Code=d.Brand_Name
row.KJSM: 艾管理客串串双层认证

row.SQL: select Brand_Code+AGENT_NAME brand_agent from verify_adh_list where AGENT_TEL='@@lxfs,'
row.KJSM: 检测是否注册了艾订货

row.SQL: select VerName,VerCode,OSType,VerURL,VerContent,flag,ID from BM_VER

select ORDER_CODE 订单号,Cust_Name,Arr_Man 业主姓名,Arr_Tel 手机号码,Arr_Address 住房地址,FPH,dh_sts,dbo.getdatestr1(groom_date) 报备日期,dbo.getdatestr1(Order_DATE) 成交日期,yqazsj 预计安装日期,dbo.getdatestr1(az_sjdate) 安装日期,djje 定金金额,Order_Amount 合同金额,(select SUM(col_amount) from OrderCol a where a.OrderCode=ORDER_CODE ) 回款金额 ,(select Order_Amount-SUM(col_amount) from OrderCol a where a.OrderCode=ORDER_CODE ) 欠款金额,Order_MEMO 备注,YWY,sex from OrderList where AGENT_CODE='@@AGENT_CODE,'
